story:
Our Story

David and Jarek met bringing homebrew to the same party. We refined our friendship in a mutual affection for craft beer: refined, nuanced, full of variety and experimentation. Fast forward through improvements to recipe and process over years of collaboration: Threshold Brewing & Blending is the combination of two minds steeped in the lore of beer past and present.

Brewing together over the years, we developed a vision for a place to gather our friends and neighbors and serve delicious beer and hang out. We searched all over our area, and the best place we found was right under our noses, right off the main drag of Stark St., the heart of the historic Montavilla neighborhood.

Our Location

We both live in the Montavilla neighborhood of Portland, OR, a place with a rich past and a vibrant, active populace. We want to add a space for community, a place for families and friends to hang out and have a beer and a snack and enjoy themselves. We are asking for our community to participate in the process, to give the project your ownership in a palpable way.

We have a beautiful 1950's warehouse building waiting to be retrofitted. Inside we have space for a cozy taproom, with a play area for the littles, and a 10-barrel brewhouse with plenty of tanks and barrels. We will have space to grow and share more and more of our favorite flavors with you.

Our Beer

We will focus on three core lines of beer:

Creative

  • Fresh and hoppy beers extending beyond traditional pale ales and IPAs to incorporate novel yeasts and modern techniques to enhance flavor and aroma.

Traditional

  • Barrel aged specialty beers. Beers that have deep roots in old Europe and beyond, but with a personal twist. Included in this category would be imperial stouts, old ales and barrel aged sours, to name a few.

Experimental

  • Exceedingly drinkable and uniquely flavored wild (and sometimes sour) beers of a vaguely “farmhouse” variety.

We will regularly feature 6 beers on tap: A pale ale, an IPA, a double IPA, a farmhouse ale, an imperial stout and a seasonal rotating beer. The hoppy beers are smooth, soft in mouthfeel, with a lower bitterness than is the norm for these beers in the NW, more akin to offerings from Vermont or Massachusetts. The farmhouse ale is fresh and brightly flavored with aromatic hops and a tartness from wild yeast and hop interaction. The stout is rich and chocolatey with plenty of warming potential. We will also produce variants with fruit or spices aged in barrels. For the seasonal rotating beer, we will be taking inspiration from our beautiful city and its seasons to craft something unique for the time. In addition to the 6 regular beers we will have wine and cider on tap, as well as whatever special beers we have ready to share.

Right away longer term projects will be built into the brewing schedule that will age for months or years while we tend to them. Cellaring and blending specialty beers will be an outlet for growth, helping to enhance the breadth of our beers by offering rare and exotic flavor profiles in limited quantities. This is a pitch to the collectors. We will cellar brett saison, mixed-fermentation plum imperial stout, smoked barleywine, sour IPA, brett IPA, sour Belgian-style quad, dry-hopped pale sour, and many more styles for the sophisticated beer drinker that can also appeal to wine and cider lovers. The goal is drinkability, or digestibility as many Belgian brewers say.

The Challenge

When opening a brewery, countless obstacles must be overcome in succession: permits for the city, state, and federal eat up months of time, waiting for equipment to be delivered and permits to clear so we can brew, these factors make it a colossal undertaking for anyone. Your generous help can make the difference in bringing this vision to life.

Where Your Contribution Goes

We will use your donations for working capital as we navigate the pitfalls of starting a business. We will utilize it for rent as we ramp up construction for a Summer 2018 opening. It will serve as a source of miscellaneous funds for those hard to predict expenses. It will be your real connection to giving this business life-blood, helping sustain us through the struggle into the great reveal. We'd love to see you there.

 

 

Join the Founder's Club!

Help us make our dream come true and we will send you some great swag branded with a specially designed, limited edition Threshold Founder's Club logo! T-shirts, sweatshirts, bottle openers, growlers and more. We want you to rep our brand with pride as a ground floor supporter, helping us get off the ground and into the community. Also, as an early supporter, you will get first access to our bottle release club before we announce to the general public.

Update: Bottle Club Perks Added!

Please read our 11/28 update for a detailed description of how the Founder's Bottle Club works and how you can get in on the ground floor--even if you already contributed!

Anyone Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, sharing this campaign and advocating for this business is appreciated in any form. We would love it if you got the word out to your friends and acquaintances. Please don't hesitate to send this link to anyone!

story:
Click here for -> German <- hier gehts zur deutschen Beschreibung


What is Pandastripes.Org ?


Hey you. Yes you!

Do you want to be a hero and make the world a better place, a place where people help each other and don`t hate each other?

Awesome! You can do that now! With Pandastripes!

So what exactly is Pandastripes? Well it  is a mix of social network and a website to meet new friends, kind of like a dating site, but for all kinds of friends .........and for world peace.

It’s an online-platform where people from different sides of a conflict, who want to end said conflict, can connect with each other, become friends and create peace.

Okay okay, let me explain from the beginning. 
My name is Ben I´m from Germany and I think the world could be a much nicer place than it is at the moment.

Have you watched the news lately?
We humans usually treat each other very poorly and it seems that we hate each other for every reason we can find. 

Native inhabitants hating asylum seekers and immigrants,
Christians demonizing and discriminating homosexuals,
the eternal conflict between Israelis and Palestinians in the Middle East.

Conflicts are everywhere. I bet you can name a lot more.

Well I want to make the world a better place, and with your help we can do that.
And if you want to make the world a better place you can’t count on the government, or big organizations. You have to bring the fight to the people.   

Every conflict  has two sides that oppose each other. Like the ones I listed above.  (Christians and Gays, Native Inhabitants and Asylum seekers, Israelis and Palestinians, pretty much every religion with every other religion, you get the point)

The people who want those conflicts are the people who benefit from them. But they are just the ones who are the loudest.

There is a great amount of people who are fed up with all that hate, who want to reach out, build bridges instead of walls and create peace.  And those people who put their hands out and reach out to each other are on both sides of the conflict.

I want to help them connect with Pandastripes.  Pandastripes is a social network that connects people from two sides of a conflict to form friendships and make a difference.

The awesome part about this is, you don’t even have to go out of your way to make a difference. You just do what you love to do anyway. But this time you do it with people who love the same things as you but happen to be at the other side of the conflict.

A football fan can look for an asylum seeker or Immigrant who shares his passion and watch the game together.

A gay guitar player can find a christian bass player to jam together.

An Israeli artist can find a Palestinian artist to do a project together.

Of course this is not only limited to those conflicts, you can use Pandastripes for every conflict you want.

With Pandastripes you can meet new people, do what you love, and make the world a better place. Pretty awesome right?


Why it will work:

Big conflicts usually have a narrative of "US" vs "Them"

(In social psychology it’s called Ingroup and Outgroup) 

We tend to have an affinity towards people we perceive as from the same group as us (ingroup favoritism) and we feel threatened by people we perceive as not from the same group (outgroup derogation).

The problem with all those big conflicts is that we just focus on the one big group we are part of, instead of all the tiny other groups.

Yes you may be a Christian, but you are also so much more, a musician, a gamer and so on. Yet we seem to forget that when it comes to big conflicts.

With Panda we want to bridge that gap and make you focus more on the little groups you are part of. (Because guess what, if you are a 24 year old who loves video games you will have more in common with a 24 year old immigrant who shares your passion than with let’s say, your head of state)

If we focus more on the little groups we are part of, many little bridges can be build, which bring us closer together and weaken big conflicts.

Another interesting point is that studies show that if a person knows someone who is gay he is tremendously less likely to discriminate against people with a different sexual orientation.

That makes of course perfect sense. Since the other group is not a nameless, faceless group he can’t connect with. He now knows someone of that group who he likes. So the outgroup is not an outgroup anymore.


How it works:

As mentioned Pandastripes.org will be a mix of social network and a site to meet new people (think of a dating side but not only for dating but for friends, sports partners, bandmates and all different sorts of people) with the twist that it focuses on people who are on different sides of a conflict.


So if you want to reach out it’s easy:

1. you create an account on Pandastripes.org

2. You create your page with your information and

3. Tell us which conflict-group you are part of (e.g. Native or Immigrant, Christian or Gay, Israeli or Palestinian etc.) and

4. What the things are you love. (E.g. Music, Sports, Games, Art etc.)

5. Now you can browse Pandastripes and look for people with your passions, who are on the other side of the conflict group

6. Meet them, hang out with them, play games with them, do whatever you both love and make the world a little bit better and the conflict a little bit less bad. 

You already know that they like the same stuff as you do. And you already know that they are people who are fed up with hatred and want to reach out and make friends too.

The beauty is that you don’t even have to go out of your way to make the world a better place. You just do what you love and what you would do anyway, just with unlikely people.


What your contribution will bring:

I need the funding to create this social network.The money is mostly needed for building the platform and keeping it running. But also to give it a good start, do promotion and get the word out.

This project has the potential to change the world to the better, one friendship at a time.

A good start is immensely important as the website is nothing without the people who believe in the idea. 

This project will be a nonprofit, so there is not really anything produced. But you will still get some cool perks.

First of course you get an awesome website where you can find cool people to do the things you love with and make the world a better place while you do it.

That something huh?

The Website will be completely free of course when it’s done. But there will be paid supporter accounts which have a few different options like changing their profile site in different ways to make it look cooler.

As a perk for this campaign you can get a yearly and an eternal supporter account!

You can also grab some of the limited supporter shirts as well. You will even be able to select what motive you want. It will star our super cute mascot (Hint: It’s not a giraffe)


Risks and Challanges:

There are not too many risks since it’s a pretty straightforward project.  The only question is: Will people care?

Panda stands and falls with the people. If nobody wants to reach out and help other people, then we got a problem. But hey you are still here. And you read this far. So it seems people are interested. I´m sure it’s not just you ;)

An important aspect is to get the word out as quickly and good as possible. To draw as much people to Pandastripes as possible. I contacted several media outlets and planned for additional marketing if necessary in the budget. I think we have a good chance to make it big. 


Other ways you can help:

If you like the idea but you don’t have money to help, I understand. But there are many other things you could do to help out.

First of all: Tell people! Send this site to all the people that might be interested, that would be a huge help!

If you want to help in a different way, you are a programmer or a design artist or anything else that could help or you just want to give me a motivational pat on the back don’t hesitate and contact me at:

Ben@Pandastripes.org :)

Donate a little and get a cool perk!
Let’s make the world a better place.
Friendship by friendship :)

Ben.

#Crowdfundworldpeace
@pandastripes
www.Pandastripes.org




Deutsche Beschreibung:


Was ist Pandastripes.Org ?


Hey du! Ja, genau du! Willst du die Welt in einen besseren Ort verwandeln, wo Menschen sich gegenseitig helfen anstatt sich zu hassen? 

Sehr gut! Denn das kannst du jetzt, mithilfe von Pandastripes!

Also was genau ist jetzt dieses “Pandastripes.Org”?

Es ist so etwas wie eine Mischung aus einem Sozialen Netzwerk und einer Website um neue Freunde kennen zu lernen, so etwas wie eine Dating Seite aber nicht nur für Dating sondern für alle Arten von Freunden…….und für Weltfrieden. 

Es ist eine Online-Plattform für einzelne Menschen die auf verschiedenen Seiten eines großen Konfliktes stehen, den sie beide beenden möchten. Auf Pandastripes.org bringen wir beide Seiten zusammen, um Freundschaften zu schließen und Konflikte abzubauen.

Okay okay, lass mich von Anfang an erklären!

Ich heiße Ben und ich bin überzeugt davon dass die Welt ein viel schönerer Ort sein könnte als sie es im Moment ist.

Wenn man die Nachrichten schaut sind es in der Regel keine guten Nachrichten.
Wir Menschen behandeln uns gegenseitig ziemlich schlecht, es schein so als würden wir jeden Grund den wir nutzen können dafür nutzen uns gegenseitig zu hassen.  

Brandanschläge auf Flüchtlingsunterkünfte in Deutschland,

Christen diskriminieren Schwule und Lesben in den USA,

oder der ewige Konflikt im mittleren Osten.

Nur um einige der unendlich vielen Konflikte zu nennen.


Ich würde gerne die Welt in eine bessere verändern und mit deiner Hilfe können wir das schaffen. Und um dies zu tun können wir uns nicht auf die Regierung oder Organisationen verlassen. Eine bessere Welt fängt mit jedem von uns an!

Jeder Konflikt hat 2 Seiten die sich "bekämpfen". Zum Beispiel die die ich weiter oben genannt habe.  (Christen und Schwule, “besorgte” Bürger und Flüchtlinge, Israelis und Palästinenser, so ziemlich jede Religion und  jede andere Religion, usw usw. Du weißt was ich meine.)

Die Leute die diese Konflikte wollen sind die die davon profitieren, Extremisten und Mitläufer. Aber diese Leute sind nicht die Mehrheit sondern lediglich die die am lautesten schreien.

Es gibt eine große Anzahl von Menschen die genug haben von diesen ewigen Konflikten und diesem ewigen Hass. Menschen die sich die Hände reichen wollen und endlich Frieden schließen. Und diese Menschen gibt es auf beiden Seiten eines Konfliktes.

Ich will diese Menschen zusammen bringen, mit Pandastripes. 

Pandastripes ist ein Soziales Netzwerk welches Menschen die genug von einem Konflikt haben  verbindet, damit diese eine Freundschaft aufbauen können, und die Welt damit ein bisschen friedlicher machen. 

Das Tolle daran ist, man muss nicht mal irgendetwas anderes machen muss um die Welt zu verbessern, nur das  was man auch so tun würde. Diesmal tut man es einfach nur mit anderen Menschen.

Ein Fußballfan kann mit einem Flüchtling der Fußball genauso liebt die Weltmeisterschaft anschauen gehen.

Ein schwuler Gitarrist kann einen Christlichen Bassisten finden um mit ihm zusammen Musik zu machen.

Ein Israelischer Künstler kann sich mit einem Palästinensischen Künstler zusammentun um ein tolles Projekt zu erschaffen.

Natürlich limitiert sich Pandastripes nicht nur auf diese Konflikte. Pandastripes kann dazu genutzt werden jeden Konflikt zu überbrücken den es gibt.

Mit Pandastripes kannst du neue Leute kennenlernen, mit ihnen zusammen dass tun was du liebst, und dabei die Welt zum besseren verändern. Ziemlich cool oder?


Warum es funktionieren wird:

Große Konflikte haben für gewöhnlich eine „Wir“ gegen „Die“ Struktur.

(In der Sozialpsychologie nennt man das “Wir” die Eigengruppe und das “Die” die Fremdgruppe) 

Menschen neigen dazu sich zu Menschen hingezogen zu fühlen und diese besser zu bewerten wenn sie diese als Mitglied der eigenen Gruppe betrachten. (Ingroup Favouritism). Und sich bedroht zu fühlen von Menschen die sie nicht als Mitglied der eigenen Gruppe empfinden. (Outgroup Derogation)

Mit Pandastripes schwächen wir diese Dynamik indem wir den Menschen zeigen dass diese Leute aus der anderen Gruppe eigentlich genau so sind wie wir.

Das Problem mit diesen Konflikten ist das wir uns nur auf die große Gruppe in der wir sind Konzentrieren anstatt auf die vielen kleinen Gruppen in denen wir ebenfalls sind. Ich bin ein junger Deutscher der gerne Computerspiele spielt, ich habe vermutlich mehr mit einem jungen Syrer der gerne Computerspiele spielt (oder spielte) zu tun als mit Wolfgang Schäuble. Obwohl der Wolfgang und ich aus derselben Gegend kommen.

Warum konzentrieren wir uns dann auf die großen Gruppen die so viel weniger über uns aussagen. Es macht keinen Sinn. Wir sind Teil von so vielen Gruppen. Gamer, Musiker, Hobbyköche und und und. Warum trennen wir uns über große Gruppen?

Mit Pandastripes.Org will ich diese Kluft die durch große Gruppen zwischen uns entsteht überwinden indem ich Menschen aus der gleichen (kleinen) Gruppe zusammen bringe.

Wenn wir viele kleine Brücken bauen, zwischen Musikern, Künstlern, Gamern, Sportfans usw. Dann wird uns das näher zusammenbringen und wir können Stück für Stück Konflikte bewältige.

Hier ist noch etwas Interessantes:

Wusstest du das viele Studien gezeigt haben das Menschen die jemanden kennen der Homosexuell ist wesentlich seltener Schwule diskriminieren.

Das ist natürlich nur logisch. Die andere Gruppe ist jetzt nichtmehr eine Anonyme namen- und gesichtslose „böse“ Gruppe zu der man keinen Bezug hat. Wenn du jemanden aus der Gruppe kennst den du magst, dann ist die Fremdgruppe gar nicht mehr so fremd.


Wie Pandastripes funktioniert:

Wie schon erwähnt wird Pandastripes.Org eine Mischung aus Sozialem Netzwerk und einer Seite um neue Leute kennen zu lernen. Mit dem Unterschied das Panda darauf abzielt das diese neuen Leute von der anderen Seite eines Konfliktes kommen.
Also wenn du jemandem die Hand reichen willst um einen Konflikt zu beenden ist das jetzt einfacher als je zuvor:

1. Du erstellst einen Account auf Pandastripes.org

2. Du erstellst ein Profil und erzählst etwas über dich und…

3. gibst an auf welcher Seite du von welchem Konflikt stehst (z.B. Bürger oder Flüchtling, Christ oder Homosexuell, Israeli oder Palästinenser etc.) danach…

4. Was die Dinge sind die du Liebst. (z.B. Musik, Sport, Games, Kunst etc.)

5. Jetzt kannst schon losgehen, du kannst auf Pandastripes Leute suchen die deine Interessen teilen und auf der anderen Seite des Konfliktes sind. 

6. Triff dich mit ihnen und tut was ihr beide gern macht, schaut das Fußballspiel, macht eine Lanparty, macht Musik, was immer es auch ist, tut es und sorgt dafür dass die Welt dabei ein Stück näher zusammen rückt. Ganz automatisch.

Du weißt schon von vorneherein das die Leute das gleiche toll finden wie du und das sie auch die Hand ausstrecken. Du musst sie nur noch nehmen.

Und dann musst du nicht mal etwas tun was du nicht sowieso schon tun würdest. Du machst etwas das du liebst mit neuen Freunden.


Was dein Beitrag erreichen wird:

Ich brauche Unterstützung um Pandastripes Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen.

Das Geld wird hauptsächlich dafür benötigt die Plattform im Web zu schaffen und sie am Laufen zu halten. Aber auch um Panda einen guten Start zu ermöglichen. Also z.B. für eventuell nötige Werbung.

Das Projekt hat das Potential die Welt zum Bessern zu verändern. Ein guter Start ist immens wichtig denn die Website wird nur so stark werden wie die Leute die sich uns anschließen.

Das Projekt ist gemeinnützig. D.h. Es wird nichts Produziert. Trotzdem wird es ein paar coole Perks geben wenn ihr Panda unterstützt.

Hier ist was ihr bekommen könnt:

Zuerst einmal eine Hammer Website wo ihr coole Leute treffen könnt und mit ihnen die Dinge tun die ihr gerne tut. Und dabei ganz nebenbei die Welt verbessern.

Das ist doch schon mal was, oder? 

Wenn Pandastripes online ist wird es selbstverständlich komplett kostenlos sein. Aber um unsere Kosten zu decken wird es Unterstützer-Accounts geben. Diese werden zusätzliche Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten Ihres Profils haben.

Hier könnt ihr jährliche und sogar lebenslange Support-Accounts bekommen.

Außerdem könnt ihr begrenzt erhältliche Supporter-Shirts bekommen. Ihr könnt euch sogar das Motiv aussuchen. Darauf wird unser super süßes Maskottchen zu sehen sein (Pro Tipp: ich verrate noch nicht was es ist, aber es ist keine Giraffe)


Risiken und Nebenwirkungen:

Es gibt nicht viele Risiken da die Plattform Idee eigentlich recht einfach ist. Die einzige Frage ist: Wird sich jemand dafür interessieren? Gibt es genug Leute die sich die Hände reichen wollen?

Panda steht und fällt mit den Leuten. Falls niemand die Welt zu einem besseren Ort machen will haben wir ein Problem. Aber wenn man sich die Hilfsbereitschaft die die deutsche Bevölkerung den Flüchtlingen entgegen gebracht hat anschaut denke ich es gibt genug gute Menschen. Und außerdem hast du auch schon so weit nach unten gelesen, du bist bestimmt nicht der einzige ;)

Ein wichtiger Aspekt für den Erfolg von Panda ist es, es bekannt zu machen. Menschen müssen wissen was Pandastripes.Org ist und das sie hier anderen die Hand reichen können. Um Pandastripes so bekannt wie möglich zu machen habe ich mehrere Pressestellen kontaktiert, sowohl konventionelle als auch im Internet. Außerdem habe ich im Budget für eventuell nötiges Marketing geplant.


Andere Wege zu helfen:

Vielleicht findest du die Idee klasse, hast aber nicht viel Geld. Kein Problem, es gibt andere Möglichkeiten wie du helfen kannst:

Zu aller erst: Rede darüber! Sende diese Seite allen Leuten die sich dafür interessieren könnten.

Das kostet dich nichts, hilft uns aber extrem weiter. Wenn du aktiv mithelfen möchtest, und du ein Programmierer, Designer oder irgendwas anderes bist das helfen könnte, oder du mir auch nur sagen möchtest was du über Pandastripes denkst (oder du einfach nur „Hi“ sagen willst) , zögere nicht mir zu schreiben :


Ben@Pandastripes.org :)

Lass uns die Welt ein wenig besser machen,

Eine Freundschaft nach der anderen,

Ben.

#Crowdfundworldpeace
@pandastripes

www.Pandastripes.org

Click here for -> German <- hier gehts zur deutschen Beschreibung

What is Pandastripes.Org ? 


Hey you. Yes you! 

Do you want to be a hero and make the world a better place, a place where
people help each other and don`t hate each other? 

Awesome! You can do that now! With Pandastripes!

a website to meet new friends, kind of like a dating site, but for all kinds of

The people who want those conflicts are the people who benefit from them. But
they are just the ones who are the loudest.
There is a great amount of people who are fed up with all that hate, who
want to reach out, build bridges instead of walls and create peace. 
And those people who put their hands out and reach out to each other are on both
sides of the conflict. 

I want to help them connect with Pandastripes.  Pandastripes is a
social network that connects people from two sides of a conflict to form
friendships and make a difference. 

The awesome part about this is, you don’t even have to go out of your way to
make a difference. You just do what you love to do anyway. But this time you do
it with people who love the same things as you but happen to be at the other
side of the conflict. 

A football fan can look for an asylum seeker or Immigrant who shares his
passion and watch the game together.

A gay guitar player can find a christian bass player to jam together. 

An Israeli artist can find a Palestinian artist to do a project together. 

Of course this is not only limited to those conflicts, you can use Pandastripes
for every conflict you want. 

With Pandastripes you can meet new people, do what you love, and make the world
a better place. Pretty awesome right? 

Why it will work: 

Big conflicts usually have a narrative of "US" vs
"Them"
(In social psychology it’s called Ingroup and Outgroup)  
We tend to have an affinity towards people we perceive as from the same
group as us (ingroup favoritism) and we feel threatened by people we perceive
as not from the same group (outgroup derogation). 
The problem with all those big conflicts is that we just focus on the
one big group we are part of, instead of all the tiny other groups. 
Yes you may be a Christian, but you are also so much more, a musician, a
gamer and so on. Yet we seem to forget that when it comes to big conflicts. 
With Panda we want to bridge that gap and make you focus more on the
little groups you are part of. (Because guess what, if you are a 24 year old
who loves video games you will have more in common with a 24 year old immigrant
who shares your passion than with let’s say, your head of state) 
If we focus more on the little groups we are part of, many little bridges
can be build, which bring us closer together and weaken big conflicts. 
Another interesting point is that studies show that if a person knows someone
who is gay he is tremendously less likely to discriminate against people with a
different sexual orientation. 
That makes of course perfect sense. Since the other group is not a
nameless, faceless group he can’t connect with. He now knows someone of that
group who he likes. So the outgroup is not an outgroup anymore.
How it works:  

As mentioned Pandastripes.org will be a mix of social network and a site to
meet new people (think of a dating side but not only for dating but for
friends, sports partners, bandmates and all different sorts of people) with the
twist that it focuses on people who are on different sides of a conflict. 

So if you want to reach out it’s easy: 

1. you create an account on Pandastripes.org

2. You create your page with your information and

3. Tell us which conflict-group you are part of (e.g. Native or Immigrant,
Christian or Gay, Israeli or Palestinian etc.) and 

4. What the things are you love. (E.g. Music, Sports, Games, Art etc.) 

5. Now you can browse Pandastripes and look for people with your passions, who
are on the other side of the conflict group

6. Meet them, hang out with them, play games with them, do whatever you both
love and make the world a little bit better and the conflict a little bit less
bad.  

You already know that they like the same stuff as you do. And you already know
that they are people who are fed up with hatred and want to reach out and make
friends too. 

The beauty is that you don’t even have to go out of your way to make the world
a better place. You just do what you love and what you would do anyway, just
with unlikely people. 
What your contribution will
bring: 

I need the funding to create this social network.The money is mostly needed for building the platform and keeping it
running. But also to give it a good start, do promotion and get the word out. 

This project has the potential to change the world to the better, one
friendship at a time. 
A good start is immensely important as the website is nothing without
the people who believe in the idea.  
This project will be a nonprofit, so there is not really anything
produced. But you will still get some cool perks. 
First of course you get an awesome website where you can find cool
people to do the things you love with and make the world a better place while
you do it. 
That something huh? 
The Website will be completely free of course when it’s done. But there
will be paid supporter accounts which have a few different options like
changing their profile site in different ways to make it look cooler. 
As a perk for this campaign you can get a yearly and an eternal
supporter account! 
You can also grab some of the limited supporter shirts as well. You will
even be able to select what motive you want. It will star our super cute mascot
(Hint: It’s not a giraffe) 
Risks and Challanges: 

There are not too many risks since it’s a pretty straightforward
project.  The only question is: Will people care? 
Panda stands and falls with the people. If nobody wants to reach out and
help other people, then we got a problem. But hey you are still here. And you
read this far. So it seems people are interested. I´m sure it’s not just you ;)

An important aspect is to get the word out as quickly and good as
possible. To draw as much people to Pandastripes as possible. I contacted
several media outlets and planned for additional marketing if necessary in the
budget. I think we have a good chance to make it big.  
Other ways you can help:  



If you like the idea but you don’t have money to help, I understand. But there
are many other things you could do to help out. 

First of all: Tell people! Send this site to all the people that might be
interested, that would be a huge help! 

If you want to help in a different way, you are a programmer or a design artist
or anything else that could help or you just want to give me a motivational pat
on the back don’t hesitate and contact me at: 

Ben@Pandastripes.org :) 
Donate a little and get a cool perk! 
Let’s make the world a better place. 
Friendship by friendship :) 

Ben. 

#Crowdfundworldpeace 
@pandastripeswww.Pandastripes.org

Deutsche Beschreibung:


Was ist Pandastripes.Org ? 


Hey du! Ja, genau du! Willst du die Welt in einen besseren Ort
verwandeln, wo Menschen sich gegenseitig helfen anstatt sich zu hassen? 
Sehr gut! Denn das kannst du jetzt, mithilfe von Pandastripes! 
Also was genau ist jetzt dieses “Pandastripes.Org”? 
Es ist so etwas wie eine Mischung aus einem Sozialen Netzwerk und
einer Website um neue Freunde kennen zu lernen, so etwas wie eine Dating Seite
aber nicht nur für Dating sondern für alle Arten von Freunden…….und für
Weltfrieden. 
Es ist eine Online-Plattform für einzelne Menschen die auf verschiedenen
Seiten eines großen Konfliktes stehen, den sie beide beenden möchten. Auf
Pandastripes.org bringen wir beide Seiten zusammen, um Freundschaften zu
schließen und Konflikte abzubauen. 
Okay okay, lass mich von Anfang an erklären! 
Ich heiße Ben und ich bin überzeugt davon dass die Welt ein viel
schönerer Ort sein könnte als sie es im Moment ist. 
Wenn man die Nachrichten schaut sind es in der Regel keine guten
Nachrichten. 
Wir Menschen behandeln uns gegenseitig ziemlich schlecht, es schein so als
würden wir jeden Grund den wir nutzen können dafür nutzen uns gegenseitig zu
hassen.   

Brandanschläge auf Flüchtlingsunterkünfte in Deutschland,
Christen diskriminieren Schwule und Lesben in den USA, 
oder der ewige Konflikt im mittleren Osten.
Nur um einige der unendlich vielen Konflikte zu nennen. 


Ich würde gerne die Welt in eine bessere verändern und mit deiner
Hilfe können wir das schaffen. Und um dies zu tun können wir uns nicht auf die
Regierung oder Organisationen verlassen. Eine bessere Welt fängt mit jedem von
uns an! 
Jeder Konflikt hat 2 Seiten die sich "bekämpfen". Zum Beispiel
die die ich weiter oben genannt habe.  (Christen und Schwule, “besorgte”
Bürger und Flüchtlinge, Israelis und Palästinenser, so ziemlich jede Religion
und  jede andere Religion, usw usw. Du weißt was ich meine.) 

Die Leute die diese Konflikte wollen sind die die davon profitieren,
Extremisten und Mitläufer. Aber diese Leute sind nicht die Mehrheit sondern
lediglich die die am lautesten schreien.
Es gibt eine große Anzahl von Menschen die genug haben von diesen ewigen
Konflikten und diesem ewigen Hass. Menschen die sich die Hände reichen wollen
und endlich Frieden schließen. Und diese Menschen gibt es auf beiden Seiten eines
Konfliktes. 
Ich will diese Menschen zusammen bringen, mit Pandastripes. 
Pandastripes ist ein Soziales Netzwerk welches Menschen die genug von
einem Konflikt haben  verbindet, damit diese eine Freundschaft aufbauen
können, und die Welt damit ein bisschen friedlicher machen.  
Das Tolle daran ist, man muss nicht mal irgendetwas anderes machen muss um die
Welt zu verbessern, nur das  was man auch so tun würde. Diesmal tut man es einfach
nur mit anderen Menschen. 
Ein Fußballfan kann mit einem Flüchtling der Fußball genauso liebt die
Weltmeisterschaft anschauen gehen. 
Ein schwuler Gitarrist kann einen Christlichen Bassisten finden um mit
ihm zusammen Musik zu machen. 
Ein Israelischer Künstler kann sich mit einem Palästinensischen Künstler
zusammentun um ein tolles Projekt zu erschaffen. 
Natürlich limitiert sich Pandastripes nicht nur auf diese Konflikte.
Pandastripes kann dazu genutzt werden jeden Konflikt zu überbrücken den es
gibt. 
Mit Pandastripes kannst du neue Leute kennenlernen, mit ihnen zusammen
dass tun was du liebst, und dabei die Welt zum besseren verändern. Ziemlich
cool oder? 

Warum es funktionieren wird: 

Große Konflikte haben für gewöhnlich eine „Wir“ gegen „Die“ Struktur.
(In der Sozialpsychologie nennt man das “Wir” die Eigengruppe und das
“Die” die Fremdgruppe) 
Menschen neigen dazu sich zu Menschen hingezogen zu fühlen und diese
besser zu bewerten wenn sie diese als Mitglied der eigenen Gruppe betrachten.
(Ingroup Favouritism). Und sich bedroht zu fühlen von Menschen die sie nicht
als Mitglied der eigenen Gruppe empfinden. (Outgroup Derogation) 
Mit Pandastripes schwächen wir diese Dynamik indem wir den Menschen
zeigen dass diese Leute aus der anderen Gruppe eigentlich genau so sind wie
wir. 
Das Problem mit diesen Konflikten ist das wir uns nur auf die große
Gruppe in der wir sind Konzentrieren anstatt auf die vielen kleinen Gruppen in
denen wir ebenfalls sind. Ich bin ein junger Deutscher der gerne Computerspiele
spielt, ich habe vermutlich mehr mit einem jungen Syrer der gerne
Computerspiele spielt (oder spielte) zu tun als mit Wolfgang Schäuble. Obwohl
der Wolfgang und ich aus derselben Gegend kommen. 
Warum konzentrieren wir uns dann auf die großen Gruppen die so viel
weniger über uns aussagen. Es macht keinen Sinn. Wir sind Teil von so vielen
Gruppen. Gamer, Musiker, Hobbyköche und und und. Warum trennen wir uns über
große Gruppen? 
Mit Pandastripes.Org will ich diese Kluft die durch große Gruppen
zwischen uns entsteht überwinden indem ich Menschen aus der gleichen (kleinen)
Gruppe zusammen bringe. 
Wenn wir viele kleine Brücken bauen, zwischen Musikern, Künstlern, Gamern,
Sportfans usw. Dann wird uns das näher zusammenbringen und wir können Stück für
Stück Konflikte bewältige. 
Hier ist noch etwas Interessantes: 
Wusstest du das viele Studien gezeigt haben das Menschen die jemanden
kennen der Homosexuell ist wesentlich seltener Schwule diskriminieren.
Das ist natürlich nur logisch. Die andere Gruppe ist jetzt nichtmehr
eine Anonyme namen- und gesichtslose „böse“ Gruppe zu der man keinen Bezug hat.
Wenn du jemanden aus der Gruppe kennst den du magst, dann ist die Fremdgruppe
gar nicht mehr so fremd. 

Wie Pandastripes funktioniert: 

Wie schon erwähnt wird Pandastripes.Org eine Mischung aus Sozialem
Netzwerk und einer Seite um neue Leute kennen zu lernen. Mit dem Unterschied
das Panda darauf abzielt das diese neuen Leute von der anderen Seite eines
Konfliktes kommen. 
Also wenn du jemandem die Hand reichen willst um einen Konflikt zu beenden ist
das jetzt einfacher als je zuvor: 

1. Du erstellst einen Account auf Pandastripes.org

2. Du erstellst ein Profil und erzählst etwas über dich und…

3. gibst an auf welcher Seite du von welchem Konflikt stehst (z.B. Bürger oder
Flüchtling, Christ oder Homosexuell, Israeli oder Palästinenser etc.) danach…

4. Was die Dinge sind die du Liebst. (z.B. Musik, Sport, Games, Kunst etc.) 

5. Jetzt kannst schon losgehen, du kannst auf Pandastripes Leute suchen die
deine Interessen teilen und auf der anderen Seite des Konfliktes sind. 
6. Triff dich mit ihnen und tut was ihr beide gern macht, schaut das Fußballspiel,
macht eine Lanparty, macht Musik, was immer es auch ist, tut es und sorgt dafür
dass die Welt dabei ein Stück näher zusammen rückt. Ganz automatisch.
Du weißt schon von vorneherein das die Leute das gleiche toll finden wie
du und das sie auch die Hand ausstrecken. Du musst sie nur noch nehmen. 
Und dann musst du nicht mal etwas tun was du nicht sowieso schon tun
würdest. Du machst etwas das du liebst mit neuen Freunden. 

Was dein Beitrag erreichen wird: 

Ich brauche Unterstützung um Pandastripes Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen.

Das Geld wird hauptsächlich dafür benötigt die Plattform im Web zu
schaffen und sie am Laufen zu halten. Aber auch um Panda einen guten Start zu
ermöglichen. Also z.B. für eventuell nötige Werbung. 
Das Projekt hat das Potential die Welt zum Bessern zu verändern. Ein
guter Start ist immens wichtig denn die Website wird nur so stark werden wie
die Leute die sich uns anschließen.
Das Projekt ist gemeinnützig. D.h. Es wird nichts Produziert. Trotzdem
wird es ein paar coole Perks geben wenn ihr Panda unterstützt. 
Hier ist was ihr bekommen könnt: 
Zuerst einmal eine Hammer Website wo ihr coole Leute treffen könnt und
mit ihnen die Dinge tun die ihr gerne tut. Und dabei ganz nebenbei die Welt
verbessern. 
Das ist doch schon mal was, oder? 
Wenn Pandastripes online ist wird es selbstverständlich komplett
kostenlos sein. Aber um unsere Kosten zu decken wird es Unterstützer-Accounts
geben. Diese werden zusätzliche Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten Ihres Profils haben.
Hier könnt ihr jährliche und sogar lebenslange Support-Accounts
bekommen.
Außerdem könnt ihr begrenzt erhältliche Supporter-Shirts bekommen. Ihr
könnt euch sogar das Motiv aussuchen. Darauf wird unser super süßes Maskottchen
zu sehen sein (Pro Tipp: ich verrate noch nicht was es ist, aber es ist keine
Giraffe) 

Risiken und Nebenwirkungen: 

Es gibt nicht viele Risiken da die Plattform Idee eigentlich recht
einfach ist. Die einzige Frage ist: Wird sich jemand dafür interessieren? Gibt
es genug Leute die sich die Hände reichen wollen? 
Panda steht und fällt mit den Leuten. Falls niemand die Welt zu einem
besseren Ort machen will haben wir ein Problem. Aber wenn man sich die
Hilfsbereitschaft die die deutsche Bevölkerung den Flüchtlingen entgegen
gebracht hat anschaut denke ich es gibt genug gute Menschen. Und außerdem hast
du auch schon so weit nach unten gelesen, du bist bestimmt nicht der einzige ;)

Ein wichtiger Aspekt für den Erfolg von Panda ist es, es bekannt zu
machen. Menschen müssen wissen was Pandastripes.Org ist und das sie hier
anderen die Hand reichen können. Um Pandastripes so bekannt wie möglich zu
machen habe ich mehrere Pressestellen kontaktiert, sowohl konventionelle als
auch im Internet. Außerdem habe ich im Budget für eventuell nötiges Marketing
geplant. 

Andere Wege zu helfen: 

Vielleicht findest du die Idee klasse, hast aber nicht viel Geld. Kein Problem,
es gibt andere Möglichkeiten wie du helfen kannst: 
Zu aller erst: Rede darüber! Sende diese Seite allen Leuten die sich
dafür interessieren könnten. 
Das kostet dich nichts, hilft uns aber extrem weiter. Wenn du aktiv
mithelfen möchtest, und du ein Programmierer, Designer oder irgendwas anderes
bist das helfen könnte, oder du mir auch nur sagen möchtest was du über
Pandastripes denkst (oder du einfach nur „Hi“ sagen willst) , zögere nicht mir
zu schreiben : 

Ben@Pandastripes.org :) 

Lass uns die Welt ein wenig besser machen, 
Eine Freundschaft nach der anderen, 

Ben. 

#Crowdfundworldpeace 
@pandastripes
www.Pandastripes.org

story:
Short Summary

Once Upon A Sleepover is a sleepover planning and rental service that was started in Buffalo, NY last May. We had just one goal at that time and that to provide children an amazing sleepover. With our tents, lights, trays, and decor we wanted to make sure everyone could have the ultimate sleepover experience. This business started off as just a dream for us and has grown as the months went by making this our reality. With the help of my family, friends, and social media following Once Upon A Sleepover was born and sleepovers will NEVER be the same. Our first party launched May 5th, 2017 and went viral in two days. So far we have done over 60 parties since opening. We have even been featured on Yahoo!, BuzzFeed, The Talk of Alabama and a few other places.  We have reached all of our short term goals thus far and now need your help reaching our final goal. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help of turning our dream of having a physical location into a reality! We believe all children should experience the joy of a sleepover at least once in their lifetime. We have turned the concept of a sleepover around and supersized it. Providing the decor, bedding, and all you need to have the sleepover of your dreams, is what makes Once Upon A Sleepover an easy party option for parents. Once Upon A Sleepover was created by moms to help other parents relax and while we create sweet dreams and memories for you and your child. 

Right now our biggest obstacle is finding a venue for our parents to host our amazing sleepovers. Currently we use hotels and often times we have to move the furniture, are not allowed to set up due to hotel policies, the space is not big enough, or parents are not able to afford the party and additional cost for the hotel. Sometimes parents will have the space in their house, but after moving the furniture around it makes getting around for activities hard. 

Our dream and solution to our biggest problem (customers not having space) is just a simple fix. We need a building! With your donations Once Upon A Sleepover will be able to lease commercial space, not only giving our customers an affordable space to host their sleepovers, but also helping one of our dreams come become reality. Having a space to host sleepovers will reduce stress, be more cost effective, and provide a space for us to host other children themed events such as etiquette classes. 

Your donation will go to the lease of this beautiful we have fallen in love with. It will also help to furnish this space to make it our own. The remaining funds will go to the first few months of bills we will now be responsible like gas, electric, and insurance. Any donation is appreciated and will go 100 % into our business growth. 

For helping us obtain our goal we have several perks available like Once Upon A Sleepover water bottles, T-Shirts, VIP tickets to our grand opening, and more. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and we understand that! You can still help by spreading the word and sharing this campaign on your social media sites. We appreciate even the smallest gesture.

story:
Creating a Business out of my Passion 

I want to create something from nothing! 
My passion is making videos and in the past 1,5 years, I've managed to generate over 6 million views on my YouTube channel (youtube.com/applepieofficial) and I would like to grow my passion into a larger business.

For this to happen I need my own studio and headquarters to host my operations. 

In this new studio I will be able to generate daily content in 2 languages (English and Hungarian) for two youtube channels that are related to technology, also boost my video production agency's sales and generate more leads and potential customers.

This unique studio will help me create unique and engaging videos for new and returning customers. 

My 3 YouTube channels:

  1. Apple PIE (youtube.com/applepieofficial) – Tech channel in Hungarian with 60,000 Subscribers
  2. Joe Ritter (youtube.com/joeritter) Personal English Youtube channel with 10,000 Subscribers
  3. BROduction (youtube.com/broductionbp) Professional video production agency 

While currently Apple PIE the second largest tech channel in Hungary. I plan to make videos on all three channels.

Creating videos and professional advertisements, mood videos is also a goal and this studio will help generate interest towards that company. Currently, we have 8 clients to who we generate engaging videos on a monthly basis. 

 

WHY WE NEED A NEW STUDIO?

In order to create cool and engaging content, a studio and HQ has to be set up where we can generate and edit all the content. 

  • I have decided to move my studio to my family and to my hometown Székesfehérvár
  • In the new studio there is a possibility to have 10 different locations, green screen environment, and unique recording and photo booths to help diversify our portfolio and have more clients, create cool looking youtube videos and continue the growth of the channels. 

I am asking for help online because in Hungary there are not many possibilities for young entrepreneurs to get sponsored in the beginning phase of their business. I have already put all of my savings to create my dream studio because I believe there is much potential in this region and there is a high demand for video region. 

We need $10,000 for:

  • Finishing the upgrades on the electrical system in the house to make the environment safe.
  • The house was built in the 1980's and there had to be many renovations done with the walls and ceiling. The floor has yet to be completed and an evenly level floor is needed for the carpets to be sufficiently placed down. 
  • Currently, there is no heating and we would need electrical heaters along with an AC to keep the temperature at a comfortable level all year round. It is important if we have clients or businesses coming over to do video or photo shoots in a comfortable environment. 
  • Custom tables and desks are necessary to fit into the corners and the designs to make whole room look appealing and 'video worthy' 
  • Decorations and minor equipment upgrades are necessary to have the best results in video production.
  • We would need a green screen area to be placed on the main walls so we can fulfill any kinds of video requirements. 

The Impact

With your contribution I will be able to:

  • Generate content daily for my followers in two languages
  • I will be able to educate my audience with propres how to videos
  • I will be able to soley focus on my passion wich is my business
  • I will be able to create new jobs in my hometown and hire young and talented staff whose passion is creating videos.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot support me financially, sharing this site and my video helps me promote my objective and reach a larger audience. EVERY SHARE COUNTS!

Thank you for your time and hope to see you in the next video!

The house was built in the 1980's and there had to be many renovations done with the walls and ceiling. The floor has yet to be completed and an evenly level floor is needed for the carpets to be sufficiently placed down. 
Currently, there is no heating and we would need electrical heaters along with an AC to keep the temperature at a comfortable level all year round. It is important if we have clients or businesses coming over to do video or photo shoots in a comfortable environment. 
Custom tables and desks are necessary to fit into the corners and the designs to make whole room look appealing and 'video worthy' 
Decorations and minor equipment upgrades are necessary to have the best results in video production.
We would need a green screen area to be placed on the main walls so we can fulfill any kinds of video requirements. 


The Impact
With your contribution I will be able to:

Generate content daily for my followers in two languages
I will be able to educate my audience with propres how to videos
I will be able to soley focus on my passion wich is my business
I will be able to create new jobs in my hometown and hire young and talented staff whose passion is creating videos.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot support me financially, sharing this site and my video helps me promote my objective and reach a larger audience. EVERY SHARE COUNTS!
Thank you for your time and hope to see you in the next video!

story: Greetings and welcome to Black-Owned Excellence, a website that is dedicated to promoting and providing a business advertising platform exclusively for members of the African Diaspora. Our central goal is to provide networking resources to those individuals who own and operate small- to medium-sized businesses. We will give them the tools they need so that they can engage with their communities and other business leaders to strengthen the impact of the Black Dollar both here in the United States and all corners of the globe. By centralizing a Diasporic professional community, it is our goal to have businesses join our network and enlist their colleagues to join as well, thereby creating a global marketplace for promoting and supporting Black-Owned Businesses. Our team of dedicated professionals look forward to being of service to you, and we look forward to helping our fellow business owners reach across industry and distance to lift each other up and push for continued Black-Owned Excellence.

story:
COCOA4ACAUSE

Cocoa4aCause is a food truck that travels far and wide serving deliciously fresh hot chocolate, doing good at every stop. Help us, help you, help us, help others :-D

 

WAYS WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE

  • WHY EVERY SIP COUNTS

What makes Cocoa4aCause special is our drive for giving back and making a difference. With each and every purchase you customers make a portion of the proceeds are donated to the charity of your choice, ALWAYS!

The charity foundations we sponsor have been chosen specifically because they have been ranked with a perfect score by charitynavigator.org. "The exceptional charities on this list execute their missions in a fiscally responsible way while adhering to good governance and other best practices that minimize the chance of unethical activities. Each has earned perfect scores for its financial health and its accountability & transparency. Those two scores then translate into a perfect 100 point overall score. Less than one percent of the thousands of charities rated by Charity Navigator have earned perfect scores.”        

We commend these charitable foundations for exceeding the industry standards and hope to help raise funds and awareness for their cause.

  • CUPSGIVING

Every year around Thanksgiving we like to celebrate a little something we like to call “CupsGiving” where customers can fill one of our Cocoa4aCause cups with small toys, useful items, or gift cards to be delivered around the world to those in need of warmth and wishes through out the holidays.

  • RINSE AND RECYCLE

Our Cocoa4aCause trucks come specially equipped with rinse and recycle stations accessible to you, the customer and good Samaritan.  Use these stations to rinse off your Cocoa4aCause cups and utensils and send them straight to the recycling plant where they can be repurposed instead of added to a landfill. 

  • PROTESTING WITH OUR DOLLAR

We believe protesting with our dollar inspires change for the better in our world. That’s why every product we purchase and sell is done so thoughtfully. Good food + good actions.

 

THE DIFFERENCE IN OUR FOOD

  • ORGANIC/FAIR-TRADE/LOCALLY SOURCED

As mentioned above, protesting with our dollar can set a good example and make change a reality. That’s why our products always strive to taste scrumptious, be sumptuous, with a side of good moral compass….sense of justice….greater purpose…..or….well you get the  idea.

  • IN ADDITION, NUTRITION

Since we’re in the rhyming mood let’s talk about how in addition, we offer nutrition. Finding convenient healthy snacks can be difficult especially for children. Well we have some options that are tried, tested, and approved by my own picky eaters. Look for our Cup-O-Salad, Cup-O-Veggies, Cup-O-Fruit, and more (including my secret Spinach Mint & Chip Shake recipe that kids will drink again and again) on our menu. Tasty and nutritious options are always raw, always organic.

  • HEALTHIER ALTERNATIVES

Want a vegan hot chocolate alternative, we can do that. Want your organic popcorn popped in extra virgin coconut oil, that’s what we do! Have a suggestion or dietary request, let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.

 

OUR TRUCK MAKES THE DIFFERENCE

  • SOLAR POWER & ALTERNATIVE FUEL SOURCE

Initially, our bicycle food cart will be powered by the thigh master 2000....aka, the leg power of our diligent team members. Our longer term goal is to equip a food truck with roof top solar panels to power our kitchen during business hours and to research and convert a truck to use an alternative more earth friendly fuel source.

  • RINSE AND RECYCLE

We’ve already mentioned this but we’ll say it again, our Cocoa4aCause trucks come specially equipped with rinse and recycle stations accessible to you, the customer and good Samaritan.   Use these stations to rinse off your Cocoa4aCause cups and utensils and send them straight to the recycling plant where they can be repurposed instead of added to a landfill.

  • GOOD AROUND THE GLOBE

Initially, we will be licensed for sales in Arizona, Nevada, Utah, and California. However, with expansion in our sites we plan to travel far and near to bring you cocoa, support causes, and add a little joy across the globe.

  • TWO FOR ONE

By night one way by day another.......wait a second this is sounding too familiar.  It's more like, by winter one way by summer another.....okay.....well, what I mean to tell you is that our food truck will serve as two different food trucks by partnering with our sister company "Let's Lemonaid".  With removable magnetic graphics our food truck will transform on demand. If it's cold outside Cocoa4aCause will be there to serve you warm cocoa and other seasonal delights. Feeling a little hot and need to cool down to an ice cold glass of lemonade or some cold pressed juice? Let's Lemonaid will be there.

 

FUNDING GOALS

  • A FULL CUP ($15,000) 

With your help in reteaching our initial goal of $15,000 we will be able to purchase a bicycle powered food cart and outfit with needed appliances and storage, cover cost for graphics and advertising, obtain licensing and permits, fulfill perks, and start serving up perfection that counts!

 

STRETCH GOALS

  • EXTRA TOPPINGS ($30,000)

With an amazing $30,000 raised we will be able to upgrade from food cart to food trailer. What this means for you is more savory food options. More food options = more satisfied last buds =  more donations towards the cause of your choice = WORLD PEACE! Okay well it certainly means more good done around the globe.

  • CHERRY ON TOP ($50,000)

With an astounding $50,000 we could go full board and open a food truck. What this means for you is fold down seating wrapping around the length of the truck; a rinse and recycle station for customer use; and an environmentally conscience fuel and power source for the truck!

One person of integrity can make a difference, together we can make a change. 

 

THE PEOPLE BEHIND THE COMPANY

  • YOUTH ENTREPRENEURS 

Hailey (age 7) and Kayla (age 4)  -  the minds that started it all. These two took the initiative to start a drink stand...but what are two kids to do when they’re not old enough for a business license? Give it away for free? YES! So free it was. Selling out their entire 10 gallon stock in a manner of minutes, they gave every glass away for free. Even more surprising was the sizable amount of donations they were able to collect for children’s cancer research. Elated with their success, joy, and thoughtfulness we decided to expand. 

  • THE INNOVATOR

Amy  -  the mom, the myth, the legend...knows just how hard it is to find quality mouthwatering nutrition and delectable delights, especially on the go with kids. Combine that with her aspiration to transform the future one charitable act at a time, and you've got Cocoa4aCause.  Duties she is expected to excel in include, but are not limited to, serving up greatness, innovating business sustainability, managing daily operation and advertise like a BOSS!

  • THE LOGISTICS

Nick  -  the graphics guru and numbers guy currently owns and operates one successful business http://www.velocitydpi.com.  This talented artist has the hook ups for all of our vehicle graphics and advertising media needs. Plus, this number cruncher has the mind of a computer and the work ethic of a 20 mule team.....or something more charming that works really really hard. Point is there's never been a challenge or job that he hasn't solved. He has got the skills, to pay the bills.

 

THE CHALLENGE

  • THERE'S NO ESCAPING IT...

Success demands hard work. Good thing we would rather be completely exhausted from hard work than well rested from achieving nothing. Obstacles may get in our way (such as obtaining permits or finding a suitable food cart/truck) but we are determine to push through 'til we reach our goal.

story:
Our goal is to build a kennel (nursery for dogs), gather a team of skilled professionals which is in the process of formation and actively grows, to create the conditions for getting and training dogs that perform various tasks such as demining, detection of dangerous items, etc. and transfer them to our soldiers GRATUITOUSLY.

The dogs will perform actions which are not spoken about aloud for obvious reasons.

Following the work of dogs, studies will be carried out based on influence of relief, area and weather on the behavior of dogs. If necessary, tactics, training direction and type of dogs will be changed.

With our scarce resources and with the help of our compassionate Armenians we have done quite hard work. Dear compatriots, to reach our important goal we need your help.

The money received will be used exclusively for project implementation: construction work, huts, purchase of dogs, breeding, dog food, vitamins, vaccines, professionals, outfit and other modern high-tech items for care and training, etc. You can also help by sharing this very important project among your friends.

To learn about the activities and to see the dogs, you can call or visit our facebook page. We will be glad to see you in our team and, of course, we can meet at any time.

http://zinvorjan.info/

https://www.facebook.com/shnapah/

Mail: Zinvor.jan@mail.com

Tel:   +374 41 818195

Our message and request to the compassionate sons of our nation is to join us in this important deal.

We have already started work; we already have two dogs: 1.8-year-old East-European Shepherd for getting shepherd puppies and a little 7 -month-old shepherd of the same kind. Very smart one.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, I’m View from Thailand

First of all, I would like to say apologise for my poor English. (English is my and 2nd language) And Thanks for indiegogo.com that give an opportunity to people around the world. Really THANK YOU!

What I would ask you guys to help me is buying T-Shirt Printer for my Custom T-Shirt Shop. I need 6,000 USD for T-Shirt Printer or DTG Printer (Direct to Garment Printer).

I don’t have large amount of money to buy DTG printer so nowadays, after customer want to buy, they created the character in my website and then I will go to the shirt printing service shop and print them to sell. And in Thailand there is a few shop that can print on-time, Sometimes need to wait for 10-20 days to produce only 1 shirt then I really want my own printer. 

The customer who want to buy my T-Shirt can create the character on their own, you can visit www.tiger-made.com/design to design your character and click here to visit my Facebook Fanpage

and here is some pictures of my T-Shirt :




What We Need & What You Get

So I would like to ask the fund for :

- T-Shirt Printer (can print only on light Cotton T-Shirt)

- Heat Transfer Machine

- Ink and some materials to produce

- IndieGoGo fees (9% if this campaign doesn’t meets the goal, 4% if it meets)

- Paypal 3% and Credit Cards 3%

Risks & Challenges

I can promise that there is no risk for all of you! 

Even though this campaign doesn’t meet the goal, you will still get your perks :) 

If this campaign is finish and you still didn’t get your perk, please contact me at view@i-am-tiger.com  

Your Perks

Please allow me give you a little gift from your help :

$20 

- will get 1 T-Shirt (White or Unbleached 100% Cotton T-shirt at any sizes)

- you can create you character at www.tiger-made.com/design or select any patterns from www.facebook.com/TigeMadeShop (I have finished pattern too)

- please tell me the code of your design 

EX. 

TS0045 - for your own design

00037 - for my pattern 

- this price included shipping cost to worldwide

Estimated Shipping Date: August 2015

$35 

- will get 2 T-Shirts

- you can create you character at www.tiger-made.com/design or select any patterns from www.facebook.com/TigeMadeShop (I have finished pattern too)

- please tell me the code of your design 

EX. 

TS0045 - for your own design

00037 - for my pattern 

- this price included shipping cost to worldwide

Estimated Shipping Date: August 2015

$40 

- will get 3 T-Shirts (White or Unbleached 100% Cotton T-shirt at any sizes)

- you can create you character at www.tiger-made.com/design or select any patterns from www.facebook.com/TigeMadeShop (I have finished pattern too)

- please tell me the code of your design 

EX. 

TS0045 - for your own design

00037 - for my pattern 

- this price included shipping cost to worldwide

Estimated Shipping Date: August 2015

$65 

- will get 4 T-Shirts

- you can create you character at www.tiger-made.com/design or select any patterns from www.facebook.com/TigeMadeShop (I have finished pattern too)

- please tell me the code of your design 

EX. 

TS0045 - for your own design

00037 - for my pattern 

- this price included shipping cost to worldwide

Estimated Shipping Date: August 2015

and here is the size of T-Shirt :


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute right now, I would really appreciate any Like and Share my Facebook Fanpage or to share this campaign to social media :)

I would THANKFUL for any help <3

story:
What is FotosForward?

FotosForward is a traveling photography project gifting creative photography sessions and important memories across North America to those with limited income or going through financial hardships, people with limited mobility or who may live in rural/remote areas with limited access to a professional photographer. 

I am an experienced photographer and road tripper. In 2012 I attended the Burning Man festival. I built a small towable cart and did portraits of other attendees. Upon home I edited them and made them available for the people in them to download. The response, gratitude and love was immense. It made me wonder if I could do this for people in the real world. In October 2014 a girl emailed me about photos of her and her boyfriend I had taken. This time though the email was different. She was writing from a hospice where her boyfriend was dying of lung cancer. She thanked me for the "wonderful gift you've given us for his last burn".

After that there was no doubt in my mind of the impact this gift can have on people and FotosForward was born.


What FotosForward Needs.

All this project needs is help to keep going once I start. I am starting with my savings which I estimate will give me 6-8 months but given the potential reach of this project it will be a short lived without some additional support with the day to day expenses. The biggest being fuel.

The goal amount is the estimated expenses for one additional year (this was originally two years but the funding goal quickly looked unobtainable. So to give this project a fighting chance it's been changed to one year) on the road. Any funding above the set goal will be treated with the same respect and used to add more time on the road and prolonging the life of the project and allowing me to create even more photos for people. I won't be able to get everywhere, but I'm sure willing to try. Another thing to note is that any funds raised by donations, sponsorship, hired commissions and my own art photography print sales along the way will all be applied to the longevity of this project.

For the sake of transparency, I want to stress what I DON'T need. I have worked over the past 4 years to be as prepared and self sufficient as possible. I've been working and saving to acquire items I need such as newer camera gear, lighting, repairs to my vehicle, camping items, websites, etc. I have prepaid as many of my monthly expenses as possible, like auto insurance, registrations etc.

Contributions will NOT be used for new photo gear, a vehicle, website creation, payroll etc.  I have the gear and transportation to make this happen and I've done all design, logos, website, social media (and yes, I even did the info video myself after cramming After Effects tutorials for 2 days). So this means that all contributions go toward sustaining forward momentum.

These funds (along with my own savings) will be going towards the following:
  • Fuel - (The biggest cost)
  • Food - (groceries not restaurants)
  • Printing Fees - (For the rare cases in which a digital medium is not as viable)
  • Small Misc Expenses - (Such as oil changes, washer fluid, parking, small props for photo shoots we may need etc.) 
  • Fulfillment of the Perks

I want this project to last as long as possible so I can reach as many people as possible. If I were wealthy I would simply go do it, but I'm not, so that's hopefully where some of you come in.

The Perks

I believe with all my heart that the last thing this planet needs is more branded key-chains and coffee mugs. That's why many of the perks are based on either a sponsorship model or "paying it forward" even more. 
That said I am still including a few fun logo perks and some photography based perks that give you the chance to own your favourite fine art photograph of mine in very limited editions or in some cases, exclusively. Be sure to check out all the perks!
Sticker Perk

Hoodie Perk

Sponsorship Perks:

The Impact

Over the past three years the reaction to the portraits I do at Burning Man has been simply overwhelming. It was amazing to me how a simple gift of a few still frames could garner so much gratitude from the recipient. I've been wanting to bring that gift to the rest of the world for some time. To capture fun, creative memories with everyday people, for whatever reason they may have that is close to them.

I also feel the stories and images will not only serve those that they are created for with a lasting memory but in sharing them remind us all that we as people are all one, all in this world together, striving for the same things. That is why I ask that everyone follow along on this journey with me via the website and social media. I may be the one out there doing this, but this project is for and about all of us.

Risks & Challenges

I feel my biggest risk is going to be that of breakdown or theft of some kind. This isn't  my first road trip and I'm going into this project with as much preparation done as possible but that does not cover the unforeseen. 

I've driven cross country (Canada) during the winter and throughout the southwest states in all conditions. I have experience with breakdowns, flat tires and accidents and it's all part of the deal.  I know what the road feels like and I know my limitations. I can deal with the isolation it sometimes brings but look forward to the interactions of making artful photographic memories with new friends. 

As for challenges, the one I stress over is finding the willing participants. People can be prideful, shy and private. I understand this and want to assure everyone involved that I pass no judgement on anyone's situation. I’ve been in many dire situations myself in which I received help from dear friends and family. This project is just one way I hope to pay those very kindnesses forward.


Other Ways You Can Help

As much as funding for FotosForward is important, sharing this project is JUST as important. Without sharing it with your friends it doesn't get seen, without eyes on it there are no participants, no connections, no stories, no photos. The more people that see this project, share the website, the Facebook page and the tweets the better of a chance I have of filling each day with meaningful shoots.

Please visit the project at the links below or use the Indiegogo share tools right from this page. Thank you so much for looking and reading and I hope to meet you all along the way.

FotosForward Website | Facebook Page | Twitter | Tumblr | Instagram

Some samples of my other portrait/people work.

Some samples of my other work, for which you can own through the perks or purchase as every purchase also helps this project.

If anyone one has any questions, concerns or suggestions I'd love to hear them in the comments. Thank you for looking.
story_txt:
What is FotosForward?
FotosForward is a traveling photography project gifting creative photography sessions and important memories across North America to those with limited income or going through financial hardships, people with limited mobility or who may live in rural/remote areas with limited access to a professional photographer. 

I am an experienced photographer and road tripper. In 2012 I attended the Burning Man festival. I built a small towable cart and did portraits of other attendees. Upon home I edited them and made them available for the people in them to download. The response, gratitude and love was immense. It made me wonder if I could do this for people in the real world. In October 2014 a girl emailed me about photos of her and her boyfriend I had taken. This time though the email was different. She was writing from a hospice where her boyfriend was dying of lung cancer. She thanked me for the "wonderful gift you've given us for his last burn".


After that there was no doubt in my mind of the impact this gift can have on people and FotosForward was born.

What FotosForward Needs.
All this project needs is help to keep going once I start. I am starting with my savings which I estimate will give me 6-8 months but given the potential reach of this project it will be a short lived without some additional support with the day to day expenses. The biggest being fuel.

The goal amount is the estimated expenses for one additional year (this was originally two years but the funding goal quickly looked unobtainable. So to give this project a fighting chance it's been changed to one year) on the road. Any funding above the set goal will be treated with the same respect and used to add more time on the road and prolonging the life of the project and allowing me to create even more photos for people. I won't be able to get everywhere, but I'm sure willing to try. Another thing to note is that any funds raised by donations, sponsorship, hired commissions and my own art photography print sales along the way will all be applied to the longevity of this project.


For the sake of transparency, I want to stress what I DON'T need. I have worked over the past 4 years to be as prepared and self sufficient as possible. I've been working and saving to acquire items I need such as newer camera gear, lighting, repairs to my vehicle, camping items, websites, etc. I have prepaid as many of my monthly expenses as possible, like auto insurance, registrations etc.



Contributions will NOT be used for new photo gear, a vehicle, website creation, payroll etc.  I have the gear and transportation to make this happen and I've done all design, logos, website, social media (and yes, I even did the info video myself after cramming After Effects tutorials for 2 days). So this means that all contributions go toward sustaining forward momentum.


These funds (along with my own savings) will be going towards the following:


Fuel - (The biggest cost)



Food - (groceries not restaurants)


Printing Fees - (For the rare cases in which a digital medium is not as viable)
Small Misc Expenses - (Such as oil changes, washer fluid, parking, small props for photo shoots we may need etc.)

That said I am still including a few fun logo perks and some photography based perks that give you the chance to own your favourite fine art photograph of mine in very limited editions or in some cases, exclusively. Be sure to check out all the perks!Sticker PerkHoodie Perk

To capture fun, creative memories with everyday people, for whatever reason they may have that is close to them.

I also feel the stories and images will not only serve those that they are created for with a lasting memory but in sharing them remind us all that we as people are all one, all in this world together, striving for the same things. I've driven cross country (Canada) during the winter and throughout the southwest states in all conditions. I have experience with breakdowns, flat tires and accidents and it's all part of the deal.  I know what the road feels like and I know my limitations. I can deal with the isolation it sometimes brings but look forward to the interactions of making artful photographic memories with new friends.

I understand this and want to assure everyone involved that I pass no judgement on anyone's situation. I’ve been in many dire situations myself in which I received help from dear friends and family. story:
As the space of my home is very limited but I enjoy home gathering with my friends very much, I started thinking of designing a stylish, wonderful and comfortable dinning table for 8 - 10 persons. 

The dining table must be environmental friendly, space-saving, easy to move, gorgeous and practical as well. Apart from the fact that this Stylish Foldable Paper Table can fit the needs of small homes with insufficient space, the special characteristics of this paper table like artistic appearance, high mobility, easy for storage and user friendliness surely make it very suitable to be used in commercial occasions such as restaurants, exhibition venues, etc. 

With the continuous hard work and perseverance of mine and the support of my family and friends, I made the first sample successfully but there are still many imperfections needed to be solved before the Stylish Foldable Paper Table can become a mature product for mass production. 

For example, it's still not very easy to open the table now, the side paper broad of the table will get crumple easily and not good-looking enough because of the velcro. 

That's the reason why we raise funds here and hope that we can raise enough funds to optimize the design and manufacture of this Stylish Foldable Paper Table.

Contributors are also welcome to give comments or constructive suggestions to improve the Stylish Foldable Paper Table design.

1. Approximately, it should take 1 -2 months to finish the design: USD1,000 is needed (designing and analyzing what materials are suitable for making the table)

2. It takes about 1-2 months to find out the suitable materials: USD3,000 (purchase materials)

3. About 2-3 months are necessary for making the new sample: USD6,000 (do testing and use different materials to make the ideal sample)

story:
Short Summary

My name is Teangla Caprice Jackson.  I am the mother of six children and a child care provider.

In 2003, I became a licensed childcare professional with my own center.  I provided before and after care for children six weeks to twelve years old from 6am to 12am.  I also offered transportation to and from school as well as to children's homes.  For four years my business grew and flourished as well as my family.  When I started the business, my three children were ages five, nine and twelve.  Within three of those years I gave birth to two more children.  It was time to move my family and my child care center to a larger space.  My plans were not God's plans.  Unfortunately, my family experienced a financial hardship that required me to close my business and re-enter the workforce.  I continued working in various child care centers all the while longing for my own again. I noticed how differences in the quality of care in the various centers I was employed.  Children from inner city neighborhoods were given care that was lacking in not only supervision but also in resources while other centers flourished with resources for families that were able to pay a steep price for such luxuries.  It was then, that I knew that time was of the essence.  I want to address the disparities of families with low income and the quality of care that their children are provided.  All children deserve the best care possible without regard to their family's income restraints and I would like to fill this void with quality, nourishing, developmentally appropriate child care for all children.  That's where this campaign comes in.  I am striving to raise funds to open a center where children and their families are nurtured and cared for.  Where the development of the whole child is manifested through activities and resources that target cognitive, social/emotional, and physical skills while at the same time providing a quality of care that some families are not privy to.  It is my goal to use the funds from this campaign to buy a building and/or space to open Ready, Set, Grow! Child Care and Family Resource Center.  We would provide quality and affordable child care for children six weeks to twelve years with the addition of before and after school care, transportation to and from school, and Summer Camp! This is such a labor of love for me.  With your help, I will be able to open a child care center that will be the foundation of my mission of serving all children and their families.

My goal is to raise $100,000 to help me with this endeavor.  Even if I don't reach my $100,000 goal, all money will go towards opening the child care center of my dreams.  A child care center that is truly needed in our community.

For everyone that contributes there are fun perks in store!  If you want to help but can't contribute money, word of mouth advertising of my campaign would be greatly appreciated as well!
