story:
Objective:

Our objective is to help Latino professionals, students and entrepreneurs  connect and advance by providing a cutting edge social networking platform. We also want to bring companies and professionals together using advanced search and recommendation engines

The Challenge

A big gap exists in services that help advance the career goals of Latino professionals across the world. At the same time, corporations struggle to find talented Latinos to diversify their workforce and meet customers' expectations.

 

 

 

Spanish Version
 

The Solution

LatInc is a social networking platform that leverages personal relationships to build a dynamic talent pipeline of Latino professionals around the world.

LatInc is a culture-sensitive  networking platform that will not only help users connect with friends and colleagues but will also empower them to advance in their career by providing integrated services like resume building, mentoring and training recommendations.

What's different about LatInc?

1. Bring all of yourself

We respect diversity and value the rich heritage of Latinos around the globe. We have built the core of our platform to enable our users to leverage their strengths, heritage and culture in advancement of their careers.

2. Integrated Career Services

One of the key differentiating factors for LatInc is our focus on integrated services. For example, we have built a mentoring service right into the platform. This would enable experienced professionals to help other users on their career path.

3. Enhanced Features

We have built several cool features that you will love - like our premium profile service that will help you build and promote your personal brand.

Building Blocks

1. Social Wall • Professional networking: Connections/Followers • Newsfeed and notifications •

2. Premium Profile

3. Advanced Search engine

4. Find Mentors and get coaching. 

 

5.Curated educational and training content delivery

6. Find Jobs and internships that interest you

6. Events

7. Market Place: Recruiter , Small Business, Company or Enterprise presence.

Why we need LatInc?

With a growing global Spanish-speaking population of 550 Million of which of those 55 Million of Latinos are living in the USA, the network base and the need for services is quite extensive.

The shift in the demographics in the US is bringing the corporate-America's attention to the Latino community-  Corporations have a urgent need to respond to this changing demographic.

Latin America and the Caribbean are experiencing a dramatic surge of its economies and middle class, 50 million individuals were added to the middle class—bringing the total from around 115 million people to over 165 million to the middle class consumer population.

Latin America is home to approximately 155.9 million smart cell phones and it is expected to grow to 245.6 million by 2019; LatInc will be leveraging this technology adoption connecting them to career services.

There are about 616 millions of Internet users in Latin America and 297 million Facebook users tells us that Latinos are adopting to technology as a fast rate than other demographic groups, The Latino on-line market is stable and growing and ready to welcome new technologies services.

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

LatInc Is looking for funding to complete the development of a mobile app that will help Latino professionals to connect with colleagues , find mentors and professional development opportunities. Your contributions will help us to bring the best of the Latino talent to the global economy.

THE IMPACT

This powerful cultural-sensitive career advancement platform that will transform the way Latinos perform professional networking and career service offering. A demographic driven collaboration platform where customers can:

  • Connect and advance in their career
  • Receive and deliver mentorship and career counseling
  • Perform job search and talent recruitment

LatInc will empower Latinos across the world to meet other professionals, advance their careers by tapping in to their rich and diverse cultural heritage. 

Thank you for your support! We appreciate you helping to advance the Latinos around the world; your support will be transforming the workplace into a more diverse, inclusive and more acceptable place for all along with contributing to a more educated and economically stable global Latino community.

story:
I've been specializing in mens hair for over 17 years, fifth person in my family of seven to do it. I've been instrumental in launching 2 men's salons successfully and I have learned a lot about what to do and what not to do. I see a great opportunity to blend a men's retail store with a great men's salon! I am constantly looking at how to improve, in life and in business, how to be different but effective. I see what i do as a way to connect with my community. I want to expand from high quality grooming services to offering high quality goods at prices that people can afford.I already have a solid clientele for myself of 656 loyal customers and now I want to expand to 10 chairs and a big retail store in front. I have a great team ready to help me grow so I can help other stylist grow and achieve a better quality of life that we all deserve.  Being a stylist in the mens arena can be extremely demanding , 30 mn services all day can easily add up to 20 cuts a day. If you're passionate about it then its great, but when you work for someone who is taking the majority of your wages it can kill your passion. Thats why i need your help in creating an environment where stylist can flourish, work as part of a team and be able to move into a roll where they can work for themselves in a creative , positive environment. I believe that if you invest in your employees your clients will be better served. If your clients are happy your business is thriving and if your business is thriving so is your community. I am determined to be successful and am passionate about my craft, mens retail, and providing the ultimate working environment for other stylist. I want to create something that I can be proud of, something that you can be proud of and something that is built out of sheer passion! The 250,000 that i am looking for is small number for the impact it will have on the lives of the people who work there and shop there. . We are all in this life together , so know that you support a person whose dedicated to creating a better world. Thank you for your time

Sincerely , Justin Iovinella 

Www.fellassalon.com

story:
Greetings,

My name is Bethany Palmer.  I’m an attorney from Flagstaff, Arizona.  I’ve spent the past three years working with a legal aid that provides free legal services to low-income people around Arizona and in the Navajo Nation.  This fall, I’m heading to Guayaquil, Ecuador to provide legal services and community education to refugees.  I will be volunteering with a wonderful non-profit organization called Asylum Access América Latina.  If you would like to learn more about Asylum Access América Latina, please visit their website:  http://asylumaccess.org/AsylumAccess/mission-an....

There are many refugees in Ecuador from neighboring Colombia as well as numerous refugees fleeing the humanitarian and security crisis in Central America.  These individuals are fleeing their countries for a variety of reasons; political oppression, gender-based violence and targeted gang violence, to name a few.  Asylum Access América Latina seeks to ensure that these individuals’ rights are respected as they live in Ecuador and go through the United Nations’ process to determine whether they are refugees. 

In addition to providing refugees with sorely needed legal services, this move will help me transition to the next stage in my career, in which I plan to focus primarily on refugee and asylum law.  This experience will increase my understanding of the issues that refugees face as they are awaiting decisions, resettlement and family reunification.  I know I will become a better lawyer, while learning about different cultures and perspectives. 

While my current position as a legal aid attorney is extremely rewarding, the rewards are not financial.  I have not been able to set aside enough funds to last through six months of volunteering.  As much as I hate asking for help, in this instance, I must.   

My fundraising target is $4,800.  This is to cover travel expenses to Ecuador, visa expenses, daily living expenses including housing, food, transportation and medical insurance.  Every bit counts.  If you can throw in $5 or $10, it would be greatly appreciated, and will get me that much closer to my goal.  Together we can help the refugees in Ecuador.  Thank you very much for your support!

Asylum Access América Latina (AALA) disclaimers:
- AALA does not receive any percentage of the money donated.
- Making a donation does not qualify the donor to discount the amount from their taxes.
- In case of a change or shortening of my internship due to reasons out of my control or for any other reason, donors are not eligible to claim refunds from AALA.

Ayude a la Provisión de los Servicios Legales a los Refugiados en Ecuador

Me llamo Bethany Palmer.  Soy abogada de Flagstaff, Arizona.  He pasado los tres últimos años trabajando en una defensoría que ayuda a la gente de pocos recursos de Arizona y de la Nación Navajo.  Este otoño, voy a Guayaquil, Ecuador para proveer servicios legales y educación comunitaria a los refugiados. Seré voluntaria en una ONG maravillosa que se llama Asylum Access América Latina.  Si usted quiere aprender más sobre Asylum Access América Latina, visite su sitio web: http://asylumaccess.org/AsylumAccess/en-espanol/acerca-de-asylum-access-global.

Hay muchos refugiados en Ecuador provenientes de los países vecinos además de numerosos refugiados quienes huyen de la crisis humanitaria y de seguridad en América Central.  Estas personas huyen de sus países por muchas razones; la opresión política, la violencia contra mujeres y la violencia de las bandas, por mencionar sólo algunas.  Asylum Access América Latina busca que los derechos de estas personas sean respetados mientras viven en Ecuador y  pasan el proceso que las Naciones Unidas lleva a cabo para determinar si son refugiados o no. 

Además de proveer a los refugiados con servicios legales tan necesitados, este paso me ayudará a hacer la transición a la próxima etapa de mi carrera en la cual deseo enfocarme en derecho de refugio y derecho de asilo.  Esta experiencia aumentará mi entendimiento de los problemas que afrontan los refugiados mientras están esperando las decisiones de reubicación y reunificación de sus familias. Por ello,  sé que me convertiré en una mejor abogada, en la medida  en que aprenda sobre culturas y perspectivas diferentes. 

A pesar que mi posición actual como abogada en una defensoría de gente de pocos recursos económicos me da muchas recompensas, estas no son financieras. Por esta razón  no ha sido posible ahorrar los fondos que necesitaré para sobrevivir como voluntaria por seis meses. Por lo tanto, aunque odio pedir ayuda a los demás, esta vez es necesario. 

Mi meta de recaudación de fondos es de $4,800.  Esto es para cubrir los gastos de viaje a Ecuador, los gastos de visa, los gastos de la vida cotidiana que incluye vivienda, comida, transporte y seguro médico en Ecuador.  Cada dólar es importante.  Si puede dar $5 o $10, yo le agradeceré mucho, ya que esto me ayudará a obtener mi meta.  Juntos podemos ayudar a los refugiados en Ecuador.  ¡Muchas gracias por su apoyo! 

Declaraciones de AALA:

– AALA no recibe ningún porcentaje de las donaciones

– hacer una donación no califica el donante para un descuento de los impuestos

– en el caso de que se acortara mi pasantía por razones no previstas, o por cualquier otra

Razón, los donantes no pueden exigir devoluciones de las donaciones de AALA
story_txt:
Greetings,
My
name is Bethany Palmer.  I’m an attorney from Flagstaff, Arizona. 
I’ve spent the past three years working with a legal aid that provides free
legal services to low-income people around Arizona and in the Navajo
Nation.  This fall, I’m heading to Guayaquil, Ecuador to provide legal
services and community education to refugees.  I will be volunteering with
a wonderful non-profit organization called Asylum Access América Latina.  If you would like to learn more about Asylum
Access América Latina, please visit their website: 
http://asylumaccess.org/AsylumAccess/mission-an....
There
are many refugees in Ecuador from neighboring Colombia as well as numerous
refugees fleeing the humanitarian and security crisis in Central America. 
These individuals are fleeing their countries for a variety of reasons;
political oppression, gender-based violence and targeted gang violence, to name
a few.  Asylum Access América Latina seeks to ensure that these
individuals’ rights are respected as they live in Ecuador and go through the
United Nations’ process to determine whether they are refugees.  
In
addition to providing refugees with sorely needed legal services, this move
will help me transition to the next stage in my career, in which I plan to
focus primarily on refugee and asylum law.  This experience will increase
my understanding of the issues that refugees face as they are awaiting
decisions, resettlement and family reunification.  I know I will become a
better lawyer, while learning about different cultures and perspectives.  
While
my current position as a legal aid attorney is extremely rewarding, the rewards
are not financial.  I have not been able to set aside enough funds to last
through six months of volunteering.  As much as I hate asking for help, in
this instance, I must.   
My
fundraising target is $4,800.  This is to cover travel expenses to
Ecuador, visa expenses, daily living expenses including housing, food,
transportation and medical insurance.  Every bit counts.  If you can
throw in $5 or $10, it would be greatly appreciated, and will get me that much
closer to my goal.  Together we can help
the refugees in Ecuador.  Thank you very
much for your support! 
Asylum
Access América Latina (AALA) disclaimers: 
- AALA does not receive any percentage of the money donated. 
- Making a donation does not qualify the donor to discount the amount from
their taxes. 
- In case of a change or shortening of my internship due to reasons out of my
control or for any other reason, donors are not eligible to claim refunds from
AALA.

story:
D@ Board Inventory

We are looking to raise capital to import our products by sea instead of by air, and you can benefit from the savings. We've been testing self balancing scooters for months and have found the best board manufacturers over seas.  D@ Boards are reliable, durable, quick, and FAST!  Unfortunately, shipping kills us when importing these to the U.S.


How you can benefit by helping us

By donating to our campaign, we can buy a large shipment by boat and we will pass on the savings to you.  Our goal is to keep our product relatively low priced to keep up with the growing competition.  Since we know our product and our manufacturer, we feel we can make the largest impact by offering low prices and dependable products.

Pricing breakdown

By donating, you will be eligible to buy our boards for $350.  This is significantly cheaper than competitors: Funky Duck $1500, IO Hawk $1800, Airwheel $600.  Why is ours so cheap?  Honestly, they are all probably buying their boards for the same price, just marketing them differently.

Risks & Challenges

All companies encounter risk, our goal is to minimize risk, for you and us.  Some risks we forsee are not receiving goods or receiving damaged goods.  To minimize these risks, we plan on waiting to receive our first order by boat to guarantee the process works.  We also have arranged a warranty policy with our manufacturer to resolve damaged goods issues, which includes replacement parts and replacement units.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the financial means to support us, we still appreciate your time to look over our product.  By sharing D@ Boards with anyone you think could be interested, you will surely help us grow our brand.

story:
Trotholm 2015

The Brony event Trotholm is returning this summer 2015 and we want to make it greater than ever! In addition to arranging a wonderful 3-days event in Stockholm, we have the ambition to bring you the voice actress Michelle Creber. Among that will Blackgryph0n (famous fandom musician) be joining Creber to hold a concert. But in order for us to accomplish such a feat, we will need your help! 

Incase we get the required funds for this to be successful. Then Michelle Creber will officially be the FIRST from the original MLP.FiM cast to be visiting Sweden!

When?

The event will be taking place between the 10th of July(friday) and the 12th of July (sunday) in Stockholm, Sweden. So a whole weekend of meeting other Bronies and doing fun activities!

Funding

The best case scenario is that we get funding from the state but if we don’t get the funding then we are going to need donations from the attendees.

If we reach our goal and the government funds us everyone will be refunded their entry ticket ( 27 €) (but not the concert ticket), since we won’t need the money from the entry ticket anymore.

In case we do not reach our goal of 11500 €, we will return everyone their money back. Even if we didn’t reach our goal, we will still be organizing Trotholm 2015, but without the special guests. Entry will then be completely free, incase the funding goal isn’t reached.

7856 € for special guests

1828 € Buillding and setup

531 € attendee bracelets

42 € conceret bracelets (for those only going to the concert)

212 € Staff shirts

212 € Prices for the tournaments and cosplay

918 € Other costs (Backup money, incase something goes wrong or turns up suddently. For instance, if something breaks during the event or if the flight tickets to our special guests have changed in any way).

11590 € 


Anything over will go to the next event.

Note: The fourth tier will include dinners with these two and Michelle’s parents.


Friday
12:00pm 1:00pm Sergels torg
1:00pm 1:45pm Go to the venue
2:30pm 3:00pm Information
3:00pm 5:00pm Auction
5:00pm 12:00am MLP:CCG tournament
5:00pm 12:00am Fighting is Magic tournament
5:00pm +10:00am Marathon
5:00pm 8:00pm Dinner with Michelle Creber & BlackGryph0n
Saturday
9:00am 11:00am Breakfast
10:00am 12:00pm Cosplay
12:30pm 3:00pm Panel with Michelle Creber, BlackGryph0n
5:00pm 8:00pm Dinner with Michelle Creber & BlackGryph0n
8:00pm 11:00pm Michelle Creber & BlackGryph0n consert
11:00pm +10:00am Marathon
Sunday
9:00am 11:00am Breakfast
10:00am 1:00pm Fighting is Magic tournament
11:00am 5:00pm Karaoke tournament
12:00pm 6:00pm Panel with Michelle Creber, BlackGryph0n
3:00pm 6:00pm Signing with Michelle Creber, BlackGryph0n
5:00pm 6:00pm Karaoke tournament final

TROTHOLM IS A NONPROFIT EVENT. ALL DONATIONS WILL BE USED FOR THE EVENT AND ANY DONATIONS ABOVE THE GOAL WILL BE USED FOR THE NEXT TROTHOLM.


What will happen at Trotholm

At the event there will be multiple things happening throughout the weekend, but similar to the other Trotholms the attendees will of course do fun stuff themselves as well.


The organized events that will be available at Trotholm are the following:


My little pony collectible card game (MLP-CCG) tournament - who will be the champion of the pony cards?


Q&A followed by Concert with Michelle Creber & Blackgryph0n - ask the questions, hear the music.


Fighting is Magic tournament - Who will be the most magical fighter… Or best button masher?


Karaoke tournament - Be the best at singing those pony songs!


The return of the epic My Little Pony Episode Mareathon on the projector


“Quiz walk” - walk around and answer questions about the show. “How much do you actually know about the series?”


Cosplay - People are so creative!


We hope that you are as excited as we are and that you will donate to this amazing event with amazing people coming to it!


Best Regards From The Trotholm Crew! /)

story:
Project Visual: Helping Young Artists Build Their Future Careers

 

Rochester, NY hides a robust art community. With 8 colleges and universities in the Rochester area(more within a 50-mile radius), street art everywhere, artisan shops that line the streets and open-mics galore it's weird that an art community of this size is unrecognized and unrepresented Since March 2017, the Project Visual Network has been connecting like-minded artists from all different backgrounds in the Rochester community. At our core, we strive to immerse our artists in an environment of passionate artists looking to connect, collaborate and create.

Social Proof

The demand is real. The Project Visual Network currently partners 5 Visual Artists with a social media following over 15000 fans and growing! 
We had our first event, Project: LAUNCH, in March in which we pulled in over 100 attendees and paid out over $350 to our artists, Just for that single night! That happened with no money, just the power of art and word of mouth. 
We help our artists host events and experiences for themselves so our second event, a partnered musicians album release party, just happened in November and was out of this world. You can read our blog post about it here! We at the Project Visual Network believe in, fund and market our artists and are surrounded by a community who loves their art and are willing to pay for it. 

 

So many times, we have heard “Art isn’t a stable job” or “I wish I could pursue my dream but I don’t have the resources to do it” and we actively challenge that opinion! If you want something badly enough, you go out and do it! Gather the knowledge needed to build your brand, surround yourself with other people passionate about your art, find resources and get it done! But for people who don't know where that process starts, that’s where the startup company, Project Visual, comes in. The Project Visual Network is working hard to get to a point where we can more steadily provide resources and funding for all our emerging new visual artists-models, filmmakers, fashion designers, graphic artist, musicians, etc. It all, kinda, starts here!  This campaign will help provide a more stable foundation for Project Visual and our content creators.

With the help of our supporters and contributors, we can create a better foundation for providing funding and resources to the artists powering the art of tomorrow. Assist us in destroying the stereotype about careers in art as we get people to see that an art/entertainment career is more achievable than  you think!

 

The goal we're trying to reach is $5,500. Here's a further breakdown of where the money is actually going:

We are ALWAYS looking for ways to give back to our supportive community, whether that be digitally or the community right here in Rochester, NY. If you can monetarily support our campaign, we'd love to express our gratitude with a piece of our 1-year history, discount codes to affiliate stores, credits and more!

We would love if our goal was met but if it isn't we won't stop pushing! All efforts raised will go into our prioritized budgets and will aid us in creating a foundation for our environment where we support our artists!

The Impact

The younger me was so eager to create art. I wanted to run my own production company and I even took a year off, right after graduating valedictorian of my high school with scholarships to many GOOD schools, to do it. Self-sustaining myself on minimum wage while trying to invest in my business was hard so unfortunately, I had to rethink my situation. This led me to go to college to further my education while still retaining this goal in mind. Into my academic career, I began to meet like-minded artists with the same intent in mind-make my art my job. Likewise, these artists had a hard time funding their art, marketing themselves effectively or understanding the business more in depth, all while going to school or working long hours. Hence, Project Visual was born, an opportunity where I could make my own dreams come true while helping others achieve the same thing. From then on out I’ve worked hard inside and outside of school to build the network and bring Project Visual, the manifestation of my previous goal, to life and IT HAS!

Risks & Challenges

There is some risk in our business; art is subjective so what makes our artists stand out? How does the Project Visual Network become self-sustaining? Here's how we plan on tackling these questions: 

  • It's definitely true, art is subjective. In considering this, we push our artists to be persistent and just keep creating. In the meantime, we work in the background gauging interest, holding focus groups, sending out surveys, reviewing social media analytics growth and social trends and more. With our strenuous research and development from our team, we maximize the opportunities within the target markets for our partnered artists. 
  • The Project Visual Network contracts every artist looking to join our community. Within these contracts we negotiate profit margin percentages only on creations or opportunities we help our artist fund or we collaborate on. We've been working on so many projects with so many artists that we'd love to bring to life!
  • We host amazing events all year long! These events are unique and different and target multiple demographics and markets. We believe that with the correct advertising and marketing, but most importantly creating an engaging genuinely immersive experience, we can fund the network while pursuing other business opportunities that'll only expand it more. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people can't contribute and that's okay. Sharing this campaign to get this project in front of more supporters is also very much appreciated! A follow or like on any of our social media has to potential to get us more support as well. Go like and share CRAZY!

Thank you so much for your past, current and future support of the Project Visual Network!

We believe that with the correct advertising and marketing, but most importantly creating an engaging genuinely immersive experience, we can fund the network while pursuing other business opportunities that'll only expand it more. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some people can't contribute and that's okay. Sharing this campaign to get this project in front of more supporters is also very much appreciated! A follow or like on any of our social media has to potential to get us more support as well. Go like and share CRAZY!

Thank you so much for your past, current and future support of the Project Visual Network!

story:
CandyShip means cruises in the “all inclusive” format to the islands near Phuket.

DJs create the atmosphere, drinks cool you down and the weather pleases! During the day, we sail over to the nearby islands and at night, we host a pre-party of Phuket’s major nightclubs.

This format is created specifically for those who enjoy music and fine leisure that combines sightseeing and relaxation by water. The format targets the middle-class audience that is virtually ignored in this tourist paradise and gets offered either regular tourist long-tail trips or expensive VIP catamaran cruises. Candyship Crew is a team with 15 years of experience in entertainment, music and original project organization in different parts of the world.

Candyship is based at Patong peer on Phuket and functions November through July. Its capacity is up to 70 persons, but to ensure a comfortable stay, the guest number is limited to 45-50 persons.


Lower deck:

Chaise lounges / mattresses – 25
Armchairs – 6
Bar stools – 6


Upper deck / VIP area:

Chaise lounges – 10
Armchairs – 10


Sound: Audiofocus professional audio, 10 hi-fi speakers and subs, total of 10kW
DJ equipment: 2x Pioneer XDJ1000MK2, DJM850

Water entertainment: 2 slides, 2 diving boards.

 

Day cruise to the islands

we enjoy the scenery, nod our heads to the music beat, 
feeling goooood

10:00 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. – day cruise along the coastline of Phuket to the nearby islands, snorkeling, water sports and entertainments. The ticket cost includes light alcohol drinks, soft drinks, fruits and snacks.

 

The guests snug on comfortable mattresses adjusted for any shapes desired. The seats are booked in advance when ordering the tour with the operator, agent or at the dedicated website. Possibility to provide a cozy stay for a group of any size.

A variety of sightseeing options, such as mattress chaise lounges, comfortable armchairs with drinks holders. As you sit there right above the water surface, you can admire the ocean, the islands, the coastal area or your date.

 

Sitting (or standing) by the bar counter, you can sip either drinks included in the ticket cost or anything else from the bar card.

The upper deck is subject to a separate booking and intended for our VIP guests – performers and DJs.

The estimated day cruise ticket cost is USD 40 (THB 1350).

 

Evening cruise in Patong waters

we memorize the beauty of the sunset to tell all about it to our children one day, we listen to the sets of first-rate DJs, drink cocktails, dance and enjoy our life to the full 

5:00 p.m. – 9:00 p.m. – evening cruise in the island’s aquatic area. The ticket cost includes light alcohol drinks, soft drinks, fruits and snacks, and the entrance fee to one of Phuket nightclubs. Accompaniment is provided by prominent European, American and Russian DJs.
 

The tropical sun is not burning you now and we fold the sunshades allowing you to admire the night-time southern sky while sipping a cool cocktail. Don’t forget to take selfies to make everyone envy you!

The furniture arrangement is changed creating the lounge atmosphere on the water. The armchairs and tables are placed depending on the guests’ needs and bookings.

Unfortunately, the use of water slides at nighttime is prohibited due to the safety reasons. 

The estimated night cruise ticket cost is USD 50 (THB 1650).

 

Why crowdfunding instead of the standard dealing with investors?

We want to create a project following our beliefs and positive vision of the world around us.

Yet, as crowdfunding is a great way to understand to what extent our project is interesting to the people around the globe and to what extent you are willing to support, we decided to share it with you.

By all means, the specified crowdfunding investment amount is not going to cover all expenses requisite to launch the project. We are willing to invest our own funds to cover approximately 40% of the estimated costs.

We will be happy to provide further detailed information about our vision, team and where we are now with the project.

 

Where we are at the moment:

  • The project concept and financial model behind it were verified on site and … fell into the bull's eye! The market IS there, the demand IS there… the CandyShip is not yet :)
     
  • Negotiated superb conditions with most of the Phuket nightlife: night clubs, bars, beach clubs will open doors for you with special bonus with CandyShip ticket
     
  • Preliminary we negotiated some good deals for ship hull & machinery with couple of shipyards with dutch, swedish and british owners (you know those guys good at maritime ;) )
     
  • Much of the routine administrative, HSE, legal and similar work has been done (yep, its boring, we know it...)  allowing us to proceed to the FUN side of the project!

 

Operating schedule

You want know more? Please contact Mr. Dennis Nepomniashy
EST +372 5555 3621
THA +66 92 645 8938
hello@candyship.party

story:
Lets Begin 

Zeno Motors is an all American Electric Car and Motorcycle company based in   New York. From Coach building, conversions, kit cars, production GT cars, Luxury models to NYC parks and recreational projects, Zeno Motors will be the 1st premiere privately owned limited production Electric Motor Company in the East coast (New York).  

"We want to make EXCITING ELECTRIC HIGH PERFORMANCE CARS & VEHICLES with the latest ideas and technology, not science looking Experiments"

Our First vehicles 

I am sure you've realized that Electric vehicles are the prosperous future in the automotive industry. So for our contributors we will like to give generous perks, discounts including cost/wholesale pricing on any of our exciting vehicles during this INDIEGOGO campaign. 

Design & Development by ARCH-ANGEL DESIGNS 

ARCH-ANGEL DESIGN is a design house that will create most of ZENO MOTORS vehicles and accessories. They will also help and develop other products for inventors, product designers and 3rd party accounts. Our design house will be responsible for target setting, concept, engineering design, manufacturing feasibility, release and sign-off of their individual components and contracts to other companies.

What We Need & What You Can Get

We are asking $850.000 for the following:

  • Start-up, certifications, Paperwork 
  • Tools, Small Factory, materials & milling machines, 3-D printers 
  • Development of our X GT SUPER CLASSIC. (2 cars and pre-order prep)
  • Prototype/Development of our Electrocycle Demonio. (2 motorcycles)
  • Prototype/Development of our performance car Siren GT  
  • Showroom/Assembly/Factory
  • Road Test, safety and Inspections 
  • Small marketing campaigns, up-grade website
  • Develop special Zeno Motors Apps and web Channel 
  •  Special Financing programs for customers 
Starting an Automotive company is certainly not easy Task.  Before developing our vehicles, Excessive "Red Tape", regulations, homologation and the proper tools need to be required to make it happen.

NOTE:We are aiming to make more than 500 vehicles within the first 5 years including Specials and Pre-Orders. 

LETS BUILD YOUR DREAM CAR!
 As many big companies are busy mass producing the same cars. We are providing the Zeno Custom Dream project. Zeno Motors and Arch-Angel Designs will coachbuild/develop your car to your taste and unique style with using our Electric Motor power-trains.
  • Sports Car
  • Luxury Sedans
  • Suv
  •  Exotic car 
  • Classic Styled Cars

This is only the beginning of something new and exciting. 
 
We also do conversions! 

Our INDIEGOGO PERKS for Contributors will have the the opportunity to:
  • Test Drive all our New Cars for Free.
  • The weekend Drive or Ride Experience: A chance to drive our vehicle for 2 days.
  • A chance to Purchase any of our vehicles at cost prices. 
  • Invitation to all our Events and Exclusive launch parties.
Although everyone over who contributes will receive generous gift.  
Check out our great perks including your chance to drive home the magnificent       X GT at an amazing Indiegogo low price offer. 

or you can reserve your DEMONIO Electrocycle at our special Indiegogo price.     This is your chance to have one of the WORLDS FIRST 10 limited Edition magnificently Styled Cruiser with modern Electric Technology.

DEMONIO ELECTRO-MOTORCYCLE 

Introducing the worlds most advanced Limited Edition Chopper Styled Cruiser Electric bike, the DEMONIO. Years of research and development have resulted in the most advanced, innovative yet most compelling Motorcycle in the industry. The stunning looks with next generation motorcycle technology is penned by Angel Santana Zeno of Arch-Angel Designs



Our Solution & Impact

BY 2025 all automobile companies must meet the US Economy standards for cars and trucks. Manufacturers of today find it complicated to develop such fuel efficient vehicles. Our solution is to go fully Electric on all our fleets so that we don't have to worry about such standards.

The trend on electric cars has been increasing due to new innovative ideas, more efficient batteries and big companies building industry competitive cars from Tesla, Nissan, Mercedes Benz, Toyota and now Apple.  

Zeno Motors will not only meet the standards but will also find more innovative ways and technology for higher output, efficiency, maximum performance for growth and a better future.


Why Zeno Motors in New York?

The project site location will be held in New York along with Founders of Arch-Angel Designs. Zeno Motors will have an impact of growth and opportunity for New York's economy including jobs and outsources. We feel the need to cover and create such a car company for the east coast. They are plenty of tech, Industrial Innovative companies and manufacturers we can utilize in New York similar to companies in Silicon Valley (California) or Detroit . We firmly believe that being/thinking outside the box including developing in New York will give us a exclusive niche, luxurious feel and unique advantage. Besides, the first Electric cars in the early 1900`s first roamed in the east coast and streets of New York (The 1st US Industrial Mecca)

How much range will a car have?

We will give the customer the option to choose from 150hour up to 350hour battery packs on our Super Classic GT or Siren GT car. Prices vary on the battery you choose. You can also upgrade at a later time and will keep you posted on our new Battery Technology you may choose to purchase.

How can I maintain my vehicle?

Although the parts and components of an Electric car is 50% less than gasoline car, You will find it less complicated and easier to understand how your vehicle works. Our Youtube Channel and Manual will give you step by step on how to clean and maintain a healthy vehicle. Also at time of delivery we will give you important information and a run over all the components and features of your new car.

Will my Vehicle have RE-GEN braking? 

All our vehicles will have Re-Gen Braking which you can turn on or off depending on your driving style. 

How long will it take to charge my car or Motorcycle? 

We will include Universal FCP (Fast Charge Plugs) on all our vehicles. Approximate times on battery charges are: 

  • Fast Charge: 15 to 30 minutes (est.) 
  • Direct DC: 30 minutes (est.) 
  • 220volts: 1hour 30 minutes (est) 
  • 110volts: 10 to 14 hours (est) 

Where do I send my vehicle if its damaged or needs repairs?

Depending on how far you live, we will either send out a specialist or pick up your vehicle for any damages or repairs. The time frame can be anywhere from a day to a month depending on how far you live and how bad are the damages.

Customer Support & information with our Zeno Motors App or Youtube 


A Past Project Idea that started it all 

Other ways you can help

If your excited about our ideas yet cannot contribute at this time you can STILL HELP. Tell your folks what Zeno Motors is all about so they can also get the word out on this exciting new venture and upcoming new Motor company.                                  

Zeno Motor is not only for America, its for a greener world.
Yours Truly
Angel G Santana Zeno

Visit our website
http://www.zenomotors.com/home.html

story:
Let's Keep Imagine: Play Around for Year 4 and Beyond!

Imagine: Play began as an idea just over three years ago of providing a local, unplugged play place where children and families could gather to bond through play.  The question our family gambled on was that Yamhill County is large enough to support a user-fee supported play place.  However, we've reached nearly three years of being open, and the business has yet to be able to cover labor costs or even consistently cover all operating expenses. In the meantime, we've reached a small but steady following from Salem, Polk County and Washington County families who find our little play place worth the drive.  We feel like we could be on the brink of expanding to the steady numbers that will support Imagine: Play, but have run out of ability to make the further investments needed to push past the three year barrier.

We've identified three issues that we can solve to bring in a higher rate of attendance and with it a sustaining income.  With this campaign we ask our community for the additional investment needed to address those, pushing us past year three and solidly into year four.  Help us continue to be a part of the Yamhill County community, and here for our neighbors in Washington, Marion and Polk Counties as well.

What We Need & What You Get

Imagine: Play's attendance levels are good when the weather is bad, and bad when the weather is good.  Offering an outdoor play area will solve this warm weather problem. We've gained permission to cordon off an area just outside the big bay doors where we can place sandboxes and ride-on toys.  This addition will bring in families and consistent income, providing a long-term solution.

The second portion of our campaign is aimed at solving the problem of too few people knowing that Imagine: Play exists.  Improved signage on the building, official ODOT tourist attraction signs on the highway and a cost effective "gap coverage" Highway 18 billboard plus increased advertising will help us reach more families both in Yamhill County and in neighboring counties, 

The last portion of our campaign involves catching up on assorted replacements and improvements, as well as investing in services to streamline processes.  This will free the owner/manager to focus on adding features and events that will increase patronage and with it, business income.  Having new themed play areas rotate in and out, and organizing events such as Pirate Day and Science Night will keep our offerings fresh and new, and our guests interested in returning regularly.

Our campaign is almost entirely reward-based.  We  believe in the win-win situation, in offering a worthwhile value.  Although there is a place for simple cash contributions, our focus is on perks that will have meaning and value for your investment.

Breakdown of our ambitious funding goal:

$8,800 Outdoor play area

$7,100 Improved signage on building, ODOT highway signs, one year advertising budget and purchase a ‘gap placement’ highway 18 billboard ad

$2,500 Replace Bounce House

$3,600 One year cleaning service

$3,200 Insurance

$1,200 One year online booking calendar with payment processing and credit/debit card processing service

$1,200 Indoor additions and replacements

(See the comments for further description of each category)

By Investing, You Join Our Team

Our family has funded this and worked hard to be here offering unplugged, healthy fun for Yamhill County Families for nearly three years.  Our team of volunteers has been generous with their time, helping expand our open play hours so there are more opportunities to come learn and bond through play.  Imagine: Play provides an important outlet for development and growth in the ways that kids naturally learn- through social, creative and active play.  Will you help us complete year three and launch into year four on a steady base, and answer that need for an outdoor space? I hope you can join our family and team, and help continue this wonderful place to gather, play, bond and grow.

Our Last Ditch Effort 

Without a successful campaign, Imagine: Play will close for good on May 9th. This is when our business license expires, and shortly after our insurance runs out.  It is also when we can anticipate income will once again drop below the levels needed to even cover basic non-labor monthly expenses. We still have a small amount of debt owed from covering last year's annual insurance payment plus May's lease and other expenses that we could not pay when the weather turned wonderful in April- and lasted for seven months.  This makes us unable to incur additional debt to invest any more. The business must be built to a level that will allow a small salary for a part time manager as well.  Three year's worth of donating our time and terming it 'sweat equity' is our limit.  A paid manager is reasonable and essential;  even non-profits do not rely solely on volunteer labor.

Other Ways You Can Help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign
  • Join our volunteer co-op staffing group to help us maintain extended hours 
  • Suggest the "billboard" perk to the places where you do business
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out and steer people to our campaign page

This is when our business license expires, and shortly after our insurance runs out.  It is also when we can anticipate income will once again drop below the levels needed to even cover basic non-labor monthly expenses. We still have a small amount of debt owed from covering last year's annual insurance payment plus May's lease and other expenses that we could not pay when the weather turned wonderful in April- and lasted for seven months.  This makes us unable to incur additional debt to invest any more. The business must be built to a level that will allow a small salary for a part time manager as well.  Three year's worth of donating our time and terming it 'sweat equity' is our limit.  A paid manager is reasonable and essential;  even non-profits do not rely solely on volunteer labor.

    Other Ways You Can Help:
  Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign
Join our volunteer co-op staffing group to help us maintain extended hours 
Suggest the "billboard" perk to the places where you do business Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out and steer people to our campaign page

story:
Hello! My name is Linda Boudousquie, and I'm the owner of the Dark Entry, an alternative fashion and jewelry store in Berkeley. I’ve owned the store for about  17 years now after it opened in New Orleans in 1999—those first five years were some of my best. The store made enough money to open a second location in Berkeley and I thought everything was going to work out great—but then Hurricane Katrina had her say. In one night, that first store that I had put so much of my effort into was taken away. I had to put everything into a desperate relocation to the new store in Berkeley—a store that was barely up and running and hadn’t turned a profit yet. Making it work was my only option though, so that’s what I did.

After several years building my business back up from square one, things were starting to look promising again—and then I was struck by a drunk driver in 2008. My hip was fractured in three places and I couldn't walk for almost four months. Without any employees, and minimal support, I somehow managed to keep the store just above water. The money I got from the insurance companies covered my medical bills, but it didn’t make much a dent in the months of rent and credit card debt the business had incurred. I never once thought about giving up; the road to recovery for me and my store looked hard, but it was my only option, so I went.

By 2011 I still hadn't managed to pay off all of the store’s debts, but I was chipping away at them! Retail everywhere was slower than ever, but I was catering to a wonderful niche of customers in Berkeley that were looking for things they couldn’t yet easily find on the internet. I couldn’t afford to hire any new employees, but with help from family and friends, I started working on a new website to reach more customers on the internet. The weight of all the debt I was carrying, however, along with death in the family and my mother getting a diagnosis of cancer that year, left me in a daze. I was completely overwhelmed, and by the end of that year, I had fallen $40,000 behind on rent.

I finally found the strength to pull things together and get the store back on track again, and even managed to pay off half of the past-due rent last month, but an ultimatum from my landlord came down today: pay off the remaining $20,000 in the next 15 days, or close our doors forever. I was losing hope after I heard that, up until one of my customers pointed out that The Dark Entry has over 58,000 fans following our Facebook page, and that if even half of you are willing to donate just $1, it won't be the end!

I really need your help, and I will give everyone who offers it something in return: every one of you that loves this store enough to support will receive a gift card for 20-25% more than the amount of their donation, as well as thank you letters written by me personally! Every gift card will be transferable with no expiration date and will be honored online as soon as the store is back on its feet again. I really appreciate you taking the time to read this plea for help. Thank all of you who find it in your hearts to make a donation!

Sincerely,

Linda Boudousquie
Owner, The Dark Entry

story:
Short Summary

Welcome! I am Erin Cosgrove, a mother of four amazing humans and a hairstylist with over 20 years experience in the Hair Industry. For the last twelve years I have served as a manager and hairstylist in a barber shop. In addition to having my cosmetologist license, I am certified in many different services including, keratin treatments, hair extensions, haircutting along with several different product lines. Attending continuing education to constantly elevate my quality of work in the client's best interest is a priority.  After so many years of working with the public, they have taught me so much about what their hair appointment means to them. I have reflected on this a great deal, and have decided that there is just a better way to do it, between professionalism and an eco-conscious awareness.

This campaign is important to me for a multitude of reasons.  Here are some of them:

  • To have the ability support my family through an industry that I know and love. 
  • To create an inviting environment that you are excited to return to everytime
  • To reduce my carbon footprint and waste impact in an industry that uses a great amount of energy as well as creates an enormous amount of waste.
  • Lastly, to continue working with amazing people and crafting tailored hairstyles that compliment their lifestyles.

Through your contribution you will not only be helping me to achieve my dream of owning a salon, but you will also be giving my family a means of sustainability. Additionally, you will be helping me to create an environment for highly skilled hairstylists and barbers to deliver impeccable services to clients as well as to the needs of the local community. 

If you are not able to contribute anything to this campaign, please share this that is a tremendous help. Every little bit counts ! Thank you so much for your support <3

story:
Lemons to Lemonade!

Volkswagen, the company that brought us the original successful “lemon” in the VW Beetle back in the 1960’s has done it again with different results in the Turbocharged Direct Injection (TDI’s) built from 2009-2015.

We all now know that VW intentionally mis-lead consumers and governments worldwide by installing a “cheat device” in the software of these vehicles to detect and circumvent air pollution tests. http://abcnews.go.com/Business/volkswagen-diesel-car-drivers/story?id=33983297

When we bought our TDI's, we did our research and we paid a little more for the enjoyment of the drive and the privilege of demonstrating responsibility for our planet. We have been dealt lemons and we will not “hold tight”. We are proactive consumers and citizens, who search for positive solutions.

What's the deal with this campaign?

There are many class action lawsuits happening throughout the country and rest assured, we should all be a part of one, but this campaign has two simple goals:

  1. Unite and map all of the TDI’s in the United States (and potentially elsewhere)
  2. Provide a potential positive solution for Volkswagen to invest in on our behalf

How can I help?

  • Contribute only $5 per TDI vehicle owned (only affected vehicles ranging from 2009 to 2015, of Volkswagen Jettas, Golfs, Passats, Beetles and Audi A3)
  • Provide your zip code with four digit suffix if possible (example: 98512-6352)

Why?

  • The small dollar amount is meant to act as a vote, not just a fundraising tool. One vote, per vehicle.
  • Each vote will be entered into a mapping system and provide a clear picture of where the TDI’s are clustered
  • These clusters will provide the locations for the expanded positive solution
  • Funds will be donated to the Plant for the Planet near you: http://climatesolutions.org/plant-planet
  • You'll also get a vehicle sticker that displays your participation in this campaign

The End Game - A Positive Solution for Volkswagen to rebuild brand trust

  1. They will create and replace the affected TDI’s Vehicle Emissions Detector with a unit that will allow for B-100 diesel to be run in our vehicles and maintain our warranties: http://www.afdc.energy.gov/fuels/biodiesel_blends.html
  2. They will invest in and build B-100 diesel fueling sites at the clustered locations mapped from this campaign: http://www.afdc.energy.gov/fuels/biodiesel_infrastructure.html
Note: B-100 still comes with NOx challenges, but this stretch goal may help solve these issues, while greatly reducing many other greenhouse gases.

Volkswagen reportedly has over 7 Billion dollars set aside for reparations and damages on this issue. If you are anything like the other TDI owners – we are willing to take a risk to change the world!

TDI Owners Unite and let's have this be the tipping point to true clean diesel.

Please contribute.

story:
Thanks to everyone for the support, but please keep your money.


This project, unfortunately, is dead.
We tried. And then we tried again.
Neither time did it take, but this time, the support is too low to be able to do anything with. We were hoping to get close to our goal, but with only $665 raised in a week, the hard facts are that this project will not succeed.
We may revive sometime in the future, but don't expect it to happen for a long time, if at all.
Thanks to everyone who supported and shared this project during both campaigns. We appreciate your support, and it saddens us to call it off, however it is the realistic and responsible thing to do.
If you have already supported the project, please request a refund; here's how to do that:
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367
Thanks and stay caffeinated!
Marc and Megan

story:
Isla’s Boutique evolved from the passions of its founders to create beautiful floral arrangement’s for celebrating those special moments in life with family and friends.  However, sometimes flowers are not enough for every special occasion. We believed there had to be another way, a better way.  Relying on our experience, customers suggestions and the help of our dedicated team we developed a unique concept to better celebrate your special occasions.       

Our concept is to create specialty gift boxes (Isla’s Box) for any special occasion or holiday.        (Weddings, Birthdays, New Baby, Christmas,  Mother's day, Father's day, New home,  etc..) 

 In addition to the specially selected items in your box, every box comes with a choice of:

1.  Chocolate Almonds, Jelly Beans, Brownies or other Delightful Treats.

2.  A Beautiful Floral Bouquet or Plant

 3.  An Alcoholic or Non-Alcoholic Beverage

 

 

 

  Lady Spa Box

Treat that special  person to a wonderful experience with our ladies spa box.  Our company line  of luxurious soaps, bath salts, body butters and facial scrubs come in different soothing aromas  and are made with all natural  based ingredients.  

 

Joyful Baby Box

Celebrate the special  moment with one of Isla's joyful baby boxes.   Each box is designed with baby safe products to help care for the precious new baby and comes with our special  monogrammed Isla's bear.    

 

 Sports Fan Box

Baseball, Football, Basket Ball, fans of any sport, we have a box for them.  They can watch the big game in full gear,  while enjoying a snack and their favorite drink.  Our sports box is a TOUCHDOWN  for any sports fan.  

 

WHAT'S ON YOUR MIND !

Customized Service

We have it

 

Our customized service allows you to create a truly special and personalized gift box.  Tell our specialist what you want and they will help you create that truly special gift.  Customers  will be able to select items from our online store or items can be obtained from other sources and added to your box.  

                                       

 AND MORE

 

 

The past 18 months have been like the "Wizard of Oz"  and this ain't Kansas.   The process of getting our liquor License,  store and warehouse build out, building website, box design, trademark, staffing and so much more, was like a tornado.  But with courage (the lion) we did it and Isla's Box is ready to market.  However, we have one more yellow brick road to follow, in order to reach our goal  for a nation-wide distribution of Isla's Box to a national market.  So while thinking (the scarecrow), how do we do this, a good witch came into the store and told us to ask the wizard of Indigogo.   And the wizard with all his wisdom said  "All things true and fine ask the wonderful people to be kind."   So we went to work and with the help of Isla's munchkins (our staff)  we created this campaign.  We are now in the middle of a big capital funding push to raise 185,000 dollars to be used in support of our national goal for Isla's Box.  But we need your help and financial support to meet our funding goal and help send Isla's Box to every home.

  The funds will be spent in the areas outlined in the chart below:    

 

 

As we work toward this funding goal, we can't forget the tin man's wish to have a heart.  At Isla's Boutique we are passionate about our business and the jobs that we create,  but it is our heart  that defines who we are and our heart will always be in Isla's garden.

 

                                                    " At the end of every rainbow is a pot of gold.                                                          For every gift given there is a blessing to be bestowed."   

Isla's garden is our non-profit organization established to financially support small community based charities.  These  community based charities are often the first responders  for families in need.  However,  they receive little to no financial support from government agencies or national charities.  These community charities help to establish stability and provide continued care for families during difficult times, planting seeds of hope and faith.   

Isla's boutique will donate 10% of profits, and host fund raising events to fund and support Isla's Garden in its mission to provide financial support and help grow these community charities that we call;   "Flowers of Hope." 

Our Garden is Growing

  • The Sophia Elizabeth Foundation - A flower of hope.                                                  

  • AAOIWSA - A flower of hope.                                                     

  • One Love Food Ministry - A flower of hope.              

  • Antelope Valley Young Marines - A flower of hope.                                                                                                

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a position to contribute to our campaign, but if you cannot contribute financially you can still help, by spreading the word about what we are doing.  We are so grateful to everyone who will help share and spread the word about our campaign!!!

Thank you for your support!!

One Love Food Ministry - A flower of hope.              
Antelope Valley Young Marines - A flower of hope.                                                                                                

 
Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a position to contribute to our campaign, but if you cannot contribute financially you can still help, by spreading the word about what we are doing.  We are so grateful to everyone who will help share and spread the word about our campaign!!!
Thank you for your support!!

story:
A Valid Occupation

As an occupational therapist, I am passionate about evidence-based practice, and staying connected with other OTs. I need your help in creating an awesome resource that can help OTs do both! 

A Valid Occupation(AVO) is a website designed just for occupational therapists. The core of AVO is a user-submitted database of resources, tagged and categorized to help you answer the clinical questions you have every day. Notebooks allow users to save, comment, and compile resources to help you stay committed to informed practice. Groups and forums allow for collaboration and communication with other occupational therapists. A Valid Occupation is a global solution to connect, define, and increase the profile of occupational therapy.

Our Needs

I need help with funding the development of A Valid Occupation. Your contribution will go toward these costs. My goal is for A Valid Occupation to be an affordable resource for occupational therapists globally, and be supported through donations. As a initial supporter of A Valid Occupation, you will receive a special icon for your AVO profile upon launch. 

After launch, AVO's users are crucial to its success. As an AVO user, you will be able to add, modify, and save the resources in the database - without your help we won't succeed! Users will be able to post in the forums, chat with other OTs, and answer clinical questions. 

Our Mission

Occupational therapy is a valuable and global profession. A Valid Occupation will unite therapists around the world and improve our professional profile. It is my hope that this website will become a repository of information that will help OTs:

  • locate resources across many databases
  • locate unpublished research 
  • implement intervention research into day-to-day practice
  • create evidence-based handouts for patients, caregivers, and 3rd party payers
  • connect practicing therapists with researchers 
  • connect therapists with others who are working in the same population or setting, who may be separated geographically
  • connect therapists who are working within a community or facility
  • support students of occupational therapy programs and new/transitioning practitioners 
  • identify areas of practice that are lacking in existing research
  • develop a taxonomy of the field of occupational therapy 

How You Can Help

If you can't donate, please consider supporting A Valid Occupation by spreading the word!

Follow A Valid Occupation on Facebook and Twitter and share this fundraiser with other occupational therapists you know. 

The bigger a community we build, the better and richer a resource A Valid Occupation can be!

A Valid Occupation is a global solution to connect, define, and increase the profile of occupational therapy.   Our Needs
I need help with funding the development of A Valid Occupation. Your contribution will go toward these costs. My goal is for A Valid Occupation to be an affordable resource for occupational therapists globally, and be supported through donations. As a initial supporter of A Valid Occupation, you will receive a special icon for your AVO profile upon launch. 
After launch, AVO's users are crucial to its success. As an AVO user, you will be able to add, modify, and save the resources in the database - without your help we won't succeed! Users will be able to post in the forums, chat with other OTs, and answer clinical questions.    Our Mission Occupational therapy is a valuable and global profession. A Valid Occupation will unite therapists around the world and improve our professional profile. It is my hope that this website will become a repository of information that will help OTs:


locate resources across many databases
locate unpublished research 
implement intervention research into day-to-day practice
create evidence-based handouts for patients, caregivers, and 3rd party payers
connect practicing therapists with researchers 
connect therapists with others who are working in the same population or setting, who may be separated geographically
connect therapists who are working within a community or facility
support students of occupational therapy programs and new/transitioning practitioners 
identify areas of practice that are lacking in existing research
develop a taxonomy of the field of occupational therapy 


    How You Can Help If you can't donate, please consider supporting A Valid Occupation by spreading the word!
Follow A Valid Occupation on Facebook and Twitter and share this fundraiser with other occupational therapists you know. 
The bigger a community we build, the better and richer a resource A Valid Occupation can be!

story:
Do you wish you had secrets?


What are you doing about it?

Hello, everyone!

I've written the original Encrypted Notepad in 2010, because I had an itch to scratch: I needed a convenient, easy to use and uncomplicated way to write down information I wanted kept secret. I also needed these encrypted files to be in sync with my Android-based mobile phone.
I didn't want to use external command-line tools, large applications, complex protocols, or anything else which would distract me from the simple workflow of:

  1. Write some text
  2. Hit Ctrl-S to save it, enter a password
No fuss, no unnecessary clicks, no problems.

So I wrote it in the shortest time possible and without big plans, and it apparently became a reasonably popular product in its category. It works on Windows, OS X and Linux, as well as on Android. 5 years later, it is still downloaded around 50 times a week (based on SourceForge's metrics). Think about it - software which is 5 years old and hadn't received almost no updates, and it's still getting used!

It's high time I did a decent update for it!

Here's what I'm promising

I basically want to do a complete rewrite, a new version of Encrypted Notepad, with the following headlining features:

  1. No ads, no network communication - like the current Encrypted Notepad, this will be a stand-alone application, not a "cloud" service. You are in control where you save your files (even if you do end up saving them on Dropbox or something like it - your choice remains your own).
  2. Open source - like the current version, you can inspect what I did (or pay someone else to inspect it) and be sure that what I'm saying here is actually what appears in the code. Licensed under the BSD license. Will appear on GitHub.
  3. A standardized file format - the current version saves files in a custom format. The new version will save in the PGP "ASCII-armoured" format, which can be opened by 3rd party applications. While doing this, I also want to make the app more robust, fixing bugs present in the current version.
  4. Desktop and Android versions - I firmly believe there is a need to share encrypted data between the desktop and the mobile devices. The actual way this sharing is to happen is up to you - either do it manually or use an external service.
  5. User interface improvements - it's fair to say that the 2010. version of Encrypted Notepad had an UI which is ... rudimentary ... to say the least. I want to make it more usable. Meaning: a modern look, better Find function, easier way to navigate between multiple documents.
It goes without saying that I will not compromise on the security. Only standard algorithms and practices will be used for encryption, like AES-256-CBC and SHA-256. If you don't know what it means, simply be at ease that no experimentation will occur. This is familiar territory for me.

Why should you trust me?

People who consciously use encryption are often those who are acutely aware of the concept and the problems associated with trust. When you choose to trust me, you can do it for any of the following reasons:
  • I'm an experienced systems developer, working on operating systems and with kernel development experience for 10+ years.
  • Encryption is a personal and professional interest to me, and I have a history of small-scale encryption projects. The most important thing I've learned here is to be careful and avoid experimentation in the implementation.
  • I will also use Encrypted Notepad 2 daily.
So give me a shout and if you want a better, more convenient encrypted notepad for yourself and the society at large, think about backing this project!

Timeline and deliverables

  • This crowdfunding campaign lasts 2 months (60 days), which means I will start working on the project by Summer 2015. You should expect the first usable version of Encrypted Notepad 2 soon after, and at most by Fall.
  • Long story short, you and the world will get a simple text editor (think "Notepad") which saves to the PGP native ".asc" encrypted file format, with symmetric encryption.
This new version is to have all the features from this document, plus whatever is suggested by the users with contributor perks and whatever other features become convenient during the initial development. 

The features will be implemented as a desktop (Java, Cross-platform) application and as an Android mobile device application.
Stretch-goals, if reached, will include making an iOS application.

This is an all-or-nothing campaign because I believe the idea it presents deserves to get full attention to details, without half-assing it, without cutting corners.

story:
What's your plan?

Well, to put it simply… We are planning to sell Mediterranean products via our eshop.

So, you are talking about retail then?

Nope! We are aiming to offer two solutions!

  • e-Retail: targeting the markets of Europe, U.S.A and Canada, and 
  • e-Wholesale: for the rest of the world

e-Retail…

We will implement an innovative approach which drastically reduces the regular costs, thus enabling our Mediterranean products to be delivered to the clients' doorstep 

a) at very competitive prices (shipping fees included) compared to the local grocery stores, supermarkets and other e-shops,  

b) in super-fast delivery times, and

c) with no minimum order quantity

The main amount (€ 245k) will be used for buying and handling the 1st shipment of products; basic part of our strategy for low prices is to achieve economies of scale by buying large quantities from the producers,

whereas the rest will be used for expenses relevant to the successful entry in the 1st market (U.K.); Please see the Impact tables below.

Will the e-Retail project be available in the U.K. only, at first?

No, our products will be available for delivery to all the markets of Europe, U.S.A and Canada.

… & e-Wholesale!

Our wholesale approach is a state-of-the-art platform, never done before in the industry!

Until now we were used to the regular B2B platforms, which are connecting producers with importers/distributors... and that's it!

In other words, all they do is reaching until the point of contact details' exchange. All the rest remain as usual as the international trading has been conducted for hundreds of years now!

This project will be groundbreaking, since it will be a fully automated platform, which will allow import managers to view the catalog, place an order and monitor the whole shipping process, via our online platform, until the products reach their destination!

We’re aiming to bring the simplicity of retail online shopping to the B2B/wholesale world.


So in other words…

Our Vision

is to raise awareness and to promote the benefits of the Mediterranean diet, by selling Mediterranean products with the use of e-Retail and e-Wholesale sale platforms!

How will we do this?

By attracting more and more people to start consuming Mediterranean products!

We are talking about products of exceptional quality in prices much lower than the competition!

With the Mediterranean flavors, we opt to make healthy eating & drinking an everlasting festivity!

And it gets better; we will help you learn how to cook in Mediterranean style with our Mediterranean Recipes ebook!


Our Goal this Year



The Impact

A great article regarding the Mediterranean diet:

The Mediterranean diet - An enigma 

According to MedicalNewsToday.com, the Mediterranean diet, compared to other Western diets, was seen by others as a bit of an enigma. 

Although fat consumption is high, the prevalence of hypertension, cardiovascular disease, obesity, cancer and diabetes has always been significantly lower in Mediterranean countries than northern European countries and the USA. 

The American diet is more similar to the northern European diet - with high red meat consumption, greater consumption of butter and animal fats, and a lower intake of fruit and vegetables, compared to the eating habits of Italy, Greece, southern France, and Spain.

What are the benefits of the Mediterranean diet?

  • It's good for your heart and cardiovascular system!
  • It can prevent diabetes!
  • It helps prevent a genetic risk of stroke!
  • It can slow the aging process!
  • It can protect the memory!
  • It can reduce the risk of endometrial cancer!


The Perks

Just for saying "thank you" for your contribution, we are offering the perks below.

Find out more about the Mediterranean diet and it's benefits

The benefits of the Mediterranean diet are numerous. A simple search on any search engine, will get you thousands web sites. We've gathered some below:

Harvard Medical School - Adopt a Mediterranean diet now for better health later

CNN - Eating the Mediterranean diet may lead to a longer life

The Huffington Post - Mediterranean Diet benefits

WebMD - Mediterranean Diet: An Overview

EatingWell - 8 ways to follow the Mediterranean diet for Better health

Patient.info - Health benefits of the Mediterranean diet

Mercola - Mediterranean Diet Linked to Healthier Brain


Beyond money— we need your help spreading the word

Whether you choose to contribute to our campaign or not, you can still help make history by spreading the word on Facebook or Twitter.

It helps more than you think!


FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions)

1. Is shipping included in the price of each perk?

Yes, it is! Shipping fees are included for delivery everywhere in the world!

2. If the project doesn’t reach its funding goal, do I get my money back?

Of course! That's the reason, why we opted for Fixed Funding!

More questions? Please contact us at info-at-mecfb.com


Note: The above pictures do not consitute depictions of the final products.

story:
AmbiLock™ // Security for your modern life

Locks have one basic function: To keep people out. But if you lose a key or forget a password, the person kept out is the one person who needs to get in.  AmbiLock™ is the secure lock that doesn't rely on either. Form and Function: meet your new lock.


/// ABOUT Ambi.io

Ambi is a collaboration from a bunch of curious, jovial, semi crazy tech folk living all around the Bay Area. Members of Ambi have consulted for or are/been employed with with various companies including: Hitachi, G-Technology, Boxbee.com, Handle.com, Teamblueotter.com, Fabrik, Roxio, Glam Media, Stanford Learning, SinoSol, Clever Solar, WestEd, Matchframe, Reach Media, Sportgenic, Sonic Solutions, Business Objects, etc... so yeah, we have some experience.


/// WTF is the AmbiLock™

Well, its the next generation of the classic lock, of course. Your keychain's already bulky enough (i'm looking at you Mr. huge bottle opener keychain guy), and there are already enough passwords swirling around your noggin. AmbiLock™ doesn't rely on either of those archaic methods. Instead, all you need is either your mobile phone OR a customizable swipe combination, and it's unlocked and ready to go. For iPhone 5s and newer users, unlocking is at your fingertips (literally, using Touch ID*). It's tough to lose that...unless you have, in which case much love and empathy. So, ditch the keys/memory and lower your stress level with AmbiLock™.

*Fingerprint is used to open the AmbiLock™ iOS mobile application.


/// HOW IT WORKS

Unlike locks with a single method for entry, AmbiLock™ comes with an array of features. What you can do with it:

  • Program your own personal swipe pattern on the Ambi touchscreen. (think Android phone lock screens)

  • Use BlueTooth to unlock Ambi with your phone.  (it links to your phone and uses iBeacon/Low power Bluetooth technology to open the lock when you're nearby nearby)

  • Unlock the AmbiLock™ app using your fingerprint (for iPhone 5s+ users).

  • Share the lock's electronic permissions with others. This option can be set for one-time or constant use.

/// BATTERY LIFE - WE GOT THIS COVERED

AmbiLock™ solves the big problem that other electronic locks on the market have: Battery power. It is powered with beefy coined sized batteries. However, we know locks can stay put for months, maybe even years, before they're called into action. And all that time, the battery's slowly draining. As such, we've developed AmbiLock™ to remain engaged during a loss of power, and for the batteries to be swapped out with ordinary, easy-to-find batteries.  No need to replace obscure batteries or use confusing “jump start” methods with AmbiLock™. Just take out the slot on the bottom of the AmbiLock™, pop out the battery, put a new one in and you're back in business.

We are shooting for one year of battery life with active use and 5 years with minimal use.


/// MOBILE APP: iOS and Androidary support

// COMPATIBILITY - iOS 8, Android flavor Lollipop


// UNLOCK HISTORY - The AmbiLock™ creates a history* that allows users to track who's used the lock and when they've used it.  This is Perfect for the office or home!

*History data is kept on the firmware.


// FINGERPRINT ACCESS - Remember those old sci-fi movies that showed space pirates locking and unlocking doors using only their fingerprints? Well, that technology's finally here. For users with iOS that supports Touch ID, AmbiLock™ allows them to open the iOS app pressing their fingerprint on the touchscreen. Yes you already have your phone locked but isn't extra security always better? (especially if your kid is trying to get into your fun box)


// PAIRING - You can pair up to 100 Ambi's with one mobile device.


// SECURITY - We realize that the above all else the bells and whistles don't matter if the physical lock doesn't work. So, for AmbiLock™, we utilized a superman level steel skeleton, with an anodized aluminum skin. This allows us to provide tough as nails construction while freeing the outside skin to achieve more design possibilities. Locks can be pretty too. We developed the AmbiLock™ with best practices encryption software, to make sure hacking is kept at bay. When the AmbiLock™ is engaged, it will provide the same amount of security as other top locks in the market.


// WEATHER RESISTANT - Though you can’t throw it in the pool, we have designed the lock to weather...well, the weather.


// DIG THE COLORS - Show off your own personal style with a tonne of different color options: Red, white, blue, black, gold, yellow, orange, purple and silver. (You will receive an email to select the color shortly before we ship)

 We want to thank everyone in advance for their support!
