(You will receive an email to select the color shortly before we ship)  We want to thank everyone in advance for their support! /// Shipping Costs  - We estimate customers in the USA will need to pay ~(usd) $7 - $10 per order.  - International customers will be on a country specific basis. We estimate ~ (usd)        $15-$20 per order.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
So Here we are again, looking for that free lunch. 

Help me secure my educational future. I am starting to hit the financial wall of education, but with a mental desire to keep learning. Please help me learn more so I can help out my fellow humans

The idea here. I need a car. Looking for some help from the internet. 

If you fund this project you will get simple rewards that I hope you agree are fair. This project is to crowdsource a vehicle for my personal ownership and care. 

Will be looking into Uber driving. 

All rewards are based on Point A to point B travel. One voucher per ride. Limitations may apply for all situations. Avaiblbity may be restricted. 

Funding this project will allow the purchase of a used Tesla Model S and all of the registration/Issuance for a complete first year, and maybe even beyond at a little bit. 

Fund this project get a cool deal and know that you did a good deed. 

Feel free to tweet me @AdamGaron686 with any concerns or questions

I will periscope, live stream, ustream, vine, insta-video, snapchat, and youtube as much of this campaign as possible. Just sent me a tweet and let's chat. But, also make sure to donate. This is a real project. And yes one dollar a ride. Enjoy your life, and help me enjoy mine. 

This is a work-in-progress Campaign so please stay tuned for more information. Just wanted to start the event. 


Will adjust for interested backers. Please contact me in an effort for transparency via twitter.


Thanks for Your help

story:
"WE ARE THE FUTURE"

  •      We are a group of students and we think that Architecture is the Power Tool for shaping a society and we have Architecture ....but what we have is old boring designs with the same boring shapes and that is a problem for us ....the students ...we don't get to show our designs and our projects end up in the garbage..
  • With this campaign we are trying to show our city and every other city in the world that the youth is the answer to the creativity issue that a lot of people suffer... But we say " Why should everything be simple in life? Why not to try the hard way? that is what we do...we are trying to show the world what the imagination of the youth can do... so that is why this is so important for me and my friends, but most important for the next generations....Everyone knows what a cube looks like... well NotExactly the way we see it... just a few of our projects..

  • By helping us you are embracing what was already obvious that young people like us need a little push so that we can get on the right track and help you fulfill your deepest desires and wishes...By helping us you are helping your children, brothers, cousins to express themselves ..Helping us to achieve our goal you will be awarded as well as having around 140 architects up your sleeve ...any time you want to make a change in your home or work place..


  •  These funds are for the student exhibitions and organization of the exhibition located at the biggest mall in our city as well as for making a web page for posting various project for free...but it all depends how much are you willing to push us and help us to achieve our goal.


  • For all those  that can not contribute by sending us some funds we will be glad if you believe in our cause and use some of the indiegogo share tools to promote us

story:
Accents matter


Language is more than mere words.

Accents give it life.

When it comes to Sanskrit, the language of gods, it matters a lot.

We would like to create an open source code to convert Sanskrit unaccented words into accented word.



As you can see the above image shows the accented version.
Our aim is to develop an algorithm and code which would take the unaccented word (पुरोहितं) as input and give accented word (पु॒रोहि॑तं)as output.

Impact


This would be the first of its kind effort in Sanskrit Natural Language Processing.
At the end of the project, we would be able to
  • Create a tool which can give accented version of unaccented words.
  • Create accented dictionaries out of unaccented database


Future implications

  • Though not included in scope of the present work, Sanskrit Text-To-Speech (TTS) convertors can also benifit from the output of this code, because the machine would know that it has to pronounce grave / acute accent properly.
  • The framework can be extended for other languages.


Project Time and Budget


Analysis of Sanskrit grammar texts - 300 hours
Preparation of algorithm - 200 hours
Preparation of code - 200 hours
Testing of code - 150 hours
Documentation of code - 150 hours

Total duration - 1000 man hours.

Per hour cost - 10 USD

Total project cost - 10,000 USD.

The Team

1. Dr. Dhaval Patel - Analysis of grammar texts, preparation of algorithm and code
2. Dr. Shivakumari Katuri - Testing and Documentation of the software.

Our previous efforts


We have already collaborated on two similar projects earlier.
1. Sanskrit noun form generator - https://github.com/drdhaval2785/SanskritSubanta/
2. Sanskrit Verb form generator - https://github.com/drdhaval2785/SanskritVerb/

Both of these projects are complete and their outcome is free for all.

Open source


This is the key word in whatever we do.
The code is free for all, whether the use is commercial or non-profit.
Your contribution would keep us doing service of Sanskrit.

story:
Short Summary:  We are the Vusizwe Community Trust

We are a community organisation that are owned and managed by a local, remote and rural community (KwaZangane basin) where no economic opportunities exist for our people

• We aim to achieve the sustainable regeneration of the community and address a range of economic, social, environmental and cultural issues

•We are independent but seek to work in partnership with other private, public and third sector organisations

•Our goal is to reduce dependency on Government grants by spearheading income generating innovations that will create employment through enterprise and the ownership of assets. 

•We plan to become involved in a very wide range of activities for the purpose of upliftment and progress in our area, and one of our ideas is to create a mountain bike and hike trail that will attract visitors from far and wide.

What We Need & What You Get

In order for us to is to create a gold standard, world class Bike and Hike Eco Tour circuit plus mass participation events that engages and benefits the people of the KwaZangane basin area we need to raise US$218 285

  • This will enable us to do trail breaking and enhancing of natural trails and game tracks.  This will be a 4 day trail tour circuit, but visitors will be able to select a 1, 2, 3 or 4 day experience should they wish.  The course will traverse through a beautiful region of the Eastern Cape and will take the visitor through places that have influenced the life and times of Nelson Mandela, as this is the area where he grew up.  
  • As one of our trail days include white water rafting down the mighty Mbashe River, we also need to purchase white water rafting equipment and establish a couple of piers and mooring points along the river.  We need to build river crossing points and also purchase a number of mountain bikes that will be hiring stock for visitors that come without their own mountain bikes. Kiosks and stock items such as water bottles, sun block, snacks and cold drinks need to set up as well.
  • Our guides and staff needs to be engaged and trained from unemployed people in the area, and the communities that will benefit will have to be advised on the servises that they can supply to the visitors such as accommodation, home stays, food, drink, local guiding, shopping, gifts etc...

What You Get

As a perk for you investing in us, we will send you a hand made gift from the people of the KwaZangashe basin and the Ama Zizi Kingdom.  The people work with their hands and are amazing artists. Depending on the size of your investment, you will be the recipient of  fantastic bead work, African jewelry, wood work, carvings, pottery, sewing or should you prefer a branded T-shirt, or buff, we can do that too.  Large donations will receive personal attention when visiting South Africa (flight tickets excluded) including short stays at big 5 game reserves and free accommodation in a charming Wild Coast holiday home

Pictured below is a few examples of perks that we offer for your donation

  • African Motive T Shirts and a Buff

  • Lucky dip of African Jewels - Hand made beaded jewelry

  • A selection of Big 5 glasses, from Tumblers dosn to shot glasses

  • Christmas Decorations - handmade ornaments, done by our local beaders

  • Coffee Table Books, beautyfully photographed on African Customs and Ceremonies

  • A Selection of African Masks are on offer.  Some are large pieces (over a meter tall and some are smaller pieces)

  • Experiential perks

  • and many many more






If we do not reach our goal

If we do not reach our goal, the funds will still be used toward the establishment of the trails plus community projects that has been earmarked by the Vusizwe Development trust, such as:

  • Our most important venture is to attract volunteer groups from first world countries to impart skills and knowledge, help us build and expose our children to other cultures
  • Land Rehabilitation & Greening:    

  • Clinic – Community Health Centre and Childcare and day care services

  • Environmental improvements

  • Tourism and tourist attractions, of which the Mountain Bike and Hike project is one

  • Adult education

  • E-learning and computer skills for all

  • Rain Water Harvesting

  • Women’s Farming Project 


The Impact

Benefits to the Community

The benefits of a high-quality trail in the area will include a healthier and more physically active local community, increase in the number of visitors and the length of their stay.  Having the Eco Trail and the public work together in true partnership by pooling resources to establish quality standards and facilities for mountain bikers and hikers will enable the destination to compete more aggressively. 

The community will benefit as the visitors are spending money whilst on the trails.   The most frequent needs by overnight travellers while on a trip or tour are:

  • Accommodation is required and this will benefit and small lodges, B&B’s and Homestays in the area
  • Daily meals are required on the road
  • Dining at restaurants that offer local ingredients and recipes for the full-on local experience
  • Drinking at local pubs
  • Security personnel is required throughout the trails, to ensure the safety of visitors and to create a feeling of comfort while using the trails
  • Visitors do shopping for clothing, mementos,info booklets, maps
  • Visitation to historical monuments and places of interest
  • The guides, transporters and maintenance staff will consist of local young people who have previously been unemployed 

Our Track Record

    Event Resources CC was established in 1997 and has had 17+ years in the field of organising and producing entertainment, sports and truck based roadshow events and upliftment projects all over South and Southern Africa as our credentials document will clearly show.

    We are an integral part of the Vusizwe Development Trust and serve as trustee as well as secretariat for the Trust

    We offer country-wide integrated, creative and project management services from our offices in Johannesburg and Eastern Cape.

    We run highly visible conferences, exhibitions, Government assemblies, public and media events that are in the public eye, and are frequently broadcast live on electronic media. 

    Event Resources also specializes in the designing, scripting and staging of Roadshows, Campaigns and Industrial Theatre 

    The members also served on the legendary NSL / Telkom Charity Trust Committee that was responsible for distributing over 40 Million Rand to the needy in South Africa and have more recently worked on the following socio economic campaigns:

    Zazi (giving young women and girls the strength to make more informed choices about their lives)

    Male Medical Circumcision campaign (reproductive health campaign for young men)

    Brothers for life’s “not in my name” rally (where men from all walks of life came together and pledged that no woman or child shall be infected/hurt/raped/bullied/mistreated in their name)

    Nationwide Arts and Crafts Imbizos (where visual artists and crafters could meet with decision makers and government to plot a more profitable way forward for these talented people) 

Risks & Challenges

Although the province is known as the home of legends (Nelson Mandela, Thabo Mbeki, Steve Biko, Walter & Adelaide Sisulu, Oliver Reginald Tambo, Chris Hani and many others were born or grew up here), the area is poor, underdeveloped and devoid of economic opportunities. 

That is why we need to create the eco trails here.  This can provide much needed employment for many people and further spinoffs to the communities along the trails

In some areas there are no water provision. Source of drinking water for the population is springs and rivers.  Careful planning is needed to make sure that our riders and hikers will be well hydrated when they use the trails.  It is part of our plans to ensure that water is available on the trails, which in turn will have positive spin-offs for the communities too 

 In some areas, there are no sanitation provision. Community uses bushes in the area.   It is part of our plan to erect ablution facilities along the trails

There are no fancy hotels in the area, but the local people will be able to benefit out of providing home stays and putting visitors up in local B & B's and guest houses, giving the participants a rare and pleasurable insight and experience of local culture

There is a lot to be done to make this dream a reality, but with adequate funding ir can happen and make a huge change in the lives of people in need

Addressing some of these challenges

Fortunately, the benefits far outweigh the risks and challenges

Our mission is to create a world class Bike and Hike Eco Tour circuit plus mass participation events that engages and benefits the KwaZangane basin area and at the same time take visitors past the areas that shaped the life of Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela

It is our intention to make this Eco Hike and Bike facility the gold standard for Mountain Bike and Hiking tourism

Ignite Community passion for this project as it will create employment and bring tourists to the area

Show off the many attractions in the areas:  Scenic beauty, stunning natural environment as well as sites of historical importance will make this an unforgettable Bike / Hike experience.  Visitors can also expect

Innovative bike and trail designs

Less crowds

Friendly people

Epic Experiences available

The facility will allow local persons and visitors to bike, hike and run through this most beautiful countryside for the purpose of bettering the lives of local communities who live along the trails. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Firstly to our potential friends and funders from all over the world, please assist with funds.  Even your small change will benefit us as our exchange rate is poor. 

Also please help us to get the word out there.  I am sure you know some mountain bikers, hikers, joggers, runners, environmental tourists and nature lovers who you can share this campaign with.  

Please keep on sharing our story with these like minded friends and you can help us reach our goal and provide employment and opportunities for people in need.

Please use whatever social media platforms that is available to you to get our campaign out there and remember to use the Indiegogo share tools too

story:
We have chosen to end the campaign, and all backers can expect a refund. If you wish to contact us please email info@leafonline.dk. If you are still interested in our project please visit our facebook page.

We thank our backers for being early supporters of the project!

 

Økologi gjort tilgængeligt for alle i Danmark.

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Har du overvejet at støtte Leaf?

Vi står nemlig helt klar til at igangsætte det største økologiske og socialt ansvarlige projekt i Danmarks historie.

Skynd dig at give dit bidrag til den grønne omstilling!

Alt dette og mere til har vi på plads:

  • Butikschefen og de første medarbejdere står parat!
  • I det sydlige Randers, tæt på motorvejen og andre indkøbsmuligheder, har vi et stort lejemål klar til at blive fyldt med dejlige økologiske varer og glade medarbejdere!
  • Leverandører fra hele Danmark står klar med gratis lån af inventar, frysebokse og køleskabe!
  • Leverandør af kassesystemer og lagerstyring står også klar med en færdig løsning!
  • En IT leverandør står klar med vores webshop!
  • Fragtfirmaer er klar til at bringe Leaf pakker ud til hver eneste krog af Danmark!
  • Økologiske leverandører fra hele Europa har givet os yderst fordelagtige vilkår og venter bare på, at de kan komme og fylde hylderne i det første Leaf supermarked!

Støt, del og hjælp os med at gøre Danmark dejligere og grønnere!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mød

Forestil dig et supermarked, hvor fokus alene er på din sundhed, den gode smag og omsorg for miljøet. Hvor alle varer er både økologiske og billigere end i de almindelige supermarkeder. Et supermarked, hvor alle anses for værdifulde, og hvor der tages udgangspunkt i medarbejdernes individuelle ressourcer. Det er Leaf!

 

Leaf er et økologisk forretningskoncept med tanke på vores børns fremtid og jorden som helhed. Ikke alene er Leaf 100 % økologisk som forretning, men vil også støtte fremtidige, miljøvenlige initiativer.

Leaf er en socialøkonomisk virksomhed, hvor de ansatte også er medejere. Medejerskab giver større ansvarsfølelse, personlig succes og større arbejdsglæde. Leaf vil blive en kærkommen indgang til arbejdsmarkedet for personer med fysiske, psykiske og sociale udfordringer - hvor ressourcestærke ledere og ansatte vil fungere som rollemodeller, guider og gode kolleger.

Din donation er derfor ikke alene en investering i Leaf, men også i en bedre verden!

Når vi har nået vores mål, åbner den første butik indenfor en måned!              

                              

 

Økologiske fødevarer i Danmark

I Danmark er udvalget af økologiske fødevarer i traditionelle supermarkeder stadig meget begrænset og meget dyrt. Igen i 2015 opgjorde EU Kommisionen Danmark til at være det dyreste land at være forbruger i med et prisindeks på 145 % for fødevarer. Hvis man ser isoleret på økologiske fødevarer når prisindekset en svimlende højde på mere end 230 %! Økologisk mad er altså langt dyrere end uøkologisk mad og er dermed ikke en reel mulighed for trængte familier.  

I vores sydlige nabolande har forbrugerne reel valgfrihed, når det kommer til økologiske fødevarer. Prisforskellene på uøkologiske og økologiske fødevarer er marginale, udvalget er ubeskriveligt større, og antallet af repræsenterede producenter er enormt.

Leaf ønsker at give danske forbrugere et frit valg!

       

 

Koncept

Forretningsplan

Vi vil placere et lokalforankret økologisk fødevaremarked i alle danske byer med flere end 20.000 indbyggere. Udvalget vil være på ca. 20.000 varer. I byer med 5.000 indbyggere og op vil vi placere et økologisk supermarked med et vareudvalg på 600-800 produkter. Målet er 20 fødevaremarkeder og 120 supermarkeder i Danmark. For at sikre at økologiske fødevarer bliver let tilgængelige for alle, åbner vi også en webshop. Udvalget i fødevaremarkederne vil inkludere:

  • Frugt og grøntsager
  • Slagter og pålægsafdeling
  • Kolonialvarer
  • Mælkeprodukter
  • Et bredt dansk, lokalproduceret sortiment i samarbejde med områdets økologiske producenter
  • Øl, vin og spiritus
Ifht. prisen vil Leaf være 40-60 % billigere end andre danske supermarkeder og på denne måde sikre, at alle har råd til at føre en sund, økologisk livsstil.

Leverandører, lokaler og ansatte

I Danmark har vi næsten 3.000 lokale, økologiske landmænd, og i Europa har vi adgang til tusindvis af økologisk varer af høj kvalitet. Vi har allerede lavet aftaler med all nødvendige leverandører, og de er klar til at levere deres produkter til Leaf.

Vi har også fundet lokalerne i 3 danske byer og indgået aftaler med ejerne.

Endelig har vi massevis af mennesker, der gerne vil arbejde i Leaf!

Socialt ansvarlig virksomhed (CSR)

Leaf har en CSR politik, der går ud på at have en positiv indvirkning på miljøet og mennesker, inklusiv forbrugere, ansatte og lokalsamfundene.

 

Intet madspild

 

I Leaf vil vi ikke acceptere madspild. Derfor har vi gjort meget ud af at tilpasse udvalget til danske forbrugere. Samtidig har vi en kort leveringstid fra leverandørerne, der gør, at udvalget hurtigt kan suppleres.

Vi har derudover en række tiltag i butikkerne; som friskpresset grøntsagsjuice, cafémiljø og sandwichbar, der alle sammen kan udnytte butikkernes overskudsvarer, før de bliver dårlige.

Endelig er der to organisationer, som ligger tæt op af vores filosofi om social ansvarlighed: Mødrehjælpen. Begge organisationer vil blive tilbudt overskudsmad til særligt udsatte personer.

En ny indkøbsoplevelse

Leaf er en helt ny indkøbsoplevelse!

 

Ved at udnytte den nyeste teknologi kan vi omgå mange af de traditionelt fordyrende led og samtidig gøre det hurtigere og nemmere at handle ind.

Kasserne er af hensyn til medarbejderne ren selvbetjening. Men det klares nemt, da varerne allerede registreres, når du placerer dem i indkøbskurven.

En stor del af varerne er emballagefri for at skåne miljøet, ligesom du heller ikke finder plastikposer i Leaf.

            

 

Leaf - udenfor Danmarks grænser

 

Når Leaf er blevet godt etableret i Danmark, ønsker vi at udvide vores koncept ud over Danmarks grænser til vores nabolande for at give deres forbrugere de samme økologiske muligheder. Vi vil ligeledes støtte økologiske initiativer over hele verden.

                                                  

 

Derfor crowdfunder vi

Det koster en del at starte en supermarkedskæde op fra bunden.

Investorer og banker fokuserer alene på profit, hvorimod Leaf fokuserer på miljøet og social ansvarlighed. Leaf ønsker at tilgodese samfundet, det globale miljø og vores ansatte - ikke i forvejen velhavende investorer.

Leaf vil dele 15 % af overskuddet mellem medarbejderne, og geninvestere 85 % i virksomheden; til at åbne nye butikker, uddanne medarbejdere, hjælpe lokale producenter med at omlægge til økologi og lave andre miljøvenlige tiltag.

Derfor har vi brug for din donation, uanset om den er lille eller stor.

Din donation er med til at plante et frø, der kan vokse sig stort og stærkt, og i læ af Leaf-butikkerne vil fremtidige økologiske initiativer kunne vokse op.

Husk også at vise din støtte ved at dele vores hjemmeside og vores indiegogo side!

                                         

 

Hvordan bliver pengene brugt?

Vores første mål er at åbne et supermarked og lancere vores webshop, så økologiske fødevarer bliver tilgængelige for alle, uanset hvor i Danmark de bor.

Afhængigt af hvor mange penge vi får rejst, vil midlerne blive brugt som følger:

  • 175,000 $      1 supermarked og en webshop
  • 300,000 $    2 supermarkeder og en webshop
  • 500,000 $     1 fødevaremarked, 2 supermarkeder og en webshop
  • +100,000 $   Hver 100.000 $ ekstra giver et ekstra supermarked

Hvis vi, mod forventning, ikke når vores mål på 175.000 $, vil vi bruge dit bidrag til at åbne en lille butik og en webshop. Overskuddet fra disse butikker vil efterfølgende blive brugt til at åbne yderligere butikker.

 

Frynsegoder (Perks)

Vi er taknemmelige for hver eneste donation, vi modtager! For at mindes vores grundlæggere, vil vi udødeliggøre deres navne på Grundlæggernes Væg (Founder's Wall). En sådan væg vil blive placeret i alle Leaf supermarkeder samt på vores hjemmeside.

Når du laver en donation til Leaf, kan du vælge mellem adskillige lækre frynsegoder til dig selv. Du kan også vælge at donere dit frynsegode til de to humanitære organisationer: Mødrehjælpen (www.moedrehjaelpen.dk). Mødrehjælpen hjælper trængende familier med små børn og gravide kvinder. 

                                   

 
 

Mere information

 

Holdet bag Leaf

 

  

 

Sebastian S. Hansen

 

Kok og iværksætter

 

“Jeg arbejder med Leaf for mine børn og kommende generationers skyld. Jeg har aldrig forstået, hvorfor mad skal forurenes med kemikalier eller pumpes med vand? Leaf vil være garant for sunde og rene fødevarer".

 

Eva Nølke

 

Biolog, Cand.scient

 

"Jeg er en entusiastisk miljøforkæmper, der drømmer om en sundere og sikrere verden, som min datter kan vokse op i. Jeg ønsker også, at det skal være lettere at komme ind på arbejdsmarkedet for udsatte mennesker. Derfor synes jeg, at Leaf er et fantastisk og visionært projekt".

 

Mads K. B. Thomsen

 

Administrationsøkonom

 

“Jeg brænder for økologi og et mere favnende og rummeligt arbejdsmarked, og med Leaf har vi udviklet et koncept, der kan kombinere de to ting”.

 

 
 

               

 

Introducing

Imagine a supermarket in which focus is solely on your health, a good taste and concern for the environment. In which all products are organic and cheaper than found in ordinary supermarkets. In which everybody is seen as valuable, and focus is on individual resources. This is what Leaf is all about!

Leaf is an ecofriendly business concerned about the environment and the future of our children and our planet. Leaf will not only be a 100 % organic organisation, it will also help backing future ecofriendly initiatives.

Leaf is a social economic business where employees are also co-owners. Co-ownership gives a sense of responsibility and personal success. Leaf will be an entry point to the labor market for persons with physical, psychological and social challenges – where resourceful managers and employees will serve as role models, guides and good colleagues.

Your donation will thus not only be an investment in Leaf, but also an investment in a better world!

When reaching our funding goal, the first shop will open within a month!

                                          

 

Organic food in Denmark

In Denmark the assortment of organic food in traditional supermarkets is still very limited and very expensive. The European price index of consumer prices (2015) shows that Denmark is by far the most expensive country with an index of 145 %. Seen in isolation, organic food hits an amazing index of more than 230 %! Thus organic food is much more expensive than non-organic food, making it unavailable to families with less means.

In neighboring countries, consumers have an actual choice of freedom when it comes to organic versus non-organic food. The price difference is insignificant, the assortment is much larger and the number of manufacturers is huge.

Leaf wishes to give Danish consumers a free choice!

          

 

Concept

Business plan

We wish to build an organic food fair in every Danish city with a population of more than 20,000. The assortment will be of approximately 2.000 products. In cities with a population of more than 5,000, we will build organic supermarkets with an assortment of approximately 600-800 products. Our goal is to open 20 food fairs and 120 supermarkets in Denmark. To ensure that organic food is made readily available to everybody, we will also open a webshop. The assortment of the food fair will include:

  • Fruit and vegetables
  • Butcher and cold cuts department
  • Processed food
  • Diary products
  • A wide assortment of locally produced products in cooperation with local, organic farmers
  • Beer, wine and liquour

With regard to price, Leaf will be approximately 40-60 % cheaper than other Danish supermarkets, thus ensuring that everybody will have the means to lead a healthy, organic lifestyle.

Suppliers, facilities and employees

In Denmark, we have almost 3,000 local, organic farmers, and in Europe we have access to thousands of organic, high quality products. We have already made agreements with all necessary suppliers, and they are ready to deliver their products to Leaf.

We have also found the facilities in 3 Danish cities and made agreements with the owners.

Finally, we have a lot of people just waiting to get the opportunity to get a job in Leaf!

Corporate social responsibility (CSR)

Leaf has a CSR policy to make a positive impact on the environment and stakeholders, including consumers, employees and communities.

No food waste

Leaf does not accept food waste, thus we are making great efforts to adapt the assortment to Danish consumers. We also have a short delivery time from our suppliers.

In addition we have a range of initiatives in the supermarkets; freshly squeezed juice, café and a sandwich bar, all of which can use the supermarket's surplus food.

Finally we will offer surplus food to vulnerable families and homeless people through the two humanitarian organisations the Mother's Aid.

  

A new shopping experience

Leaf is an all new shopping experience!

By using the newest technology we are able to bypass the traditionally price-raising links and at the same time make it quicker and easier to shop.

The check-out will be all self-service, which will be easily done since the products are already registered when placed in the shopping basket.

A large number of the products are not wrapped in order to protect the environment, and plastic bags are not found in Leaf.

                    

Leaf - beyond Denmark

When Leaf has become well established in Denmark, we wish to expand our concept beyond the borders of Denmark to our neighbouring countries to bring the same organic possibilities to their consumers. We will also support organic initiatives worldwide.

                                                    

 

Why do we need your support?

It costs a lot to start a new chain of supermarkets from scratch.

Investors and the banking system only focus on profit, whereas Leaf focuses on the environment and social responsibility. Leaf wishes to benefit the community, the environment and the employees, not already wealthy investors.

Leaf will share 15 % of the profit between the employees, and reinvest 85 % of the profit in the business for opening new supermarkets, education of employees, helping local farmers and manufacturers convert into organic production etc.

Therefore we need your contribution, whether small or large.

Your donation will help plant a seed, which can grow huge and strong, and under the protection of the Leaf supermarkets, future ecofriendly initiatives will be able to grow.

Remember to also show your support by sharing our website or our Indiegogo page!

                                        

 

How is your funding used?

Our first goal is to open one supermarket and launch our web-shop to make organic food available for everybody no matter where they live.

Depending on how much money we raise, the money will be spent as follow:

  • 175,000 $ 1 supermarket and a webshop
  • 300,000 $    2 supermarkets and a webshop
  • 500,000 $  1 food fair, 2 supermarkets and a webshop
  • +100,000 $  Each additional 100,000 $ gives an extra supermarket

If, contrary to expectation, we do not reach our goal of 175,000 $ we will use your contribution to open a small shop and a webshop. The profit from these shops will be used to open further shops.

          

 

Perks

 

We are thankful for every donation we receive! To commemorate our founders we will immortalize their names on the Founder's Wall. A Founder's Wall will be placed in all Leaf supermarkets as well as on our website.

When making af donation for Leaf, you can choose among several nice perks for yourself. You can also choose to donate your perk to the two humanitarian organisations: the Mother's Aid (Mødrehjælpen: www.moedrehjaelpen.dk). The Mother's Aid supports needy families with young children and pregnant women.                          

                                     

More information

The Leaf Team

  

Sebastian S. Hansen

Chef and Entrepreneur

“I work with Leaf for the sake of my children and future generations to come. I have never understood why food should be contaminated with chemicals or pumped with water? Leaf will be a warrantor of healthy and pure food”.

Eva Nølke

Biologist, Cand.scient

"I am an enthusiastic environmentalist, dreaming of a healthier and safer world for my daughter to live in. I also wish for an easier access to the job market for vulnerable people. Therefore, I find that Leaf is a great and visionary project".

Mads K. B. Thomsen

Business Administration Economist

“I am dedicated to organic living and a more including and tolerant labor market. In Leaf we have developed a concept, combining these two things”

Why choose organic?

Organic food is healthier and taste better. In organic agriculture animals and plants get enough time to grow in a natural life cycle. They are not filled with growth hormones or force-fed. The slow growth gives af better taste.

Organic food is free of pesticides. Pesticides accumulate in plants, animals and humans. Still more studies show a correlation between eg. cancer and allergy and the content of chemicals and pesticides. By buying organic food you do not only protect yourself and your children, you also protect streams, groundwater and the natural vegetation and wildlife.

Animal welfare is also important in organic farming. Organic farm animals have space to move around. They are fed organic feed and have acces to outdoor areas.

 

Local producers

In Denmark we have more than 2,600 organic farmers able to deliver af wide variety of organic products from peas, apples and plums to potatoes, wheat and carrots. Unfortunately, the consumers do not have access to those products via ordinary supermarkets, since the production of each local farmer is usually too small to be of interest to a chain of supermarkets. Instead, small specialty stores or farm shops are selling the products, thus making them unavailable to the majority of Danes.

Leaf will make it possible for local organic farmers to sell their own products in their local Leaf supermarket. This way, the products will reach a greater audience and the local farmers will increase their profit.

                      

Employment in Leaf

Leaf considers all humans as valuable individuals with resources from which the business and society can benefit. Leaf will primarily hire persons who have difficulties entering the labor market as well as resourceful managers and employees, serving as role models and good colleagues.

All employees in Leaf, no matter rank, are also co-owners. Co-ownership gives a sense of responsibility and personal success and it is more fun and fulfilling to work for oneself than for a big company!

All employees in Leaf will become shareholders after three months of employment, with one stock each. Nobody will own more than one stock. Stocks cannot be sold, and if an employee chooses to leave Leaf, his or her stock will be given to the successor.

Employees are paid in accordance with collective and other arrangements and also get a quarterly bonus of 15 % of the profit, divided equally according to number of working hours.

Weekly a staff meeting will be arranged for all employees. The meeting consists of two parts: presentation and follow up by the management, and input and ideas by the staff. This gives all employees an actual have a say. All employees have equal opportunities to be promoted according to their skills, and continuing education will be offered.

Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR)

Leaf has a CSR policy and wishes to have a positive impact on the environment and society.

Environment

Leaf sells organic products at favorable prices and thus the share of people buying organic food will expectedly increase, leading to a larger production of organic products and less use of chemicals and pesticides, that ultimately end up in the environment.

Leaf will minimize the use of wrapping and use sustainable wrapping as glass and paper. Plastic bags will not be found in Leaf supermarkets.

Leaf does not accept food waste, thus we are making great efforts to adapt the assortment to the consumers. We also have a short delivery time from our suppliers. In addition we have a range of initiatives in the supermarkets; freshly squeezed juice, café and a sandwich bar, all of which can use the supermarket's surplus food. Finally we will offer surplus food to vulnerable families and homeless people through the two humanitarian organisations the Mother's Aid.

It is our vision to build future Leaf supermarkets that are self-sufficient with rainwater and solar power.

Society

Leaf believes that people want to take an active part in society, to get a work and be part of a community, as far as they are able to.

Unfortunately, a lot of people are challenged by physical, psychological or social issues. These people often have great difficulties finding a job. A challenge also met by persons with a criminal record or a difficult youth.

Leaf wants to give everybody a chance to (re-)enter the labor market, according to their individual skills and capabilities! A chance to get a new and better life, where they feel useful and appreciated.

Example 1

John is 19 years old and has lived in a group home his entire life. He is dyslexic and has two verdicts for violence. By getting the right support, guidance and education in a Leaf supermarket, John can maybe become a butcher after five years of employment. At least he should have the chance.

Example 2

Marian is 54 years old and educated as an accountant. She has been off work sick for several years due to psychological illness. She is anxious and cannot handle many people at a time. She also cannot manage a job as accountant. In Leaf she can find a job in the storeroom, where her many years of work experience can contribute to more overview and efficiency. She feels comfortable with her few known colleagues, and never leaves the storeroom. She feels appreciated and as part of the community, despite only being able to work 12 hours pr. week.
story_txt:
We have chosen to end the campaign, and all backers can expect a refund. If you wish to contact us please email info@leafonline.dk. If you are still interested in our project please visit our facebook page.We thank our backers for being early supporters of the project! Økologi gjort tilgængeligt for alle i Danmark. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Har du overvejet at støtte Leaf?Vi står nemlig helt klar til at igangsætte det største økologiske og socialt ansvarlige projekt i Danmarks historie.Skynd dig at give dit bidrag til den grønne omstilling!Alt dette og mere til har vi på plads:
Butikschefen og de første medarbejdere står parat!
I det sydlige Randers, tæt på motorvejen og andre indkøbsmuligheder, har vi et stort lejemål klar til at blive fyldt med dejlige økologiske varer og glade medarbejdere!
Leverandører fra hele Danmark står klar med gratis lån af inventar, frysebokse og køleskabe!
Leverandør af kassesystemer og lagerstyring står også klar med en færdig løsning!
En IT leverandør står klar med vores webshop!
Fragtfirmaer er klar til at bringe Leaf pakker ud til hver eneste krog af Danmark!
Økologiske leverandører fra hele Europa har givet os yderst fordelagtige vilkår og venter bare på, at de kan komme og fylde hylderne i det første Leaf supermarked!
Støt, del og hjælp os med at gøre Danmark dejligere og grønnere!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Mød

Men det klares nemt, da varerne allerede registreres, når du placerer dem i indkøbskurven.En stor del af varerne er emballagefri for at skåne miljøet, ligesom du heller ikke finder plastikposer i Leaf.              Leaf - udenfor Danmarks grænser Når Leaf er blevet godt etableret i Danmark, ønsker vi at udvide vores koncept ud over Danmarks grænser til vores nabolande for at give deres forbrugere de samme økologiske muligheder. Vi vil ligeledes støtte økologiske initiativer over hele verden.                                                   Derfor crowdfunder viDet koster en del at starte en supermarkedskæde op fra bunden.Investorer og banker fokuserer alene på profit, hvorimod Leaf fokuserer på miljøet og social ansvarlighed. Leaf ønsker at tilgodese samfundet, det globale miljø og vores ansatte - ikke i forvejen velhavende investorer.Leaf vil dele 15 % af overskuddet mellem medarbejderne, og geninvestere 85 % i virksomheden; til at åbne nye butikker, uddanne medarbejdere, hjælpe lokale producenter med at omlægge til økologi og lave andre miljøvenlige tiltag.Derfor har vi brug for din donation, uanset om den er lille eller stor.Din donation er med til at plante et frø, der kan vokse sig stort og stærkt, og i læ af Leaf-butikkerne vil fremtidige økologiske initiativer kunne vokse op.Husk også at vise din støtte ved at dele vores hjemmeside og vores indiegogo side!                                          Hvordan bliver pengene brugt?Vores første mål er at åbne et supermarked og lancere vores webshop, så økologiske fødevarer bliver tilgængelige for alle, uanset hvor i Danmark de bor.Afhængigt af hvor mange penge vi får rejst, vil midlerne blive brugt som følger:
175,000 $      1 supermarked og en webshop
300,000 $    2 supermarkeder og en webshop
500,000 $     1 fødevaremarked, 2 supermarkeder og en webshop
+100,000 $   Hver 100.000 $ ekstra giver et ekstra supermarked
Hvis vi, mod forventning, ikke når vores mål på 175.000 $, vil vi bruge dit bidrag til at åbne en lille butik og en webshop. Overskuddet fra disse butikker vil efterfølgende blive brugt til at åbne yderligere butikker. Frynsegoder (Perks)Vi er taknemmelige for hver eneste donation, vi modtager! For at mindes vores grundlæggere, vil vi udødeliggøre deres navne på Grundlæggernes Væg (Founder's Wall). En sådan væg vil blive placeret i alle Leaf supermarkeder samt på vores hjemmeside.Når du laver en donation til Leaf, kan du vælge mellem adskillige lækre frynsegoder til dig selv. Du kan også vælge at donere dit frynsegode til de to humanitære organisationer: Mødrehjælpen (www.moedrehjaelpen.dk). Mødrehjælpen hjælper trængende familier med små børn og gravide kvinder.                                      Mere information Holdet bag Leaf    Sebastian S. Hansen Kok og iværksætter “Jeg arbejder med Leaf for mine børn og kommende generationers skyld. Jeg har aldrig forstået, hvorfor mad skal forurenes med kemikalier eller pumpes med vand? Leaf vil være garant for sunde og rene fødevarer". Eva Nølke Biolog, Cand.scient "Jeg er en entusiastisk miljøforkæmper, der drømmer om en sundere og sikrere verden, som min datter kan vokse op i. Jeg ønsker også, at det skal være lettere at komme ind på arbejdsmarkedet for udsatte mennesker. Derfor synes jeg, at Leaf er et fantastisk og visionært projekt". Mads K. B. Thomsen Administrationsøkonom “Jeg brænder for økologi og et mere favnende og rummeligt arbejdsmarked, og med Leaf har vi udviklet et koncept, der kan kombinere de to ting”.                     Introducing 
Imagine a supermarket in which focus is solely on your health, a good taste and concern for the environment. In which all products are organic and cheaper than found in ordinary supermarkets. In which everybody is seen as valuable, and focus is on individual resources. This is what Leaf is all about!Leaf is an ecofriendly business concerned about the environment and the future of our children and our planet. Leaf will not only be a 100 % organic organisation, it will also help backing future ecofriendly initiatives.Leaf is a social economic business where employees are also co-owners. Co-ownership gives a sense of responsibility and personal success. Leaf will be an entry point to the labor market for persons with physical, psychological and social challenges – where resourceful managers and employees will serve as role models, guides and good colleagues.Your donation will thus not only be an investment in Leaf, but also an investment in a better world!When reaching our funding goal, the first shop will open within a month!                                            Organic food in DenmarkIn Denmark the assortment of organic food in traditional supermarkets is still very limited and very expensive. The European price index of consumer prices (2015) shows that Denmark is by far the most expensive country with an index of 145 %. Seen in isolation, organic food hits an amazing index of more than 230 %! Thus organic food is much more expensive than non-organic food, making it unavailable to families with less means.In neighboring countries, consumers have an actual choice of freedom when it comes to organic versus non-organic food. The price difference is insignificant, the assortment is much larger and the number of manufacturers is huge.Leaf wishes to give Danish consumers a free choice!            ConceptBusiness planWe wish to build an organic food fair in every Danish city with a population of more than 20,000. The assortment will be of approximately 2.000 products. In cities with a population of more than 5,000, we will build organic supermarkets with an assortment of approximately 600-800 products. Our goal is to open 20 food fairs and 120 supermarkets in Denmark. To ensure that organic food is made readily available to everybody, we will also open a webshop. The assortment of the food fair will include:
Fruit and vegetables
Butcher and cold cuts department
Processed food
Diary products
A wide assortment of locally produced products in cooperation with local, organic farmers
Beer, wine and liquour
With regard to price, Leaf will be approximately 40-60 % cheaper than other Danish supermarkets, thus ensuring that everybody will have the means to lead a healthy, organic lifestyle.Suppliers, facilities and employeesIn Denmark, we have almost 3,000 local, organic farmers, and in Europe we have access to thousands of organic, high quality products. We have already made agreements with all necessary suppliers, and they are ready to deliver their products to Leaf.We have also found the facilities in 3 Danish cities and made agreements with the owners.Finally, we have a lot of people just waiting to get the opportunity to get a job in Leaf!Corporate social responsibility (CSR)Leaf has a CSR policy to make a positive impact on the environment and stakeholders, including consumers, employees and communities.No food wasteLeaf does not accept food waste, thus we are making great efforts to adapt the assortment to Danish consumers. We also have a short delivery time from our suppliers.In addition we have a range of initiatives in the supermarkets; freshly squeezed juice, café and a sandwich bar, all of which can use the supermarket's surplus food.Finally we will offer surplus food to vulnerable families and homeless people through the two humanitarian organisations the Mother's Aid.   A new shopping experienceLeaf is an all new shopping experience!By using the newest technology we are able to bypass the traditionally price-raising links and at the same time make it quicker and easier to shop.The check-out will be all self-service, which will be easily done since the products are already registered when placed in the shopping basket.A large number of the products are not wrapped in order to protect the environment, and plastic bags are not found in Leaf.                     Leaf - beyond DenmarkWhen Leaf has become well established in Denmark, we wish to expand our concept beyond the borders of Denmark to our neighbouring countries to bring the same organic possibilities to their consumers. We will also support organic initiatives worldwide.                                                     Why do we need your support?It costs a lot to start a new chain of supermarkets from scratch.Investors and the banking system only focus on profit, whereas Leaf focuses on the environment and social responsibility. Leaf wishes to benefit the community, the environment and the employees, not already wealthy investors.Leaf will share 15 % of the profit between the employees, and reinvest 85 % of the profit in the business for opening new supermarkets, education of employees, helping local farmers and manufacturers convert into organic production etc.Therefore we need your contribution, whether small or large.Your donation will help plant a seed, which can grow huge and strong, and under the protection of the Leaf supermarkets, future ecofriendly initiatives will be able to grow.Remember to also show your support by sharing our website or our Indiegogo page!                                          How is your funding used?Our first goal is to open one supermarket and launch our web-shop to make organic food available for everybody no matter where they live.Depending on how much money we raise, the money will be spent as follow:
175,000 $ 1 supermarket and a webshop
300,000 $    2 supermarkets and a webshop
500,000 $  1 food fair, 2 supermarkets and a webshop
+100,000 $  Each additional 100,000 $ gives an extra supermarket
If, contrary to expectation, we do not reach our goal of 175,000 $ we will use your contribution to open a small shop and a webshop. The profit from these shops will be used to open further shops.            Perks We are thankful for every donation we receive! To commemorate our founders we will immortalize their names on the Founder's Wall. A Founder's Wall will be placed in all Leaf supermarkets as well as on our website.When making af donation for Leaf, you can choose among several nice perks for yourself. You can also choose to donate your perk to the two humanitarian organisations: the Mother's Aid (Mødrehjælpen: www.moedrehjaelpen.dk). The Mother's Aid supports needy families with young children and pregnant women.                                                               More informationThe Leaf Team  Sebastian S. HansenChef and Entrepreneur“I work with Leaf for the sake of my children and future generations to come. I have never understood why food should be contaminated with chemicals or pumped with water? Leaf will be a warrantor of healthy and pure food”.Eva NølkeBiologist, Cand.scient"I am an enthusiastic environmentalist, dreaming of a healthier and safer world for my daughter to live in. I also wish for an easier access to the job market for vulnerable people. Therefore, I find that Leaf is a great and visionary project".Mads K. B. ThomsenBusiness Administration Economist“I am dedicated to organic living and a more including and tolerant labor market. In Leaf we have developed a concept, combining these two things”Why choose organic?Organic food is healthier and taste better. In organic agriculture animals and plants get enough time to grow in a natural life cycle. They are not filled with growth hormones or force-fed. The slow growth gives af better taste.Organic food is free of pesticides. Pesticides accumulate in plants, animals and humans. Still more studies show a correlation between eg. cancer and allergy and the content of chemicals and pesticides. By buying organic food you do not only protect yourself and your children, you also protect streams, groundwater and the natural vegetation and wildlife.Animal welfare is also important in organic farming. Organic farm animals have space to move around. They are fed organic feed and have acces to outdoor areas. Local producersIn Denmark we have more than 2,600 organic farmers able to deliver af wide variety of organic products from peas, apples and plums to potatoes, wheat and carrots. Unfortunately, the consumers do not have access to those products via ordinary supermarkets, since the production of each local farmer is usually too small to be of interest to a chain of supermarkets. Instead, small specialty stores or farm shops are selling the products, thus making them unavailable to the majority of Danes.Leaf will make it possible for local organic farmers to sell their own products in their local Leaf supermarket. This way, the products will reach a greater audience and the local farmers will increase their profit.                       
Employment in Leaf
Leaf considers all humans as valuable individuals with resources from which the business and society can benefit. Leaf will primarily hire persons who have difficulties entering the labor market as well as resourceful managers and employees, serving as role models and good colleagues.
All employees in Leaf, no matter rank, are also co-owners. Co-ownership gives a sense of responsibility and personal success and it is more fun and fulfilling to work for oneself than for a big company!
All employees in Leaf will become shareholders after three months of employment, with one stock each. Nobody will own more than one stock. Stocks cannot be sold, and if an employee chooses to leave Leaf, his or her stock will be given to the successor.
Employees are paid in accordance with collective and other arrangements and also get a quarterly bonus of 15 % of the profit, divided equally according to number of working hours.
Weekly a staff meeting will be arranged for all employees. The meeting consists of two parts: presentation and follow up by the management, and input and ideas by the staff. This gives all employees an actual have a say. All employees have equal opportunities to be promoted according to their skills, and continuing education will be offered.
Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR)
Leaf has a CSR policy and wishes to have a positive impact on the environment and society.
Environment
Leaf sells organic products at favorable prices and thus the share of people buying organic food will expectedly increase, leading to a larger production of organic products and less use of chemicals and pesticides, that ultimately end up in the environment.
Leaf will minimize the use of wrapping and use sustainable wrapping as glass and paper. Plastic bags will not be found in Leaf supermarkets.
Leaf does not accept food waste, thus we are making great efforts to adapt the assortment to the consumers. We also have a short delivery time from our suppliers. In addition we have a range of initiatives in the supermarkets; freshly squeezed juice, café and a sandwich bar, all of which can use the supermarket's surplus food. Finally we will offer surplus food to vulnerable families and homeless people through the two humanitarian organisations the Mother's Aid.
It is our vision to build future Leaf supermarkets that are self-sufficient with rainwater and solar power.
Society
Leaf believes that people want to take an active part in society, to get a work and be part of a community, as far as they are able to.
Unfortunately, a lot of people are challenged by physical, psychological or social issues. These people often have great difficulties finding a job. A challenge also met by persons with a criminal record or a difficult youth.
Leaf wants to give everybody a chance to (re-)enter the labor market, according to their individual skills and capabilities! A chance to get a new and better life, where they feel useful and appreciated.
Example 1
John is 19 years old and has lived in a group home his entire life. He is dyslexic and has two verdicts for violence. By getting the right support, guidance and education in a Leaf supermarket, John can maybe become a butcher after five years of employment. At least he should have the chance.
Example 2
Marian is 54 years old and educated as an accountant. She has been off work sick for several years due to psychological illness. She is anxious and cannot handle many people at a time. She also cannot manage a job as accountant. In Leaf she can find a job in the storeroom, where her many years of work experience can contribute to more overview and efficiency. She feels comfortable with her few known colleagues, and never leaves the storeroom. She feels appreciated and as part of the community, despite only being able to work 12 hours pr. week.

story:
We had a meeting about using Crowdfunding and there were those who wanted to employ fancy videos, high quality graphics and hire a writer to make this "story" compelling to the point that you open your wallet. I have something better. Look in the mirror, imagine every time you come home from work your children are asleep, every time. Or when you get your paycheck, it goes directly to rent since there was an increase this year. As a American, you were promised something and this promise did not include missing your children growing up or living to work. It was not a promise of not having enough but that's the reality for 63% of New Yorkers and 49% of the US that is currently under poverty. We choose to correct this and with your help we get at least 5 families a chance to breathe again knowing that they do have enough now.

Who we are?

We are the Startup company "West New York Properties".  Consisting of individuals that want to bring real change to the world that we live in, starting in New York State. The purpose of this campaign is not for us though, it's for the 63% of families here that are below poverty and can barely afford where they are currently living. Our Government programs are becoming scarce and the larger corporations are only looking at the bottom line. Instead of standing on a soapbox or posting it to social media, we have decided to get our hands dirty and do something about it.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help, no we don't need any fancy equipment or a stylish new office, we need your financial assistance to help us acquire these distressed properties throughout NYS and fixing them into affordable housing for low income families.  Crowdfunding allows us to stay true to the goal rather than a loan that will force us to focus on the payback. 

  • There are several distressed properties ranging between $5-$10K, including closing costs, with renovations costing round $14-$20k.
  • When the property is purchased we invite you to come check it out if you are in the area but we will gladly send a thank you letter and photo from us and the families that you helped.
  • If we do not reach our goal, the project will still happen, it will just take longer to get started and there is no promise that these properties will still exist for purchase with all of the Urban Revitalization Programs happening throughout the year.

The Impact

By helping us with this project, you also help the internal and surrounding communities by:

  • We make the communities look better.
  • We return these distressed properties back to the county tax roll which leads to.
  • More families and small businesses.

If these local Governments are able to strive on their own they won't need to look at option like property or local tax increases which tend to force families to move out or worst.

Risks & Challenges

Of course we will face some challenges along the way like:

  • Affordability, some properties will be perfect but will require more capital than we have to fix up.
  • There are bigger companies with more friends who will also be looking to acquire these properties for different purposes.
  • Solution: We move to partner with these firms in hope of at least  50% being devoted to low income family housing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can donate, we understand and appreciate that so yes there are other ways that you can also help the overall project and or us.

  • If you have any distressed property that you are not doing anything with or even panning to use, feel free to sell it to us.
  • If you are looking to make money with your charitable donation, you can contact Habitat4Humanity which is a Non-profit organization with various ways for you to help.
  • If you are in the New York State area with a special set of skills, we welcome you to join us.

But to be clear we are not NON-PROFIT and do not want to mislead you into thinking that we are. We are just doing our part and you can to.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Eezlife is the solution for travelers, expats, and international students who could use a friendly hand now and then, without the costs of having to pay for a full-time personal assistant. With our services, anyone can gain affordable access to a pool of personal assistants who will help with practically anything you need. From booking a taxi to adopting a pet, we provide personalized care at affordable prices delivered by people, not robots.

 

Thanks to modern technology such as digital translators, picture recognition, or artificial intelligence, things for expats are a lot easier than they used to be. There's a lot you can do on your own if you are willing to put in the time and effort necessary to figure things out. But wouldn't your time be better spent doing the things you love instead of, for instance, trying to figure out a train schedule in Chinese?

The true value behind Eezlife is all the time and hassle you can save. As expats, we know first-hand that the real problem with living abroad in a Country where the language is like The Wall of Game of Thrones is the huge amounts of time you dedicate to complete daily tasks on our own.

For example, shopping online through a digital platform where the only language available is Chinese. No doubt we could do it on our own with a good translator but, how long would it take? Asking a local friend for help would only take a minute, but do you really want to depend on favors from others all the time? Watch our "how to use eezlife" video series featured in the gallery and see how "eezy" it can be when you have eezlife!

 

 

If – like we do – you believe in eezlife’s potential, we ask you to go the extra mile and contribute to our campaign today. Your contribution is essential to help us begin making people’s lives easier, and therefore better. Better, because you will have more time to spend doing the things you love. Better, because you will not have to stress about figuring everything out on your own. Better, because you will be helping put an end to the unfairness of having to pay more for things just because you’re a tourist.

Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still help us achieve our goals. You can support us by helping get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools to promote our campaign on your Facebook, twitter, blog, and other social media. We appreciate your support and thank you for reading this far!

 

Here is a graphic breakdown of the perks you will get for your contribution.

A special member of the eezlife Family, eezdog holds the key to our success: he makes us feel good, so we can make you feel good!

Just like us, eezdog is an intrepid explorer. Exclusively for this crowdfunding campaign, he has selected the best moments of his globetrotting experience. Choose your favorite eezdog design for your perk among the options below.

 

 

Our team is at your service to answer any questions you might have. Feel free to contact us, and we will answer right away!

story:
Hello my name is Andrew Conklin Disabled American Veteran.   I am reaching out because I have come up with a concept I think everyone in America should get behind.  Today all over America, our Veterans are homeless, hungry, afraid and possibly very sick.  Today’s Veteran faces a stigma of “having PTSD makes you a crazy person.” That’s far from the truth.  The truth is our veteran suicide rate is alarmingly high in the USA right now.  The truth is that I believe I have come up with a concept to assist those soldiers who have hung up their uniforms and have decided to take on the American Dream after coming home from war or service to their country.  Veteran reintegration back into society is a difficult one, whether they have PTSD or any other physical injuries do to their service to their country, that injury then becomes a burden, and even an embarrassment to the average soldier.  We are trained with a mindset, drilled into us from day one of entering the Army, the warrior ethos states “I will never accept defeat, I will never quit, I will never leave a fallen comrade…” That concept fails once Veterans are let out into society.  Veteran reintegration is just as much of a threat to our veterans as anything, come home from war after being scared 24/7 for 365 days, to come back and deal with the mundane lifestyle of the daily grind.

I have set out to open a coffee shop that breaks down that barrier between our Veterans who have made this country what it is; And its people whom they served once to serve them again, this time with coffee from other veteran companies.  Veterans understand one thing no one else does… Loyalty.  These disenfranchised veterans around America I want to employ them, give them a reason to live again.  I not only want to employ Vets as my workers but as my catalyst to get my coffee out there. Those Vets will hand deliver local businesses coffee orders.  This is my bridge, the one thing Americans love is coffee, the one thing everyone should love is a local Veteran. So, by hiring local Veterans, having the photos of local Veterans on the wall for the everyday man who walks into our military themed coffee shop can see who it was who decided to take up arms against the enemies of the united states.

               Audie Murphy’s Coffee Co. LLC wants to bring the world a new concept of coffee along with our little flair for the “Military Gucci Gear” surrounding of our Lounges or the delivery concept of my team of Veterans there is also one piece missing… The coffee.  After extensive research, it has been chosen, Black Rifle Coffee Company and Ranger Coffee Co, Both Veteran owned and operated coffee roasters have some of the most delicious coffee blends in the USA.  So, by helping raise the income of two other fellow Veteran companies I will bring to America a NEW idea of coffee… So, forget Starbucks and their overly used horrible dark roasts, and certainly forget the imposter coffee that Dunkin sells out of ease of access.  It’s time we as Americans start supporting those who created the freedoms we have her in this country. Because if not for Veterans like these, myself, and anyone else who has ever served their country proudly, we would not have these freedoms today. So, give back to them… to US and help me create a coffee lounge to honor their service and give them a place that isn’t some dumpy old hospital or some beat up little shack in the middle of nowhere. Let’s give the Veterans the VIP treatment they deserve, and most of all let’s enjoy the coffees these heroes have crafted for you the American people.
story_txt: Hello my name is Andrew Conklin Disabled American Veteran.   I am reaching out because I have come up with a concept I think everyone in America should get behind.  Today all over America, our Veterans are homeless, hungry, afraid and possibly very sick.  Today’s Veteran faces a stigma of “having PTSD makes you a crazy person.” That’s far from the truth.  The truth is our veteran suicide rate is alarmingly high in the USA right now.  The truth is that I believe I have come up with a concept to assist those soldiers who have hung up their uniforms and have decided to take on the American Dream after coming home from war or service to their country.  Veteran reintegration back into society is a difficult one, whether they have PTSD or any other physical injuries do to their service to their country, that injury then becomes a burden, and even an embarrassment to the average soldier.  We are trained with a mindset, drilled into us from day one of entering the Army, the warrior ethos states “I will never accept defeat, I will never quit, I will never leave a fallen comrade…” That concept fails once Veterans are let out into society.  Veteran reintegration is just as much of a threat to our veterans as anything, come home from war after being scared 24/7 for 365 days, to come back and deal with the mundane lifestyle of the daily grind.I have set out to open a coffee shop that breaks down that barrier between our Veterans who have made this country what it is; And its people whom they served once to serve them again, this time with coffee from other veteran companies.  Veterans understand one thing no one else does… Loyalty.  These disenfranchised veterans around America I want to employ them, give them a reason to live again.  I not only want to employ Vets as my workers but as my catalyst to get my coffee out there. Those Vets will hand deliver local businesses coffee orders.  This is my bridge, the one thing Americans love is coffee, the one thing everyone should love is a local Veteran. So, by hiring local Veterans, having the photos of local Veterans on the wall for the everyday man who walks into our military themed coffee shop can see who it was who decided to take up arms against the enemies of the united states.               Audie Murphy’s Coffee Co. LLC wants to bring the world a new concept of coffee along with our little flair for the “Military Gucci Gear” surrounding of our Lounges or the delivery concept of my team of Veterans there is also one piece missing… The coffee.  After extensive research, it has been chosen, Black Rifle Coffee Company and Ranger Coffee Co, Both Veteran owned and operated coffee roasters have some of the most delicious coffee blends in the USA.  So, by helping raise the income of two other fellow Veteran companies I will bring to America a NEW idea of coffee… So, forget Starbucks and their overly used horrible dark roasts, and certainly forget the imposter coffee that Dunkin sells out of ease of access.  It’s time we as Americans start supporting those who created the freedoms we have her in this country. Because if not for Veterans like these, myself, and anyone else who has ever served their country proudly, we would not have these freedoms today. So, give back to them… to US and help me create a coffee lounge to honor their service and give them a place that isn’t some dumpy old hospital or some beat up little shack in the middle of nowhere. Let’s give the Veterans the VIP treatment they deserve, and most of all let’s enjoy the coffees these heroes have crafted for you the American people.

story:
We all have our different wishes and aspirations. For some of us it could be travelling round the world, getting that dream job or even satisfying a philanthropic cause. For me it’s launching  Artcreators - a media marketing company in New York City.

 


Artcreators is a marketing company that aims to help clients get their messages across to the right audience and receive best value for their money.

 

 

My name is Uyi Osagioduwa

I’m a 23 year old digital marketer from Africa, but moved to New York City to extend my horizons and optimize on the opportunities available.

I started Artcreators LLC to help brands and clients online with three fundamental online marketing services. Marketing. Advertisement. PR services. We provide engagement with our customers’ clients and make sure they receive a hundred percent satisfaction.

In order to establish my business and provide quality services on a better scale, I’ll need more funding and now - I’m looking to the internet community for support.

If I’m properly funded I’ll be able to improve the delivery of the services provided and make more happy clients. I'll need the money to lease an office space and get necessary equipment like, computers, software etc. 

I’ll also need money to fund the furnishing of the office, I think a decent work space would attract customers - we wish to take marketing to the next level with our strategic plan.

I plan on providing valuable social media marketing service through an innovative and distinguished platform. 

This platform should not only help communicating and interacting with our clients audience, we tend to expand the view by giving our clients customer a free give away from our pocket that way the clients gets more exposure because the customer tells other customers and everyone would be waiting to anticipate on the next give away. That way our customer gains exposure. 

That’s not the end of it all, we press further by doing a one on one interview with your customer to know what they think it’s right for our clients business, as we all know customers are always right.

Artcreators LLC will ease the stress for you. Let’s handle the stress of marketing while you just relax. 

With YOUR help and donations, I’ll be able to achieve this dream and help upcoming brands do the same.

 

If you cannot contribute now or anytime, do not worry... there are other ways you can lend a
helping hand:


Message It Forward - Message It Forward is: somebody sends you a Message that impacts
lives and you "Message It Forward" by sending that message to everyone in your contact.


Endorse Us - Share our campaign. Copy & Paste our campaign link above to your:
Facebook, Tweet It (Twitter), Pin It (Pinterest), Picture It (Instagram), Blog It
(Blogger/WordPress/Tumblr...), or Link It (Linkedin). Social Media is a key marketing
technique and will be a major factor in the success of Artcreators.


Please, spread the word and help my team and I promote our campaign. Your help will be
greatly appreciated more than you know. Thank you for your time reading and participating!

story:
Short Summary

Our family recently made a life decision to leave the commercial food world (as a long term bakery manager and grocery manager for a regional supermarket chain) and embark on a journey to create a livable dream!  In December, we purchased a little and unique Drive-Thru only Diner (possibly the smallest in the US!!) in Berwick, ME known as Jittermugs.  My husband and I, along with our two little helpers (our 9 year old son and daughter) have expanded the existing Breakfast and Lunch menu and have added a quickly expanding Home Made Baked Goods category to provide a Big Taste at a Little Place through our two Drive thru windows.

What We Need & What You Get

We are planning to advance to the next level in making Jittermugs a destination spot for locals and tourists alike!  Jittermugs needs a seasonal face-lift; with an additional pavilion area for comfortable family seating outdoors ( a break for many commuters and travelers to stretch their legs and enjoy the Berwick countryside with an up close view of the periodic train traffic within sight) coupled with a walk up window area (a closed off drive thru window after the morning coffee rush) will greatly increase the attraction to take a seat along with a few nummy bites!

Along with the pavilion area, we have a great idea to convert the look of the building itself, by creating a whimsical frame that will transform the look of the business into an image of a little boat (a reflection of the nautical roots of Maine!)!  With the natural shape of the building, a little creative carpentry and wham! instant tugboat image :)

As an incentive, we are going to create a special snazzy T shirt design for our supporters, along with customized Travel Mugs and even immortality via a menu item named after YOU!

The Impact

With the consistent advent of commercialized food opportunities, the small fresh made food business is few and far between in this day and age.  In our project, we see only an expansion of an avid community base that we have worked hard to maintain and grow.  Its not just a coffee place: its a place where creative fresh food is made on the spot, to your specifications in a reasonably quick time period.  And don't worry, the conversational interaction with the staff (us) while you wait is entirely free. ... along with the dog biscuits... (no treats for cats right now, now that would be a plan for another campaign!). 

Help keep the local family business model alive!!


Other Ways You Can Help

Please feel free to spread the word on our campaign!!  Word of mouth is our best friend!

And if you ever are in the area of Berwick, ME, drop on in and experience a little bit of our gastric magic for yourself!!!
