story:
Short Summary

Over the past 6 years Adrenalize LLC has gone from a hobbyist dream to an award winning reality; and we couldn't have done it without the continued support of all of you. In fact, we've grown so much over the past couple years that we've out grown our tiny little Chevy Aveo! In order to keep growing and bringing our gear to an event near you, we need just a bit more help.

What We Need & What You Get

We've set up a few goal tiers that will help us grow as we gain support. Our minimum goal is $6000. With just that much we will be able to get an early model (2000-2004) minivan that will allow us to bring more gear to events around the U.S..

Our next goal is $12,000, which will allow us to get our "dream vehicle," a 2009-2010 Mazda5. This vehicle gets some of the best gas mileage for the storage space we need while still being affordable.

Next, to help get more advertising and wrapping the vehicle would be the perfect way to do that. Current quotes we've gotten place the wraps at around $2500, so our next goal is $14,500.

Our last goal is $16,000. This will give us the ability to get our "dream vehicle," the wraps, and gridwall displays to make our booths that much better! Any funds we raise after that will help us stock up on gear, create new products, and upgrade equipment to reduce the amount of time it takes for us to create leather gear.

We have lots of great rewards available to those who help including t-shirts, patches, custom leather gear, and so much more!

The Impact

Having this campaign succeed will help a one-woman operated small business continue to grow and expand. We love our local fans and look forward to continuing to expand to the rest of the U.S. and eventually the rest of the world! This new(ish) vehicle can help make that all happen by giving us the wheels to transport our ever-growing selection of gear in the most cost-efficient way we can to events both within and outside of Florida.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign with you friends!

Want to see us at an event near you? Let your local event organizers know you want Adrenalize at their event!

story:
The Inspiration

Over the past three years the Kruse family has added almost 500 American Flags to the patriotic display along Greenville's historic Park Street, Audie Murphy Overpass leading into Downtown Greenville, and a number of areas around town.  Many residents of Greenville already participate and have a flag placed in their front yard by the Greenville Daybreak Rotary. The Kruse's were inspired to go out on their own and acquire the flags after watching a CBS Sunday Morning episode that featured Larry Eckhardt aka “The Flagman” and his efforts to honor America’s fallen heroes.  In the past couple years, the flags have been used to line a portion of the funeral procession of the late Navy Seal, Chris Kyle, as well as other events around the area.

The Project

This year the Kruse family is working to extend the flag lined streets that have already lined the section of Business Highway 69 from Park Street to Downtown Greenville.  This largest goal to date is to line I-30 with from Monty Stratton Parkway to Moulton Street.  This effort will take over a thousand flags and hundreds of hours of work. 

How You Can Help

We are once again asking for contributions to help with the supplies needed.  With such a large goal this year we are seeking as much help from the community as possible.  You can make a contribution via this campaign of visit our Facebook page for more info on how you can help. (https://www.facebook.com/GreenvilleFlags)

story:
The Goldwing Group is a full service management, public relations, event coordination and concierge service company. While others are focused on only providing you with a service, our approach is to make your life easier by offering personalized services tailored to your life, schedule, needs and of course your taste. Becoming a member of The Goldwing Group provides the key to exclusive premium concierge services, public relations, and events production. From organizing your leisure or business travel, managing basic requests, to crafting the most extravagant experiences, we are here to make dreams into realities at The Goldwing Group of an eye. The Goldwing Group aims to provide a one-stop luxury concierge and lifestyle management service for very busy people who are seeking timesaving solutions. Our goal is to give busy people back time so that they can focus on other priorities in their lives. We cater to clients who value the exclusivity of our services and our thoughtful professionalism.


What We Need 

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We are looking to raise funds to cover the cost of new business expenses, including: Marketing materials, office/meeting space, employee expenses, technology, auto, package delivery, office supplies. 

 Challenges

  • Without funds to cover expenses, we won't be able to touch the type of clientele we hope to target. In the entertainment/sports world, everything is about image and brand. We want to put our best foot forward and all times.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Follow Us on Social Media: TheGoldwingGroup
  • Email us for all inquiries. info@thegoldwinggroup.com

story:
The Big Idea!

So this idea has been toying around in my head (Tom's) for nearly a decade!  But after many other priorities over the past 5-10 years of several business ventures, non-profit work, and the biggest priority of family - I’m excited to finally get it off the ground with the help of a key business partner. (Dave)
[More about us down below]

Nowadays we see the tipping point of the on-demand economy - whether that’s the mainstream stuff like Airbnb and Uber now, or the up-and-coming, innovative ideas like fuel delivery / on-demand, different models of delivery via Amazon, or food delivery services - both prepared and grocery-level services. And so much more...

With that all said, we are truly honored and excited to introduce to you, Shamme!  


Think Uber crossed with mobile detailing, with a splash of online scheduling thrown in.  We are in the pilot / beta stages, but have already built out the initial site framework and done years of research - and so we’re eager to launch the website this summer, and start piloting out our area around the Washington D.C. / Baltimore / Annapolis areas, as well as consider the next areas that we’ll target.  From there, we plan to get the mobile app up and running by the fall - which will make scheduling even easier! (keeping in mind though, the summer version of the website will still be very responsive and easy-to-use on mobile devices, smartphones, tablets, etc. - so no worries there.  It will almost feel like an app, in fact)

BUT WE NEED YOUR HELP! :)

So you’re probably asking - what are we all about?!  Here’s the lowdown how you can get in on our early development stages, and be a KEY part of our growth and adoption throughout the country!


The Problem

You’re looking to get your car cleaned, and you haven’t had time to do this yourself, and either the nearest car wash is busy, not working, or too far away. Adding to this issue, car wash stations charge a small fortune for a mediocre job and can waste gallons of precious water, while possibly damaging your car in the process. 

OR, you wait in a long line at an over-priced auto-detailer - wasting your time AND money!


So we created a simple fix for this...introducing Shamme!


Our Solution

Just like ‘shammy’ (chamois) - the rag, Shamme contracts expert car detailers out on the road all day, every day, cleaning cars around the city. As the world’s first online scheduling application for car washes, we’ll clean your car when you’re not there. We can come to your office, your home, recreational activity site, the airport your car is parked at, your hotel, park ‘n’ ride space or the sporting event parking lot where you’re enjoying the game or concert. You just book your order for a wash, or wash & wax and leave the rest to us.

By the time you return, your car exterior is sparkling and you’re good to go!


How Shamme Works

Simply schedule your car wash on our mobile friendly website or with our smartphone app (launching fall/winter 2016) within a few minutes, inform us where your car is located and the timeframe in which you’d like us to clean your vehicle. Our Shamme detailers will scrub and expertly clean the exterior of your car/van/pickup, whatever, to a shine - and when you return, it’ll be looking like new. We don’t even need your car keys since Shamme cleans your exterior yet if your car is VIP or valet parked, you can also book interior detailing. Once the job is completed, automatic payment is processed. Hey, you can even leave a tip on Shamme for your detailers as a thank you.

Not only are we more environmentally-friendly, using only around 15 to 20 gallons of water per vehicle, as opposed to typical car washes that waste 65 to 100 gallons - AND we’re flexible on location and timeframe windows. The "time and location" factor is our secret sauce, to doing what NO ONE else is doing out there.


Shamme Results

With Shamme, you gain a flurry of benefits from booking our service for an impulse, occasional or weekly clean. 

Imagine the possibilities of no more embarrassing situations when you’re heading to a meeting and your boss decides to join, but your car is dirty. 

Or leaving your muddy car at the airport and returning to a clean vehicle. Airports are bound to be our biggest seller!  Have you ever driven by these HUGE lots in airports and seen all the cars, just sitting there for DAYS??!

How about that rainy morning at your kid’s soccer game yet you’re picking up the in-laws for lunch and you haven’t a moment to clean up your car while you’re watching the match. Goal!

Possibly you’re a regular commuter who parks ‘n’ rides and would love to return to a sparkling car come Friday. Or your car is at the mechanic and when it’s ready for pick up, it’s also Shamme clean!

Maybe you list your car as a peer-to-peer vehicle and a neighbor wants to rent it, but you’re not nearby so the renter could write a negative review about its cleanliness. If you’ve hired a vehicle from a rental agency, they charge surplus cleaning fees so now you can avoid additional overinflated detailing costs. After a relaxing trip to the spa, you don’t want to chip your nails and ruin your hair because your car needs cleaning. While you’re in the salon, so is your car...right outside, being scrubbed to a shine.

Also consider how much gas and time you’ll save from not needing to drive to a car wash, because we come to where your car is parked.


More About Us

Our founders, Tom and Dave, each have over 20 years of experience in technology, car detailing and the entrepreneurial arena. 

A few companies we have both worked at as employees or consultants over the years, include:

  • US Army / NATO
  • AARP
  • US Bancorp
  • Veterans Affairs (VA)
  • US Treasury
  • ADP
  • Duke University
  • University of Maryland
  • Loyola University in Maryland
  • NASA
  • NOAA
  • Startups like G2Xchange and Digital Natives Consulting
  • To mention a few...

Our vast experience in startups, government and Fortune 500 companies has given us valuable insights, expertise and lessons learned.  In terms of this new business, we have tested the market and drivers like what we’re doing because it’s time & cost effective. Existing mobile detailers want to sign up because they can make extra cash while enjoying flexible hours.

Travel booking websites want to partner with us so that customers can book Shamme at the same time they confirm a flight on Expedia, Kayak, Orbitz and other travel platforms. We’ll also partner with stadiums so when a customer purchases that sporting or concert ticket, they can also book a car cleaning while (or before) enjoying the entertainment. Additionally, we’ll partner with car rental companies as part of our business-to-business division.


Geographical Launch

We’re initially launching pilot programs in several parking lots at Baltimore/Washington International Airport (BWI) with our website (responsive mobile) platform. We will then expand to Reagan National Airport, Washington D.C. alongside Dulles International Airport in Northern Virginia. Our one founder is located five minutes from the primary hub of the BWI Airport region, assuring both drivers and detailers of Shamme running a hands-on operation in the vicinity.  The other founder/partner is closer to the D.C. region and will oversee those operations as we bootstrap and grow.

Once the pilot stage is fine tuned, we’ll partner with more detailers around the United States. Capturing these busy metropolitan areas, alongside affluent residents and offices in the D.C. suburbs, our proof of concept will then expand city-by-city introducing New York City, Philadelphia, Boston, Raleigh/Charlotte and Atlanta as secondary phase geographical expansions.

By 2018, we expect to be live in Denver, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Seattle. Car Detailers will be contracted so they have flexibility on working hours, while customers have an assurance our professionally trained detailers are security screened.

Our series of roll-out phases during growth gives us the opportunity to test the market and see how the business model performs, while providing us the opportunity to scale methodically and effectively. (one quick example being: parking facilities that "index", or label/track their parking spaces, will be one key to our success in automating more of our online scheduling app, over time)


Funding Breakdown

We want to be fully transparent, so these are the very best estimates of our projected costs to tell you the financial story about our business venture, and how you'll be a part of helping write (and build!) that story.

  • Website (late summer 2016) & Smartphone App Design (fall/winter 2016), development & architecture to finish building the scheduling portal: $40,000
  • Costs for Recruitment and Relationship Development w/Mobile Detailers: $10,000
  • Marketing of Services: $8,500
  • State and Private Agency proposal work: $15,000 (i.e. collaborating with local governments for access to park and ride locations; winning business with new airport locations, stadiums, etc.)
  • Projected Budget for Crowdfunding Perks: $1,500


So please share this campaign with your friends and family, and help us spread the word to make this world and its cars, trucks, crossovers, hybrids, minivans and more - a cleaner, friendlier place! :)

Also a last parting note: We welcome critiques and questions and will post Q&A/updates as the campaign rolls along, to entertain healthy dialog about the project, the app, and the overall business model.  
Thanks for stopping by!

story:
Why A Retail Location For Border City Cakes?

Border City Cakes is currently a home-based operation. For the past 6 years it has been steadily growing in popularity, and has gained a very loyal clientele. With only word of mouth used for advertising, Border City Cakes has become a city-wide brand name with nearly 4,000 fans on Facebook. I'm regularly booked solid nearly a month in advance, and known locally for being the best place to go for extraordinarily delicious and stunning cake and cupcakes. I believe my success is because Border City Cakes has, and will always be, about the incompromisable integrity of the product being presented to clients.

After 6 years of dedicated brand-building and hard work, Border City Cakes has become a family business, capable of more than adequetely solely supporting a household. I'm positive that given the opportunity to expand to a commercial location, Border City Cakes would sky rocket to become THE place to get cakes and cupcakes in Windsor Essex County. 


What I Need. Brass Tacks Time.

The unfortunate part of transitioning a home-based business to even a small scale commercial bakery, is that it's extremely expensive because the set up is very specific due to building codes, fire safety, and the need to invest in commercial size equipment. The bulk of expenses are the large pricey items such as a walk-in cooler, a refrigerated display case, large Hobart mixers, hood ventilation, commercial oven, a dishwashing station, commercial size fridges and freezers. These items needed to start up add up VERY quickly.

Also, because of the specific set up needed, the chances of finding a space for lease that is bakery-ready and in good condition are slim to none. Whatever space is found, needs to have renovations that are rarely (if ever) included in lease conditions.  

So, that's what the $40,000 covers. I know it's a lot of money. So far this financial hump has been a hurdle I'm not able to tackle on my own, which is why I'm asking for some help in this way. A little bit or a lot, all contributions are very appreciated and helpful. 


The Impact

If this campaign is successfully funded, here are some of the things you can look forward to seeing from Border City Cakes:

  • A truly exciting high end bake shop with a phenomenal established reputation
  • A full and innovative cupcake menu offered daily for drop-in visits 
  • Fun promotions and events unlike any other in the city. Border City Cakes is home of the wildly successful Mystery Wedding Cake Promotion and Facebook Cupcake Auctions
  • Cake and cupcake classes for adults and children, as well as skill demonstrations
  • Continued product donations to local registered charities

Risks & Challenges

I'm happy to admit that I'd be starting with a rather unique advantage. Border City Cakes is already established, profitable, and has a built up brand name with customer loyalty. The largest risks at this point are essentially all in the start up cost. If I can make it past that hurdle, then I'm confident that the foundation I've laid over the past 6 years will serve as way of insuring a quick and smooth transition into a successful commercial bakery.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, don't worry, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share this campaign on social media... and keep sharing. 
  • Mention this campaign to friends and family. Word of mouth has gotten me this far, so I'm sure the goal will be met if enough people just hear about it. 
  • Send me a message of encouragement. It's free and it'll keep my spirits up. Let be honest, $40k is a lot of money and a difficult amount to raise. A kind word is never wasted during such a daunting task.

story:
The Bournemouth Brewery has had an unprecedented growth of 700% in 2 years. We've increased capacity, moved premises and won 7 awards for our beer.


From previously only producing Cask ale and Specialist unfined craft Lagers, we're now looking for funding for a modern bottling line to go with our newly acquired Distillation license. - With the new staffing additions to the brewery, - who have a proven track record. We now have a very good opportunity for breaking into the mainstream wholesaler network - not to mention to start fulfilling our local orders!

The Equipment we need

The day and age of bottle-conditioned beers are at an end and consumers are crying out for sterile filtered, forced carbonated beers. That's where you come in!

We have the opportunity to buy a top of the range piece of equipment (see above that will allow us to achieve all our Bottling objectives and allow us to filter our kegged lagers that we feel will spearhead our future.

(Lollz, Varden, Chris, Michael)

We truly appreciate any support you can give us. - Even if its spreading the news on our campaign! We'd appreciate if you shared this among your friends. Believe us when we say it will be reciprocal as we'll make you the best beer we can! 


The small print:

Free beer for life is only available in Draft beer form! people who want to redeem this perk will only be able to collect direct from the brewery. - Strictly 365/366 pints  a year. Should you require more you'll have to pay more. non cumulative or transferable year after year. sorry! but think of it as more of an incentive to get your friends together!! 

Brew with a Brewer day can be shared between a group of you! Stag parties welcome, corporate team building welcome, beer enthusiasts welcome. On the day soft drinks are provided but we can put food on and stock the bar for an additional charge, - depending on numbers ideal number is 4 maximum 10!

story:
Who are we? 

We are a group of friends. Each one of us has different skills but we share THE same common dream. 

Our team is composed by professional tailors and engineers, with specific experiences in wearable technology and fashion design. 

It was a game we used to play since we were kids, and now, we are working to let that game become reality.

We need your help to improve this "wearable technology" and to turn it into something you will be able to use in the everyday life. 

ITT Quality

Do you know how much, a jacket/suit made to measure, costs in the current market?

Well, technology apart, this is a true Italian style collection. 

100% made in Italy with high quality materials. You will not find anywhere the same quality with a lower retail price.

"Pulito Abbigliamento" has proven with his quality and style,  that each jacket or suit are at the TOP level, in the Italian and European market,  about fabrics and hand made sewing. 

You will do your figure, even without "Ghost Devices"...


ITT's goals

The goals of this campaign are:

- the development and the improvement of our prototypes

- the development of a larger scale production.


Why you should help us?

First of all, because you will be able to say "Ehi! I took part into the "wearable technology" evolution!" ... and, of course,  by contributing you will save over 70% of the market value of our future products.


ITT's Vision 

Combining our Engineers' expertise with "Pulito Abbigliamento" know-how and experience in the fashion industry, we could be able to spread the product all over the world, changing people lifestyle.


Our style

In order to satisfy each one of you, we designed two different collections:

- CASUAL STYLE

- CLASSIC STYLE


Our cornerstones are:

Let's dig inside...
We do use Arduino Lilypad, to link everything together and to implement mobile applications functions...



The DVR will be included for the first 100 pledges of ITT 1 and ITT 3. 

While is "optional" for the pledge of “ITT Basic and ITT 2”,

it can be added separately also at the end of the campaign.


Jammer
Improve your privacy in:
The office, keep clear your meeting from interruptions...
The car, your girlfriend is always chatting or on the phone doing something else while you driving...
In the classroom, avoid student distractions....

Note: The "Text messaging" function, will be replaced and/or extended to the Mobile Application (Android/IOS), once we reach the related stretch goal. 

Challenges

We are making prototypes with several improvements to both design and technology, while we already working to include the following features in the current ITT products, 

  1. Bigger collection of fabrics and colours 
  2. Flexible Solar Cells -  Green energy ready
  3. Mobile application  2.0 - to get full control of each ITT configuration.
Your help, to reach new goals, it is important  to us, in order to better organise our resources.



Positioned behind the Lapel, it will be impossible to see it or to feel it.

Note: The solar panels feature, will be implemented once we reach the related stretch-goal. 


We believe in your support in any way it comes:

  • Spreading out the voice and making more Italian Tailored Technology's friends,  #ITT #TailoredTech #Italian_TT.
  • and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! 


Sharing is caring! ;)



F.A.Q.

How do you will use the funds?

The funds will be used to buy raw materials,  to develop large quantity of tech devices (making them safely connected), and to make testing and overall improvements.

How do you collect the measurements?

Each jacket is made to measure, and we will collect all yours measurements, at the end of the campaign.

May I wash the Jacket?

Yes! - Every jacket and each embedded device, thanks to the skin-silicon membrane, can be dry washed with no damage to the ITT system. 

Besides, each component can be safely removed for external use or for further applications, leaving you with a beautiful and cool Jacket. 

May I already use the mobile app ?

We are already started developing the mobile app (Android and IOS), by reaching the related stretch goal , will make easier for us to finalise the development.

Some of the functions (GPS tracking and remote listening) are already implemented, through 2-way Text Messaging communication and control, and will be available once we reach the main goal of 70K. 

How long the batteries will last?

With the 2 batteries configuration you can get around:

  • GPS tracking:               12  hours 
  • HD Camera:                    6 hours 
  • Jammer:                           6 hours
  • USB Media charging:   2 x full smartphone charge

story:
nit

My name is Ederson I am 29 years old , I have been working since I was 15 years old I have held many jobs titles. I have work as a housekeeper , a laundry attendant , an airplane groomer ,a chair car driver , a security guard and a duck loader. I had fun performing all these jobs titles and learned a lot from them. But my true passion is cleaning and arranging I love keeping houses and cars and yard clean and tidy. I love the Joy I  bring to people once I clean and arrange their house .the smile in their faces is all i need. I have decided to create this small company to make this dream and passion a reality. 

The money you provide will help with purchase of more cleaning supplies such as vacuum brooms ,mops ,windows squeegees ,rags and a used mini van. I will also hire 3 people that I know who have been looking for works for the past month.

I know it is unusual to make such a request for donation ,  and most people would think a business with for people cant really   bring help to a community. To  those people I am truthfully sorry to say they are wrong because its only takes one's goodwill and willingness to make a difference .

Unity is power, donation for good causes is great and helping the most fortunate is rewardful. what I trying to say is I would never come here unless that was my last result. There you have it people please help me help my community.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Patsy Barnett, I am a Realtor and Real Estate Property Manager in the Philadelphia, PA area.  I was a single mother and raised my son who is now 36 years old.  I currently lease 3 properties to single mothers.  I have watched them struggle to make ends meet for many years now and I remember the struggle to provide a loving and safe home for my son.  Two of the single moms are in housing programs which subsidize their rental payment.  This is good and bad.  The help is good but the program does not help or prepare them to become homeowners.  One mother has been in the same property for almost 11 years.  She loves the neighborhood, it is close to her mother's house which is a convenience and she would like to stay in the property. 

My goal is to help single parents become responsible homeowners.  There are many hard working individuals that are trying to raise children and provide a decent home but the economy has made it hard to make ends meet.  My program will provide homeownership within a year and teach the recipient how to maintain and keep their new home.

One day I received a credit card statement in the mail and was billed a $.50 finance charge in error.  I called the company and they made an adjustment but I started thinking about how many people would just pay the charge because it was a nominal amount and how much the credit card company was making just from collecting a $.50 finance charge from many, many people. 

At that point I started thinking how I could raise funds to purchase the homes $1 at a time to allow the current tenant to become the homeowner.  And that's where I need your help.

What We Need & What You Get

 I need as many people as possible to donate a minimum of $1, of course we will accept more as you please.  The first house we need to collect $60,000, which is just 60,000 people donating $1 to help a single parent become a homeowner.  I want to help each potential homeowner understand the responsibility and up keep needed to maintain a home.   I want to help these single parents become independent of housing programs where applicable.  We will use the funds to purchase the property, renovate as needed and provide a teaching program for  the tenant/owner to help them prepare for the responsibilities of being a homeowner. 
My goal is to raise the full amount needed but if we do not reach the goal I will return the funds donated back to the individuals that were supportive of our effort to make single parents homeowners.  
We need the world to know that you have contributed to a wonderful cause that helps single parents become homeowners, therefore any contribution of $10 or more will receive a refrigerator magnet and $25 or more a car bumper magnet which  will identify the cause so that you can advertise our effort.

The Impact

The recipient would lease the property for a period of one year and be responsible for the insurance, taxes, and maintenance during this time.  In addition, they would commit to attend my Home Ownership 101 course each month which would educate them on the responsibilities of being homeowners.  They must maintain a spending plan, good credit and on time payments of all house and utility bills. At the end of the year with successful completion of the program the deed would be put in their name and they will become homeowners. 

Just think of how many single parent families this program could potentially help and you made it happen $1 at a time.  We would hope that you will spread the word to your family and friends to help us make some noise about this effort to make more single parents independent homeowners.

story:
Who are we?

The Chaste Company-- a small spirits company based in Northwest Florida. Our debut cocktail, No. 850®, is a proper blend of premium rums and all natural fruit juices w/ natural flavors. Now found in resorts, clubs, bars, restaurants, liquor stores & a nationally recognized large retailer, No. 850® is ready-to-serve and versatile enough to pair w/ other spirits for unique cocktails that can be served at any occasion.

What is the No. 850®?

Peering through the premium 17% ALC/VOL (34 proof) rum are notes of citrus, pineapple, and coconut for a fruit-to-kick ratio that is just right and a ‘wince’ factor of zero. It is meticulously crafted w/ premium spirits, natural juices, and no artificial colors.

Where do you come in?

We need financial assistance with to assist us with operations; manufacturing; and for new product development. Your invaluable support helps our efforts to have another successful year.

Why are we turning to Indiegogo to help us raise funds?

We are a small-company w/ limited access to the necessary resources to help us. Like most of the other projects with campaigns, we have heavily invested our time and money into our venture. We have had to seek very little outside help to finance our company. All the challenges we overcame before reaching the market reduced our capacity to absorb all the ones we face now.

In which ways do we contribute back to our community?

We may be a very small company but that does not discourage us from supporting others. From participating in events in support of veterans to those that fund children's charities, we want our company to focus more than on its own success. 

In terms of our commitment to the environment, the paints on our bottles are lead free and incorporate organic ink to make them easier to recycle.

story:
My name is Austin Cisneros and I love wine!

I know that people love to have parties or even social events at home and I want to help make it more enjoyable with wine.

I will have wine tasting packages for home wine tasting parties.  I will also have an hourly rate for those who need consulting on wine selections for parties and events. Not everyone hires a caterer for their events but need to know how much wine or beer to order for their event.  I am a lower cost answer to that problem.  I will have the ability to order the wine my self versus going through a retail outlet and passing the savings on to you.  I will also be available to co-host events as your personal Sommelier.  I will be able to answer questions on the wine or any other information guests may need.  Have you ever Sabered Champagne?  I am equipped to demonstrate at parties and events.

All i need to get started is the money to establish my business and get my licenses.  Anything will help from one dollar up to the perk* incentive amounts.  

*Note that perks can not be combined.  Example:  Contributing $100 will not get you 2 $50 perks.  Perks apply to each individual contribution and you may contribute as many times as you wish.

Who is Austin?

I am a 10 year Veteran of the US Navy, Aviation Electronics Technician

I am Le Cordon Bleu certified, I attended the Austin Culinary College

I am a 10 Veteran in the Hospitality industry.  I have been a personal chef, sous chef and an executive chef.  I have also waited tables, bar-tended, host, managed and been the Sommelier.

I am a member of the Court of Master Sommeliers as well as The Society of Wine Educators.

I am passionate about wine but more so love to have fun with it.  This is not intended to be a study session but a fun event for friends and family with wine and food.

Please get on your Facebook, twitter or even email and help me get the word out  about my business.

Wine Lovers Unite!

story:
We have put everything we have and everything we don't have into OORadio over the 3 years for programming OORadio. We have been on a break for a few years and now ready to come back BUT WE NEED YOUR HELP.  Help bring OORadio back to the masses.  If we met our goal we will get on air August 2015.

The bear minimum OORadio needs to back on the airis $399 a year to pay for our blogtalk show for the next 12 months. We are getting a few paid advertisements hear and there to support us but we need more. 

We know that the work we are doing here is Ancestor drive and we just want to continue doing the work. We have plans for new shows as well as our old shows returning in May so please donate today.

Adupe,

Osaremi

What are we raising funds for?

We need for a pro- account on Blogtalkradio to do our shows (Estimated  $399)

Marketing will be done used for the rest of the money we raise.

What you get:

$8 Ire (Good Luck) OORadio- Shout out on OORadio shows and Facebook pages

$16 Imo (Knowledge) OORadio -Above plus an OORadio Bumper sticker

$50 Ogbon (Wisdom) OORadio- All Above plus an OORadio Tee Shirt

$75 Agbada (Strength) OORadio- Above pluss OORadio Sweet Shirt

$100 Ilera (Good Health) OORadio- Above plus OORadio Tote Bag

The Impact

Omo Oduduwa Radio has been impacting the Yoruba community worldwide over the 3 years in countries such as the United States, United kingdom, Brazil, Germany, Nigeria, Ukraine, Canada, Russia, Venezuela, the Netherlands and more.

We have had such guest including HRM Oba Adejuyigbe Adefunmi II (King of Oyotunji), HRM Alayelusa Oba Al-Marrof Adekunle Magbagbeola (Obalufon), Awise Wande Abimbola (Ifa world spokesperson), Araba Ifayemi Elebuibon (Araba Oshogboland), Chief FAMA, Chief Ayo Salami, Chief Ifabowale Somadhi, Chief Solagbade Poopola, and many others.

We have had over 120,000 listens to our shows and it is continuing to grow.

Other Ways You Can Help OORadio

Share this campaign with family, friends and everyone you know. Also, be sure to share on Facebook, Twitter and Email. Share our story. Share the story of Orisa tradition through having our very own worldwide radio station.

story:
It all starts with a Vrient

When you graduate, you have many friends and NOTHING is going to change that.

Nothing?

So you will lose friends over the years, but it’s not as easy as it was during the college days to find new friends who compliment your new lifestyle. You have a family now and your friends will be your family’s friends.

Sure, you got social network sites, but those are to stay in touch with existing friends or connect with old ones.

Or you have single dating sites, but those are only good for finding love, not new friends.

And all of them give you individual profiles, so as a family you won’t find anybody.



Why choose to become a Vrient?

Vrient is the new friend site for couples with or without children, single parents, and even singles who are fed up with dating sites and just want to meet people based on interest, hobbies, travel or sports, without any hidden agenda.

You just make one profile where you can add your family as multiple users and indicate what you love doing.

Vrient will then propose profile matches based on our special algorithm. 

Are you a family with 3 children and looking for another family to go on a skiing holiday together?

Are you a single mom with 2 children and want to go to the zoo?

It’s more fun to meet with other people with children of the same age, don’t you think?

Your children just left home and you want to invite some couples without children over for a barbecue and a few drinks?

Just send a message, get in contact and get out to meet each other. 


Who is Vrient for?

The new friend platform is suited for: 

- Couples with or without children who are looking for another family to hang out with... 

- Single parents looking for someone their child can have play dates with...

- Singles who are fed up of social websites and want to meet someone new based on their interests...

So all who just want to meet people based on location, interest, travel, hobbies or sports, without any hidden agenda. 


Once you're set up within minutes, you can simply login and start finding Vrients.

  1. Log in and indicate which family member you are.
  2. The HIVE will automatically suggest your new Vrients based on your location and interests.
  3. Invite a profile to become Vrients,
  4. Start chatting. The whole family can chat together. 
  5. Meet in real life.

  6. Have fun!

What makes Vrient unique? 


Dating for Families 

Combining the flow of a Dating app with a Social Network.


Unique Group Profile

One profile can contain multiple persons (couple, family).



The Hive

Automated search with a percentage for best matches based on the Vrient Logarythm: our HIVE system.



Family Group Chat

Used over multiple devices: any family member can log in from their own phone or tablet and join the conversation.




Interest-based Profile

Vrient profiles are based on your location and what you love doing so that you can find and connect with like-minded people as quickly as possible.



What are the Vrient goals? 

Goal 1: 1.650 $ we build the website




Goal 2: 15.000 $ we build an Android version


Goal 3: 25.000 $ we build an IOS version


Goal 4: 35.000 $ we build a Windows phone version


Goal 5: 50.000 $ we add a calendar and holiday functionality


When will Vrient be ready? 

  1. June 2015 Crowdfunding 
  2. August 2015 launch of Beta Versions
  3. November 2015 launch of Final version

During the Beta version, everyone will be able to join and test the product for free.


FAQ

  • Difference between Facebook-Vrient?

    Facebook is to find existing friends, Vrient is to make new friends
    Facebook has one profile per person, Vrient will allow you to make a "family profile"
    Facebook suggest friends based on your existing contacts, Vrients unique cross reference search will propose you friends based on location, sports, hobby and travel. 


  • Why isn't Vrient for free?

    As developing, maintenance and hosting cost money, we will work with a monthly, quarterly or yearly subscription. 
    At the end of the subscription period, you will NOT be prolongued automatically, as we are an ethical company. 

    In return you will get
    - A good service and great product
    - A publicity free site and apps
    - We don't sell your private info to 3rd party companies
    - No fakers or dishonest persons.


  • Is Vrient a Dating Site?

    The way it works, might show resemblance to some dating sites, but Vrient is by no means a way to find a new lover or erotic contact. We just bring finding friends to a next user friendly level. 


  • What if I stop my subscription?

    You will still be able to use all Vrient functionality, apart from chatting with other people. So you can still look for friends, even without paying.
story_txt:
It all starts with a Vrient
When you
graduate, you have many friends and NOTHING is going to change that.
Nothing? 
So you will
lose friends over the years, but it’s not as easy as it was during the college
days to find new friends who compliment your new lifestyle. You have a family
now and your friends will be your family’s friends. 
Sure, you
got social network sites, but those are to stay in touch with existing friends
or connect with old ones. 
Or you have
single dating sites, but those are only good for finding love, not new friends.

And all of
them give you individual profiles, so as a family you won’t find anybody. 


Why choose to become a Vrient?


Vrient is the new
friend site for couples with or without children, single parents, and even
singles who are fed up with dating sites and just want to meet people based on
interest, hobbies, travel or sports, without any hidden agenda. 
You just
make one profile where you can add your family as multiple users and indicate
what you love doing.
Vrient will
then propose profile matches based on our special algorithm. 


Are you a
family with 3 children and looking for another family to go on a skiing holiday
together? 
Are you a
single mom with 2 children and want to go to the zoo? 
It’s more
fun to meet with other people with children of the same age, don’t you think? 
Your
children just left home and you want to invite some couples without children
over for a barbecue and a few drinks?
Just send a
message, get in contact and get out to meet each other. 


Who is Vrient for?
The new friend platform is suited for: 
- Couples with or without children who are looking for another family to hang out with... 
- Single parents looking for someone their child can have play dates with...
- Singles who are fed up of social websites and want to meet someone new based on their interests...So all who just want to meet people based on location, interest, travel, hobbies or sports, without any hidden agenda.

Facebook is to find existing friends, Vrient is to make new friendsFacebook has one profile per person, Vrient will allow you to make a "family profile"Facebook suggest friends based on your existing contacts, Vrients unique cross reference search will propose you friends based on location, sports, hobby and travel.

story:
It was in Detroit, Michigan, at a session with officials of the Arab American Chamber of Commerce in the United States of America, last month that the nickel dropped about the need to start a social innovation project back home in Nigeria that helps the small business owner and aspiring entrepreneur wade through the difficulties of starting and sustaining his business.

As I listened keenly to the middle age Yemeni woman addressing us (I was part of a group of International visitors who were guests of the United States Government) at the chamber, she began to talk about the activities of Tejara, a Detroit based business incubator that was doing much in helping the Arab community of the American Midwest to take over the commanding heights of the Michigan economy after a slow recovery from the US financial crises of 2008.

A few days later, this conviction about social innovation was reinforced when I walked through the facilities of Tech Town, Detroit’s main innovation hub and smart zone located close to Wayne University. As the city’s most established business accelerator and incubator, I saw firsthand how it was helping small tech startups succeed in Detroit’s push to reinvent itself.

I began to think incubation and acceleration as my vehicle for social change. I felt this form of innovation would be more of a novel solution to the teething problem of unemployment in Nigeria, as it would be more effective in creating value which would accrue directly to society as a whole rather than just a few individuals.

My decision to head up the social innovation path once I came back to Nigeria was finally cemented weeks later in New England, Boston Massachusetts to be precise as I toured the facilities of GreenLabs, the largest clean technology incubator in the United States operating a 30,000sq ft facility that houses a community of bold, passionate entrepreneurs creating life changing energy technologies that transform the way we live, work, and play.

Now, up until that point, I never saw business incubation as a vehicle for social change. I always looked upon incubation as just another avenue for business development. Incubation and acceleration were not totally new to me. Having worked at the Federal Ministry of Trade & Investment in Abuja as a Special Assistant to the Hon Minister, I have been part of several teams that worked directly with the Small & Medium Enterprises Development Agency of Nigeria (SMEDAN) in fashioning out policies that grow small businesses and position them for success.

However, seeing incubators and accelerators in full scale operation, from the American Midwest right up to New England, churning out life changing technology, brought home their importance to me in a way I never saw in Nigeria.

On my 14 hour flight back home from the Boston Logan via Frankfurt a few days later, I reappraised the problem statement again: many small business owners in Africa are struggling. They are smart, have bold ideas and are very passionate about what they have chosen to do.

However, they lack support- they need to write business plans or feasibility reports- they can’t. They need to access funds- a few millions, some just a few hundred thousands, they are not able to. They need office space to operate; they don’t know any address to even use for postal purposes.

They need to be mentored, they need to be better educated about management best practices, but they don’t even know that they need this sort of education. This was my statement of the problem and Small Business Activation (SBA) is my solution- my vehicle for social innovation.

I know it is now time for social innovation in the business development space and my team and I have come up with this project, Small Business Activation, a business incubator and start up accelerator.

Yes, there are several business incubators in Africa, but only few offer more than office space and/or wet labs. Just a handful of them provide the necessary professional support team that is needed to prop up these entrepreneurs.

At SBA, we provide all this and leverage our global connections to provide entrepreneurial training and education, in conjunction with nearby universities and training institutions. We provide in house access to a diverse ecosystem of resource and service providers in a collaborative environment.

So, SBA is building a community of passionate entrepreneurs to help nurture their small businesses that would create employment and reduce poverty in Africa.The money raised will be used to set up an incubation centre and an acceleration program.

We will invite selected small business owners into the centre, give them small offices and/or wet labs (for them to conduct their businesses and/pr production operations), help them develop business plans, feasibility & marketing reports. We will get a team of legal, financial & IT experts to help them properly ground their operations while we will connect them to financing and funding sources.

Our acceleration program will mentor them, educate them, give them access to a network of angel investors and then make sure they access and are trained in technologies of their industries.

Basically, the idea is to give them tool of their own personal empowerment to help them succeed and then go out and create jobs that not only reduce poverty in Nigeria, but Africa as a whole.

So, Small Business Activation is also a poverty alleviation project of some sort and I hope those who believe in reducing poverty worldwide will key into this.

We hope to raise a new generation of super entrepreneurs whose very roots and foundations will be traced back to the tools and resources we provided them at SBA during their infancy. The success of these men and women across African and global markets will become the corner stone of Nigerian renaissance in this nascent millennium.

We do not despise the days of humble beginnings, and making a success of these men and women in their small corner of the world, is what we have promised to do with all our acumen, might and clout.
And we will do this pro bono- free of charge, at no cost to these struggling entrepreneurs.

This is my oath, we pledge till the end.

story:
The Problem:

Nearly ½ of trans persons have seriously considered suicide.* They're also far more likely to attempt.

Collectively, gender-diverse and trans people are also far more likely to be victims of interpersonal violence.* The Trans Murder Monitoring Project reports 1,374 deaths since January 2008.

78% of gender non-conforming youth report “significant abuse at school.”*

It’s also a diversity issue.* Hispanic and Black youth who identify as transgender or gender diverse in any way are twice as likely to attempt suicide.

We want this to change. We believe we can play a role in that change, with you.


Our Solution:

We see access to the simplest things can be denied. We want to provide trans and gender-diverse youth with an easy means to get what they need-- be it toiletries, clothing, or higher-end items like binders, binaried clothing, and bras.

Subscription boxes are a trending way of trying out new products, or getting access to things you need every so-often. We'd like to provide subscription boxes with pride items, books selected by the community around this project (see our "Community" header, later), binders, bras, clothing item of the binary the recipient wants, and other great items into a completely customizeable subscription box package.

Every box purchased by a sponsor gives one to a trans or non-binary spectrum youth. This is the most important part of the project to us. Providing youth with access to items which they may need, and also providing them with a Letter of Encouragement (which will be handwritten and unique, and come in every youth box), is a small way of helping trans youth who might be in an un-supportive or financially strapped home.


I know you-- you’re asking how we can do this. The best way to help this project is to purchase something (for yourself or someone close to you) or to share the project!


BOX LISTING

This is the moment you've been waiting for... what's in the darn things?

Here's a list of what's might be in a typical box, and each box will be entirely customized for the recipient including size, color (as we're able), binary or non-binary, and much more.

Box List #1

- 4+ pride trinkets, customized to the recipient's identity: including keychains, tattoos, stickers, pins, and pronoun pins.
- 3 panties or gaffs, in the recipient's size
- 1 binder or 2 bras or 2 clothing items, customized to YOUR needs
- national and local resources
- and, for Youth boxes: a Letter of Encouragement

and another potential box:

Box List #2:
- 4+ pride trinkets, customized to the recipient's identity: including keychains, tattoos, stickers, pins, and pronoun pins.
- a toiletry & tool kit of your choice
- a stand to pee or makeup
- 1 clothing item in the recipient's size or a book
- national and local resources
- and, for Youth boxes: a Letter of Encouragement


Brands & Wholesalers could include:

- .5cc clothing

- Underworks

- gc2b

- various items from Etsy artists who are allies, trans (binary or non-binary)

- Gender Portraits books, pins, etc.!

- Items from the Breast Form Store



Who Benefits?

You. Your heart will feel so warm and gooey, on top of the physical benefit of the reward you’ll be sent (digitally or through the mail!). You can even be one of the first people to sign up for a subscription box (one-time delivery or 4-time, quarterly delivery)!

Us. We, those terrible, naval-gazing millennials get to do some good.

But most of all…

The youth. They’ll have a sustainable way of getting what they need, and the encouragement to get through what is more than likely the hardest period of their lives.

Here are some quotes from the youth we've reached out to:

"Access to binders and non-binaried clothing to me means that I am loved and appreciated by my LGBT family all around the world. It makes me feel like I matter. If I suddenly had a way of getting them, to me it would mean that I could finally be me."

"It means the absolute world to me. I need a binder as my chest dysphoria is severe but I cannot afford one at the moment. Access to this sort of material would be life changing for so many people, and so many would be extremely grateful for these things."



Our Income & Cost Projections

Our base cost is calculated through a goal of selling 200 total boxes so that we can build our presence, marketing, website (better), brand, internal systems, etc.

TOTAL: $15,400 broken down as:

$1100 for pride items for the boxes, as well as the boxes themselves and packing materials.

$2,800 for shipping for all the boxes (since they're buy-one-give-one, this figure it large!)

$500 for toiletries and discrete bags (and both sponsors and youth will be able to pick their binary, or no binary on these items!)

$7,000 on clothing, binders, bras, stand-to-pees, books, and other miscellaneous requests (of which, we anticipate 32% going to binders alone)

$4,000 for warehouse space, overhead (including purchase of Quickbooks, marketing, website, social channel presence, and potential help packing boxes, etc.)


How it’ll Work

This is a buy-one-give-one program, where your purchase of a subscription box provides one for a trans youth in need.

The youth will be nominated by their center or a friend/relative. If they're not out to anyone, they can nominate themselves. We’ve reached out to every center we can find, and we will let them know when we’re ready to accept nominations. The age of the potential recipient, as well as the timing of the nomination, and finally filling out the paperwork that allows us to fulfill all of our internal needs (for things like reporting), will be the one of the only 2 necessary criteria to become a receiver of a subscription-- the other will be being 24 or younger.

Logistics. For sponsors, we'll be switching information over to either cratejoy.com or WooCommerce, where we'll create accounts for you in order to track boxes, preferences, etc! Youth subscriptions may be taken over to one of these places-- but we're working out the logistics and safety measures.


Please note that we will ship worldwide.


Community & Special Thanks

There's already an amazing community of support around this project: at least 30 Centers across the US and Canada have agreed to be a pick-up locations for the boxes, for youth who do not feel comfortable receiving mail at their houses, or if the youth have unstable or no housing.

Additionally, we've already begin forming relationships with retail vendors (.5cc, breast form suppliers, stand to pee suppliers, and loads of other people!) to solidify wholesale pricing on many of these items.

These amazing people are to thank for us being able to get off the ground:

Drew from BeanieExpress

Rosie the Rambler Social Justice Pins

Radical Buttons

Dexlar

Sandra Black Culliton

Prickly Cactus Collage

Drew's Tattoos

elastic heart  & thanks for the logo!

edenxdesigns



Final Request

This is, in so many ways, a community project-- shaped and un-roughed by many hands, hearts, and tireless hours of labor. If you love this project, please support it financially (if you're able). If you're unable to do that, but really want to be a part of this -- get in touch. We'll find a way for you to help!

Final Request
This
 is, in so many ways, a community project-- shaped and un-roughed by 
many hands, hearts, and tireless hours of labor. If you love this 
project, please support it financially (if you're able). If you're 
unable to do that, but really want to be a part of this -- get in touch. We'll find a way for you to help!

story:
Hello,

Let us introduce you to Capital Portfolio & Investment Systems (CAPIS). We are passionate about creating a financial ecosystem of sustainable financing and accessible capital. We believe that it is the responsibility of private enterprise to lead the way in compassionate capitalism that focuses on redistribution of surplus value to workers and customers alike.

As the world and national populations increase there has been a marked and significant rise in the number of people who have fallen below the poverty line. More than a third of the world’s seven and a half billion people live in poverty. In sub-Saharan Africa the situation is even worse. Interestingly and contrary to some popular notions the biggest challenge to escaping the vicious circle of poverty is not how smart you are but how seamless it is for one to have access to capital. It is important to note that without capital there can be no upward social mobility.

At CAPIS we believe that except we (humanity) come together to create a truly private sector led Commonwealth fund through which we can promote sustainable financing and accessible capital the incremental poverty of a vast majority of the world’s population pose a serious threat to our collective security. To this end we have decided to establish a Venture Capital Fund to encourage and provide funding for budding entrepreneurs; Kids Capital Trust Fund to provide social security and healthcare for young children and the Commonwealth Fund to give individuals access to profit sharing, on the spot financing for projects and discount for purchases made at CAPIS affiliates.

The essence of this crowd funding is to raise sufficient capital to set up these funds and thus create a starting point from which we can provide a hugely discounted cost of assessing capital from these funds by the poor and most vulnerable in our society.

Our plan is to invest these funds for capital expansion and thereafter provide over a million prospective entrepreneurs seamless access to seed capital; create a social security fund and provide healthcare for over a quarter of a million kids under the age of seven and create a profit sharing program and on the spot financing to millions of subscribers to our Commonwealth Fund.

We believe in compassionate capitalism that focuses on redistribution of surplus value for the collective prosperity of all. As we set out to raise Three Hundred and Fifty Thousand Dollars ($350, 000.00) for the above named funds in order to create the world’s single largest ecosystem of sustainable financing and accessible capital we call upon all those desirous of seeing an increasingly prosperous world to chip in. Details of the management of these funds and performance will be updated periodically on our website, www.capisng.com.

Your support for this endeavor will over the years uplift millions of sub-Sahara African people and children from poverty and create a more prosperous world thereby ensuring improvement in our collective security.

Thank you.

story:
Event management have always been a pain especially when things are not going the way we want it to be! By creating this platform, it allows not only event planners but people like us who have no clue how to run an event to gain access to the best and affordable suppliers around us.

From catering to canopy, photographers to decoration, this platform not only allows to locate all the supplies we need for our event but to ensure and track all the progress of all our suppliers! Its unique credentials and review system allows us to not only get the best of what we're paying for but to ensure the maximum satisfaction for that special day.

Not only trustworthy, almost instantaneous quotation at the edge of your fingertips allows you to fully operate within your budget be it for your big day, birthday or just a casual retreat with your fellow buddies.

While it is our dream and passion to make this platform a success, we require a little help as creating such platform doesn't come cheap but as people say, every penny counts.

Any questions you could always email me at adrianrenaldo.tgh@gmail.com

story:
Have you ever wanted to mail someone a banana with a personalized message written on it? Maybe a banana covered in glitter? Bedazzled?  We are raising money to start up a company that does just that. 

Anyone who donates at least $5.00 will get a free personalized banana sent to anyone in the United States (international orders are extra).

If we can reach our goal, we hope to hire Gwen Stefani as our spokesperson so that she can make a short remake of her song Hollaback Girl to suit our business venture.

story:
Hi, my name is Jeff Frost, I live in Reno, NV and I am very outgoing and passionate about this project, I would like to first thank you for visiting our funding page. I believe that you will find that we have a very interesting project that we are looking for funding. I know that most people do and do not support the use of cannabis.

I must say that no matter what if you do or do not support the marijuana industry, it is a growing industry state by state. Many state laws prohibit the use of marijuana in public, what I’m doing is nothing new, there are social clubs or lounges in Colorado, California, Oregon and Washington which all have legalize marijuana for recreational use. We will be much different than the clubs/lounges in other states as we have much different laws on what we can do an offer to cannabis users.

Nevada has become one of those states that has legalized marijuana for recreational use. Nevada is legal for several things which gives the state it's biggest boost for tourism, we are a 24-hour state with drinking, gambling and prostitution. We will be the first club/lounge in Reno, NV for cannabis users, we are looking for your support to those looking to use cannabis in a social environment. We ask that you read through our plan, to see how we plan to setup Your 420 Club.

We need your support to raise $250,000 to get Your 420 Club up and running in Reno, Nevada, we are offering several perks for your support to raise capital. We ask for your support whether it’s $1 or $600, we are offering some great perks to help support our project.

With your support to Your 420 Club you will help create 20 new job to our economy in the Reno area. These are the perks we are offering;

  • Mini Key Chain Flashlight
  • Wafer USB Card 4GB
  • Card Power Bank to charge a cell phones
  • $300 and $500 Gift Cards with a 20% return
  • Club Memberships at 50% off.

Please take the time and read through our plan and support our efforts to make our dreams become a reality. Thank you for your support.

 

Problem Worth Solving

Nevada will be legal for recreational marijuana use after Jan. 1, 2017. Adults 21 and older can possess up to 1 ounce of cannabis, or one-eighth of an ounce of cannabis concentrate, smoking or consuming it in public will remain outlawed, punishable by a fine of up to $600.  That law states that it’s illegal to drive with certain levels of marijuana in a driver’s system. Those limits are 10 nanograms per milliliter (ng/mL) of marijuana or 15 ng/mL of marijuana metabolite in your urine, or a blood level of 2 ng/mL of marijuana or 5 ng/mL of metabolite.

 

Our Solution

With our private membership club we offer a solution to smoking and consuming cannabis that is not considering a public place, offering a BYOC (Bring Your Own Cannabis) private membership club for members only to socialize along with smoking and consuming cannabis.

 

Target Market

Market for legal marijuana is a lot bigger than some would have ever imagined. According to Fortune, “a new report by a leading marijuana industry investment and research firm found legal cannabis sales jumped 17%, to $6.9 billion, in 2016 and they will grow by a whopping 25% this year to reach $8.1 billion in total U.S. sales.”

Who are the consumers of legal marijuana?

  • The average recreational marijuana consumer is 37 years old
  • Marijuana dispensaries serve customers 21-95
  • The average marijuana consumer spends $33 on weed per trip to dispensary
  • Weed smokers spent $645 on average in the last year buying pot
  • There are more than twice as many men than women in the customer loyalty program

We will target cannabis users in our local market area and will also target tourism coming into Nevada to use cannabis. 

 

Competition

Currently there are no private cannabis clubs in Nevada because the legalization of marijuana in Nevada with medical marijuana laws in January 1, 2000 it has taken 16 years before the state started issuing business licenses to sell medical marijuana. It will be another 18 months before Nevada starts issuing business licenses to sell for recreational use. The current medical marijuana businesses will be grandfathered in and with the new marijuana law for recreational use taking effect January 1, 2017 this opens the door for private clubs. 

 

Our Advantages

We have the opportunity to be the first private cannabis club in Nevada in Reno. With Your 420 Club being the first we will be able to capture a large target of cannabis users.

 

Marketing Plan

We will contact all of the marijuana dispensaries and will give information and marketing material for people who buy cannabis from the dispensaries regarding where they can smoke or consume cannabis. We will also have an online presence with a website and use online SEO to advertise the club with an online presence that will help locals and tourist locate our clubs. We will also create printed marketing material to hand out along with signage on each location. 

We also have plans to increase 7 day trail membership by using a channel through the tourism industry to get more monthly memberships. We will offer current monthly member an opportunity to bring a guest night to increase membership. 

 

Sales Plan

Our sales approach is basic, we offer a private place to smoke or consume cannabis. All you have to do is be over the age of 21 years old, bring your own cannabis and purchase a membership, we provide all paraphernalia to our members to use cannabis in the club. We have 3 memberships to choose from:

  1. 7 day trail membership (Great for tourism)
  2. Po'Boy membership (12 month commitment)
  3. Gambler membership (12 month commitment)
  4. VIP membership (12 month commitment)

We will have several areas that will generate more revenue in the club, rentals of VIP areas, pool tables, dart boards, alcoholic beverages, sodas and cigarettes. Only VIP members will not have to rent VIP areas, pool tables or the dart boards.

 

Locations & Facilities

The location in Reno will be anywhere from 3,000-4,500sqft, with a location close to downtown Reno, with the location being open 24 hours, since we are in a 24 hour town.

 

Technology

We will have a membership software program to keep track of club members and we will also have club cards that you will need to enter the club. All membership signup must be in person to check age requirements, we will only be accepting credit card as payment.

 

Equipment & Tools

We will be purchasing bar equipment, lighting, cameras, computers/tablets, paraphernalia for using cannabis, signage, tv's, pool tables, dart boards, jukebox, tables, chairs, booths, poker table, smoke filtration system, bar glasses, cigarette vending machine, liquor, beer, soda and food preparation area.

 

Key Metrics

Since our prices are fixed, we are focused on maximizing our unit counts. How many memberships, alcohol, etc. — can we sell? Likewise, because our prices have such a wide range, we want to keep a close eye on our mix of sales. If we are selling monthly memberships but not selling VIP memberships, we are going to have to work a lot harder for the money.

Our costs are relatively consistent with the major exception of labor. We want to staff our crews generously to provide fast, top-notch service. If we don’t keep our membership counts up, though, our labor costs per membership will climb, so we are watching that closely too.

 

Overview

Our company is incorporated as an C-type organization in the state of Nevada. Our two founders, Jeffrey Frost and Edward Frost, are co-owners with equal shares. No outside investors are involved at this point in time, though there might be an opportunity for that as the business grows. 

State Business License : http://nvsos.gov/sosentitysearch/CorpDetails.as...

 

Management Team

Our business is a collaboration between two good brothers: Edward Frost and Jeffrey Frost. Jeff will be President and Edward Frost Vice President. Jeff runs the management side of the business, and Edward does almost everything else. Jeff has owned and operated several businesses over the last 20 years and has experience in business failure and success, he has experience in the management, marketing and sales experience. 

Edward has been in the gaming industry for over 20 years working with public relations and has the knowledge and ability to communicate with leadership skills and directions to put our plan in place and executing the direction we need for our members to retain and increase membership. 

 

Advisors

The Big Innovations team is led by dynamic professionals with diverse experience running small and large companies in multiple industries. Big Innovations offer an exemplary track record of big innovations and make-it-happen execution, all grounded in sales, marketing, development and technology disciplines. Big Innovations are both idea originators and project executors. 

 Big Innovations subscribe to a customer-centric philosophy because customers are the lifeblood of any organization. By helping their clients connect more closely with their customers, resulting solutions are on target. By applying competitive analysis techniques, they help clients stand out from the crowd leaving buyers little reason to shop elsewhere. Through a potent blend of best-in-class talent, innovation, execution and customer-centered philosophy they apply proven techniques to discover, develop and implement the superior, intelligent tactics & deliverables growing businesses need to succeed.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I ask you to share this with you family, friends and people you might even know who are cannabis users. Could you please share this on your Facebook, Twitter or what ever social media you use.

Thank you for your support and help us get off the ground. We hope to see you at our club to enjoy what we offer or even just checking us out.

Thank you for visiting our crowdfunding page.

story:
Welcome to Frank's Franks... Soon to be America's Favorite Fast-Food Restaurant Chain!

Hi, my name is John Zaffarano and I would like to thank you in advance, for your consideration in the funding of my project,  "Frank's Franks".

  • Over the last 30  years, I've built, opened and sold well over a dozen restaurants of various types. Each restaurant that I've had, has taught me something(s) unique about the business that I did not know before. The "Frank's Franks" concept represents the cumulation of all the hands-on work experience that I've accumulated in the business thus far and encouraging a prosperous and successful restaurant concept and that can easily be cloned and franchised across the nation.

My campaign involves achieving to raise the financing of necessary to build and open the first "Frank’s Franks" which would then serve as the flagship restaurant of the future national chain of Frank's Franks" franchises across the country.

 

What I Need and What You Get!

 

Me:

I need to raise $25,000 in order to successfully launch our flagship restaurant. The funds would be used for:

  • Leasehold acquisition of the store space
  • All architectural drawings and permits
  • Food preparation equipment purchases
  • Leasehold build-out of restaurant space including plumbing, electrical and interior finishing.
  • Interior/exterior restaurant signage
  • Logo printing (cups, napkins and take-out bags/boxes)

You:

The satisfaction of recognizing and acting upon a great idea who's time as come (along with some really cool perks ;-) Contact me directly regarding possible franchise opportunity!

Why This Concept Will Grow and Prosper:

  1. Low cost franchise acquisition and build-out (approx. $25,000)
  2. High profit, low food cost (less than 20% food cost)
  3. High quality, natural casing, 1/4lb all-beef, "Sabrett" footlong frankfurters (this is what gives that snap when bitten).
  4.  Over 25 item fixins bar where our customers can have their dog, their way!
  5. Fun theme and drive-by appeal, walk-by impulse sales.
  6. Plenty of room for menu to grow with dozens of low food cost, high profit menu additions (pretzel dogs, nachos, ausages,bratwurst,soft pretzel, etc.).
  • Low cost franchise fee and build-out.
  • High profit, low food-cost menu.
  • No skilled labor required. 
  • Short learning/training curve.
  • Typical operation with only 2-3 employees daily.
  • High ROI, Franchised store can recoup all costs easily within the first 6 months or less!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can help us get the word out, please share and tell everyone about us! Coming soon to a neighborhood near you...
