story:
Summary of the story

 

Help Caesar Bishovu and friends start up an on line banking savings and credit cooperative in Uganda, Kampala!!!!!!!!!!!!

 

'' Caesar Bishovu and friends are starting up an on line banking Savings and Credit Co-operative (SACCO) in Uganda, Kampala; a modern and multipurpose SACCO project entitled “Refugee women empowerment through self-reliance”, which is an innovative project designed and developed by World Youth Organization (WYO), its partners, different interested individuals and personalities as well as other stakeholders to support the cause!!! ''

 

My name is Caesar Bishovu, I am a Social Economic Development and Human Rights Activist on bias in refugee rights. For the moment I am the Founder and Director of World Youth Organization (WYO), which is a refugee-led and community based organization operating in Kampala, Uganda.

I am inviting you to join our efforts for fundraising of the “Refugee women empowerment through self-reliance” project. In this process, we need your help and assistance in one way or another.

As special rewards in exchange, I would like to inform you that all willing people, who are going to give in their financial contributions for this cause that there is an opportunity of getting shares (a set of membership fees including one share is equivalent to $ 30)  in return within this modern and multipurpose savings and credit co-operative with the latest technology of an on line banking system in order to extend the financial services to the vulnerable people and their communities in critical living conditions!!! Otherwise all funds collected will be considered as donations and therefore in this project, we are ready to assess and accept, if possible, any other reasonable and possible suggestions as it may be requested by our potential funders and partners!!!

Thank you for your consideration and support!!!

 

The story

World Youth Organization (WYO) was initially incorporated on the September 23, 2009 as a Company Limited by guarantee without share capital. Then on the June 18, 2013 World Youth Organization was registered with the National Bureau for Non-Governmental Organizations. Since its incorporation, the organization has carried its activities in the fields of promoting human rights, education, health conditions and better standards of vulnerable persons living in Kampala suburbs including refugee youth, women, men, elderly and persons living with disabilities as well as other nationals of low income status in Uganda among others.

Normally the organization raised fund from contributions of members and friends who supported the cause of refugee advocacy using Bottom-Up approach, self-reliance and self-representation of refugees including youth and women in decision making, serving better fellow urban refugees and filling gaps where necessary.

As achievements, World Youth Organization managed to support 300 self-employed, who operated in informal sector to start up and develop their small and medium enterprises. And the organization had formed and supported the following working groups including social economic activities like hair salons, catering services, tailoring, art and craft designs, shoes making, yoghurt making, sewing, modern farming and agriculture, environment conservation and protection  etc. as well as cultural and sports clubs; WYO Traditional Cultural Troupe; WYO Young Stars (a Football Club of Boys Under 14 years); WYO FC (a Football Club of Boys Above 18); WYO Basketball Boys; WYO Basketball Girls; WYO Volleyball Boys; WYO Volleyball Girls; WYO Acrobatics Club; WYO Kung-Fu Club; WYO Swimming Club; WYO Vision Bit Entertainment; WYO Arts & Design Group, and WYO SACCO etc.  

Although due to limited access to direct funding for refugee initiatives, in 2014 the organization faced serious shortages of funding and its promoters decided to suspend all its activities in June 2014 and members opted to continue their social economic activities in informal way either through their above mentioned working groups or individually.

In 2019 according to the advice, support and promises of friends, the members of the organization agreed to resume the work. And now World Youth Organization is planning to officially resume its activities, since the organization’s programs and its members had been affected by COVID-19 Pandemic Crisis. 

At the end of the year 2019, there had been an outbreak of the COVID-19 Pandemic Disease of which, the first cases were detected and confirmed in Wuhan, China (https://ghrp.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186...). And since then the disease started being spread to almost all countries in the world including Uganda. The pandemic has continued affecting all categories of people including refugees living in rural refugee settlements and urban areas in one way or another. According to the statistics of refugees and asylum seekers in Uganda published by UNHCR and OPM on March 21, 2021, refugees and asylum seekers are 1,470,858 and in Kampala they are 91,223 (https://reliefweb.int/map/uganda/refugees-and-a...).

On March 26, 2020, lock down was officially announced in Uganda to avoid the spread of the COVID-19 (https://www.health.go.ug/2020/05/14/update-on-c...); all social and economic activities including public places such as markets, shops, offices were suspended. The prolonged lock down has affected all people at different levels; public servants but mostly people in private sector, where people earn as they work daily especially those who are engaged in small and medium enterprises, in which many urban refugees are either formally or informally engaged to earn a living.  

This kind of situation has worsened living conditions of urban refugees living in Kampala and its suburbs especially vulnerable refugee women, youth, elderly and other refugees living with disabilities, chronic diseases and their families since they have spent many months without working. And up to now they are facing many challenges including unemployment, food shortages, arrears of non paid residential houses rent, school dropout and other education issues affecting refugee children without support, shops and offices rent bills, capital shortages to run and sustain their small business projects etc.

Due to the current situation of COVID-19 pandemic crisis and its effects, while considering criteria, requirements, policies or conditionality of servicing loans in Uganda, many people from different refugee-led organizations and their respective refugee communities, have been disqualified for having access to loans that even in most cases are not enough for both, the monthly businesses and personal budgets of the borrowers. And many of those who had managed to receive loans, failed partially or totally to pay back loans plus interests on time, which has negatively affected their businesses and finally made them going bankrupt.

In response to these concerns within the microfinance industry in Uganda, World Youth Organization is planning to set up a “Refugee women empowerment through self-reliance” innovative project that would be implemented by World Youth Organization Staff & Community Savings and Credit Co-operative Society Limited (WYOSCSACCO), which is the first modern leading refugee-led multipurpose savings and credit cooperative in Uganda, that we are planning to develop to a higher level by using the latest technologies of the on line banking system as the Response to COVID-19 Pandemic Crisis in order to extend financial services to the most vulnerable refugees and their communities living in and around Kampala suburbs. And this will be done in clause collaboration with World Youth Organization’s partners, different interested individuals and personalities as well as other stakeholders to support the cause.

 

Goal

The project aims at fostering social economic welfare of vulnerable refugee women and unemployed youth in particular and refugee communities in needs and other vulnerable people including nationals in Kampala by setting up an on line banking microfinance institution that would, to them, provide easy financial services and accessible savings and credit services at fair interest rates and monthly repayment modalities as well as the eventual benefits being enhancing their improved social welfare through various working groups for Income Generating Activities (IGAs).

 

Objectives

To provide modern multipurpose innovative and appropriate on line banking Savings and Credit Co-operative (SACCO) system, which will provide financial solutions to its members for economic transformation and economic empowerment with the effective preventive measures against the spread of Covid-19 Pandemic Disease etc.; 

To provide savings, deposits and related services earning competitive rates of interest in a professional manner and minimizing financial risks on such savings that will transform livelihoods of the members, their communities and the society at large;

To carry out systematic sensitization in refugees communities exposing members to techniques and methods used for small and medium business startups and encourage them for benefiting from the SACCO and other partners' programs and services;

To organizing vocational trainings and capacity building trainings and impart business knowledge and skills which would enable refugee women and youth in particular and other urban refugees in general to provide employment through working groups, innovative projects and prepare simple business plans in order to ensure the sustainability of their businesses and the proper utilization of the loans granted;

To provide any other necessary legally authorized and economically feasible financial services demanded by its members and partners;

To ensure that the improved social welfare of vulnerable refugee women, youth and other vulnerable groups of people has deep positive ramifications in the host communities;

To rent and equip an on line banking Savings and Credit Co-operative (SACCO) head office in Kampala as a pilot project;

To establish a strong internal control system and provide Information and Communications Technology (ICT) connections and other related infrastructure requirements to speed up service delivery; and

To provide loan services at cost allowing the SACCO to cover its costs including legal reserves, for loan losses and other required reserves etc.  

 

Duration

The “Refugee women empowerment through self-reliance” project will be implemented in three years after which the project will sustain itself for unspecified period of time.

 

Operational framework

The on line banking Savings and Credit Co-operative (SACCO) will provide both Front Office Savings Activities (FOSA) and Back Office Saving Activities (BOSA). The FOSA will help to facilitate members who are ever busy to take their savings to the SACCO office or transfer their savings to their SACCO accounts through the on line banking system. A long-term strategy will be to introduce Front Office Savings Activities (FOSA) in which members will walk in and get full banking services at a service counter or its authorized Agents or use online banking services within their respective communities. Members deposit their cash into savings accounts at the SACCOS office or on line banking using the latest technologies of cash less systems such as Credit and Debit Cards including ATM Cards, Master Cards / Visa Cards etc. Mobile Payment Services like MTN Mobile Money, Airtel Money etc. For credit activities, the SACCO will offer loans to eligible members at an interest of ten percent per year based on the declining method.

 

Social economic effects

Small business services run by urban refugees, which the majority are women will be improved for a better service delivering to the refugees and local communities and other customers.

Refugee women will mobilize and sensitize the local community into joint small business ventures that will upgrade their level of income.

The on line banking SACCO services to improve social economic status of urban refugees, and in the settlements will supplement relief services provided by refugee supporting organizations.

The hosting communities will automatically emirate refugees activities geared towards facilitating their economic conditions.

 

Sustainability

Availability of crowd funding is needed to help the project become sustainable; where marginal costs and marginal revenues are constant, among other assumptions.

 

Loan Products

Business Loans (the aim of this loan is to assist members in their business development projects); Emergency Loans (the aim of the loan is to assist members solving unexpected situations of personal problems); Educational Loans (the aim of the loan is to make an education possible when there is no other ways; and Development Loans (the aim of this loan is to assist members in their development projects).

In addition to voluntary savings and contributing allocated and regulated shares, members, on their own will, will open fixed deposit accounts and any other saving product a member feels that is beneficial as SACCO especially encourages loans against cash security.

For the period of three years ahead, World Youth Organization Staff & Community Savings and Credit Co-operative Society Limited (WYOSCSACCO) plans to achieve remarkable progress towards its long-term goals. It will continue to build a strong and more competitive on line banking micro financial institution that provides quality service to its members including vulnerable refugee women, youth, elderly and persons living with disabilities with a climate, in which members can fulfill their personal, social and economic growth.

Amount of money needed is $ 100,000 (One hundred thousand United States Dollars). And the Crowd funding Campaign is going to take two months, which can be extended if necessary. Therefore according to the campaign plan, World Youth Organization Staff & Community Savings and Credit Cooperative Society Limited (WYOSCSACCO) will be officially launched in October 2021.

 

Beneficiaries

The project (WYOSCSACCO) is planning to serve 1000 beneficiaries each year and in total 3000 beneficiaries for three years, where primary beneficiaries of the project will be urban refugees and other vulnerable people in need as mentioned below:

  • Women refugee victims of Sexual and Gender Based Violence (SGBV) and torture respectively during the conflicts in their home countries, who would be mentored to restore their livelihoods by engaging themselves in small businesses;
  • Women refugee widows as consequences of conflicts in their home countries, who will be motivated to start up income generating activities (IGAs);
  • Women refugees and men victims of Human Immunodeficiency Virus/Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (HIV/AIDS), both refugees and Internal Displaced Persons (IDPs), desiring to satisfy their needs by engaging themselves into income generating activities;
  • Business oriented refugees who need loans or funding opportunities to improve on the performance of their income generating activities in Uganda;
  • Youth refugee girls who did not manage to attend or complete secondary schools but enrolled in technical training schools as hair salons, catering services, art and craft designs, sewing, decoration, computer, etc.;
  • Youth refugee boys who did not manage to attend or complete secondary schools but enrolled into technical training schools like sewing, hair salon, shoes making, arts, computer, mechanics, electronics, etc;
  • Local IDPs, job seekers and other disadvantaged nationals interested in starting small businesses. An initiative that can be used to facilitate social economic integration of refugees and merge their cultures with local community;
  • Refugee students who still in or have dropped out from both secondary schools and universities, in order to enable them completing their studies or as a way to provide seed capital for their self-employment, since they are not inclusive into Uganda public service labor law; and
  • People living with disability among other disadvantaged persons within refugee communities and other vulnerable groups in Uganda.

The hosting community will benefit from the project either from trading with refugees, employment opportunities by refugee-led organizations, refugees business enterprises or from business joint ventures.

In addition, refugee relief organizations services will be supplemented by refugee self-reliance, hence, the burden will be cut down.

 

Caesar Bishovu

Founder and Director at World Youth Organization

Mugwanya Road, Plot No 299, Block 17

Lule Zone, Kabusu, Rubaga Division

P.O. Box 27801 Kampala, Uganda

Tel: +256782543342/0755258203

Email: bishocaesar@gmail.com

Email: info@wyou.org,

Web: wyoug.org

story:
Short Summary

We are family of 7 (3 kids, 2 dogs), who thrive to live naturally. We're full vegans, living in nature in timber house, homeschooling our kids, spending ALL the time together, and searching for ways to lessen our negative impact and increase positive impact in this wonderful world.

Both of us had our businesses, and got tired of corporate life, and meaningless earnin-spending rat race. When first baby was born, we have decided to quit that life and start another- more meaningful way of living. It took 3 years for us to calm down and to find out what we want to do with our life. 

Our ultimate goal is to build Experience Rasta retreat, where people from all over the world could come to search for calmness, meaning, difficult answers or just simply to take a break. Retreat will include:

* Camper conversion rental

* Air BnB tiny houses on the shore of the beautiful lake

* Boat rental for guests 

* Sightseeing flights 

* Various workshops

The most important, is that we're going live there and will give our personal attention to our guests, meaning not only giving the keys, but sharing life experiences and views. Giving advice about natural and different way of life, if asked.

As You may understand, it will require financing, and without Your contribution it is extremely difficult to make it come true. 

First step is camper conversion rental, which purpose is to give a taste of the whole concept, as well as to spread the word about upcoming retreat.

What We Need & What You Get

We need 30000 Eur. For 3 van conversions.

Breakdown is very simple:

5000 Eur van + 5000 Eur conversion = 10000 Eur/ van * 3 = 30000Eur. 

We are choosing flexible goal, because if we raise less, we still have opportunity to start with one van.

We will, of course keep You updated, where Your money goes. If we'll see, that raised money will not help us to do anything towards our goal, we will cancel campaign, and You'll be refunded. 

What You will get? Free camper rental! (duration depends on Your contribution)

The Impact

We have rented couple of motorhomes before, and despite they were new, it was plastic box, with no soul. We love idea of every product having soul, and therefore, we are ready to put our love into conversion, so You could enjoy the difference. Maybe that will inspire people to demand more from manufactures, and service providers. Why should You settle for less? 

Other Ways You Can Help

If You can not contribute with donation, share this campaign on Your social media. That will help a ton! Thank You for caring!

story:
Domain Registration

As we are a pronounced web hosting company we provide a domain name registration/transfer with affordable price with low cost.

99.9% Uptime Guarantee

We offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee with all of our plans which is monitored by reliable third party companies. Whether it's the day or night, you can be confident that your website is safe in our professional hands.

Disk Space & Bandwidth

As we are prominent in our web hosting service, so you can get enormous storage for your files. We offer several tactics with diverse storage options.

24/7 Support

Our experts are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by customer desk, live chat & by phone for those times when you need help. Whether you need help with server assistance, registration of domains, transferring domain and websites, hosting related issues, control panel guidance we are here to assist you!

Multiple Services to fit any budget

We have the right web hosing plan for you, whether you're a big business corporate house or looking to setup your first Wordpress blog. We have a web hosting plan that's right for you!

Plesk Control Panel

We offer a user-friendly control panel called Plesk.

Preinstalled Scripts

Preinstalled scripts make life much easier by allowing you to install any popular application/software without any web hosting knowledge. story:
Short Summary

PJ and Rebekah Warren have been married for 5 years. Unable to have children, they turned their love to dogs. In the heat of Mesa, AZ they have found that finding a haven for your dogs can be hard so they decided to create a space for their community to gather and cool off. We need your help to make that dream a reality.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking to raise $300,000 to build an indoor dog park that also offers remote office space for humans, dog day care, and boarding. We want this space to be a community gather place where all feel like family and their dogs get the care they deserve as your fur babies. If we do not meet the fund goal, we will keep working at it until we can.

 

The Impact

Mesa does not currently have indoor places to take dogs that do not require day care or is part of a pet shop. We want to change that and create a safe space to mingle and connect. We are helping those who serve our community by reducing the costs to board their pets so they can keep achieving their career goals and also have their pet family.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out! Please share this page on your social media feeds. We want to help people be aware that we can make more inclusive places for our pets.

story: The  is a community of kind, caring, yet very tough people who are dedicated to empowering one another through self-defense and close-combat training. We are raising funds to put towards our permanent home in Mashall, where we will offer regular group classes and private training. We will offer a safe place for people to train hard and push themselves, but it is extremely important for us to be mindful of control, health, and overall wellbeing. We need backers to help actualise our dream.

story:
Coffee

It's been the world's most popular drink for hundreds of years, if not longer, and you'd be hard-pressed to find a person who doesn’t have some understanding of what it's all about. Coffee is everywhere . . . it's almost what you would call “commonplace.” And that's exactly how I looked at coffee five years ago. I enjoyed drinking it, of course, as a vast majority of people do. But like that same majority, I never really understood coffee. I knew nothing about the beans, the roasting, or the people thousands of miles away that made it possible for me to drink a hot cup in the morning.

But we were not Coffeetales if we would not have a tale for you so grab a cup of coffee and lean back...


Once upon a time,

…Toby a young boy and his new bride Daniela were still laughing about the monkey they saw cavorting just outside the Uluwatu Temple. She had been making jokes about the little fellow they spotted the previous afternoon and somehow she managed to bring back the topic of having kids - a topic that made Toby smile at the prospect. After all, they were four days into their honeymoon in Indonesia, and the idea of future kids has been in the forefront of his mind since they said their vows at the altar.

 On their way to Tanah Lot the crashing blue coastline came into view. He took a deep breath of salt-laden air – one of those things people always do when they approach the sea or the ocean – and then looked over to his wonderful wife Daniela, just to see her smile. That's when his eyes caught sight of Batur. From where they were standing, the mighty seven-thousand-foot volcano looked like it was touching the beautiful blue sky, which was nearly as blue as the waters they were approaching. Still, it wasn't just the scenic view that suddenly caught his attention.

“What is it?” Daniela asked him.

“The volcano,” He said. “There's a lot of them around here.”


“And you're noticing this just now?” she smiled. “The guides have been talking about them for days. You really must be distracted!”

“Well, no. It's not that. I just realized...” He grinned. “Oh, nevermind. My mind's just wandering.”

“Stop wandering and look”, she pointed. “Isn't that amazing?”

He turned back to their destination and spotted Tanah Lot, a temple built on a large offshore rock. While the waves crashed all around it, the tourists who had already mounted the steps to the top shielded their faces from the resulting spray. The temple truly was a sight to behold, with its foundation half-covered in the ebbing and surging waters of the Indian Ocean. As they crossed the waters and climbed up the steps to the top of Tanah Lot, which was a short twenty foot climb, Toby looked back toward Bratan.

“Honey”, he said turning to Daniela, who could now see the fierce determination in his eyes “I know where I want to go next.”


The next morning they woke up very early because they had a long drive ahead of them. Daniela had asked Toby several times why they were heading all the way to the agricultural fields near the village of Ubud. He didn’t respond, not because he didn’t want to, but because he hoped to find the right answer when they arrived.

The highlands were surrounded by lush greenery and a vast expanse of coffee plants as far as the eye could see, each of them showing clusters of reddish-brown cherries. Coffee, he surmised from what he has seen in pictures. He pulled over to the side of the road.

“What's going on?” Daniela asked.

“Right there,” he pointed toward a man standing among big rows of broad-leafed plants. It looked like he was examining their fruit. Daniela just grinned and shrugged, apparently she was confused by his sudden desire for adventures. He smiled back and jumped out of the car.

Toby stood in the field talking to the man for at least an hour, telling him about his new wife and their honeymoon trip and afterwards asking him about his work and the farm.  The man named Katut didn't just tell him about the soil and the coffee cherries, he told him about the family plantation that had been passed down through generations and about the methods of harvesting and roasting which his own grandfather had taught him thirty years back. Toby listened intently, processing and absorbing every word. Katut didn't stop until he heard Toby’s stomach growl.


“I am being a poor host,” he said at that sound. “You and your beautiful wife must be hungry.“ He waved at Daniela who was still sitting in the car enjoying the beautiful view. She stepped out of the car and made her way through the plants to her husband and his new acquaintance. Toby introduced her to the very friendly man who led the couple to a beautiful little cottage near the edge of a hill. In front of the cottage there was little bench and a small table. As they sat down they couldn’t believe their eyes. The view over the coffee plantation was simply astonishing. A couple of minutes passed while they just sat there and took in the view.

„Beautiful out here, ain’t it?“ said Katut after he came back with a small basket that seemed to be full.

„Yes, it’s wonderful indeed,“ Toby answered smiling.

Out of the basket the took a large hunk of cheese, a bowl of rice, and a large bottle of tea. Their trip to this beautiful place made them forget all about food but now they realized how hungry they actually were. The highlight of the meal came when the Katut opened a can of hot coffee. He placed the cup in front of the young man and gave him a satisfied look. Toby waited a while for the beverage to cool off a little and afterwards he took a sip. He was profoundly amazed at the taste of this fresh roasted coffee.

Now Katut’s smile turned into a grin. This coffee was so rich in flavor and aroma, Toby couldn’t believe it.


„Why… I mean, how is this possible?“ he asked, obviously still amazed by the flavor explosion he just experienced.

„Well son, until now you’ve been drinking dead beans, just like everybody else.“

„Dead beans?“ Toby was astonished.

„Yes, dead beans. You can store green coffee beans up to three years without losing quality, but as soon as you roast them, the flavor starts to decrease exponentially after two weeks.“

„But why doesn’t anyone know about this?“ Toby wondered.

„Because the big coffee producers benefit from a long shelf life. That means that they can roast tons of coffee beans at once and keep them in stores for ages.“

Now Toby was visibly annoyed. „This is really upsetting! Everyone should be able to drink such an amazingly good coffee.“ He took a deep breath and waited a few moments.

„Please Katut teach me everything about coffee and roasting coffee beans!“ Toby then begged.

„I will show you everything you need to know,“ Katut promised with a grin on his face. He was so happy to have found people who were interested in quality coffee, or rather be found by such people.

The following days Katut showed Toby and Daniela everything, from picking, then peeling the husks, then drying and lastly to roasting the beans.


On the last evening before their departure, the young couple sat again on the bench and enjoyed the beautiful sunset over the coffee farm.

 “So, what’s next on your agenda? Or are you still not telling me where we’re supposed to be going?” Daniela asked while they were sipping a cup of coffee.

“This“ he said pointing at the coffee farm „is the reason why I wanted to come out here,” He smiled. “And now I also know what I want to do next.”

“You want to be a coffee farmer?” she was visibly amused.

“Not quite,”  Toby said. “I want to sell the coffee from farms just like this one. But it's not just about the coffee, you see. It's about what's behind the coffee . . . who is behind it. Every blend of coffee, every roast, every bean has a story, right? Just like Katut’s story. That's what makes each cup special.”

Katut, who quietly walked towards the couple heard about Toby’s plan and now he couldn’t help but ask him how exactly he planned on achieving his goal.

Toby was quiet for a while, remembering every single detail he has been thinking about since he came to this farm.

„Well first of all, I want to purchase a coffee roaster. I plan on storing the green beans and roast only on order in small portions. These portions will be shipped on the same day they’re roasted and will arrive at my customers the next day after roasting, so they can enjoy the whole flavor and aroma - the same aroma that I’ve enjoyed with every cup of coffee I had on this Island. But that’s not all. I want to combine my customers everyday coffee drinking ritual with some amazing stories related to coffee and it’s production. So I’m thinking about including a customized story sheet, which will tell the tale of the coffee they just received. Katut, I really believe this is a business that needs to be created and I truly believe I can reach a large market of people who want to have an amazing coffee drinking experience. You have seen my work and I’m sure that you’ve noticed my attention to detail and quality. I’m one hundred percent determined to make this little company a key player if not a leader in the coffee industry. I will make it my mission to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the upmost respect.“

There was a moment of complete silence. Then Katut said „This sounds like a good and well-thought plan. But there’s one more thing you need to consider. How are you going to get started?“

„Well, I thought about that as well…“

„Of course he has,“ Daniela thought, smiling at her husband whom she knew so well.

„…I am sure there are plenty of people who, once they see my passion, will help me by donating money. Those people, whose generous funding will help me make my dream come true, won’t go unnoticed. In addition to being thankful to them forever, I’ll create products and services to compliment them. And like I said, I’m sure there are people out there who know what it means to have a dream and they’ll help me spread the word, by sharing it with everyone.

„Son, I truly believe in you“, Katut said visibly satisfied before he turned around and went to his little cottage to get ready for bed.

The next morning he accompanied the young couple to the airport. They hugged each other and said their goodbyes. After they parted and Toby and Daniela started walking towards the gate they heard Katut’s voice last time.

„Son, how are you going to name your company?“ he asked loudly.

Toby smiled and answered „Coffeetales."

"Why Coffeetales?" Katut asked.

Toby answered "because every coffee tells a story!"  

Then he turned around and they continued their walk towards the gate.



                                                   


Now fast forward a year and a lot of research later we are ready to turn the idea into reality and write this tale. 

It's our goal to go from roasting in a pan on the oven

to something more like this


We found all the partners for import, shipping and packaging. We are ready to incorporate Coffeetales and got permission to turn this old garage

into this amazing roastery


To make it happen we are about 15.000€ short and decided that there must be many coffee lovers out there who would love to be a part in this amazing tale and help us make this happen. 

We want to provide our customers with the freshest roasted coffee possible, our donators with some amazing perks and the coffee farmers with a fair share worth their dedication and work. 

We want to thank you all in advance for the love and support you bless us with! 

Every contribution, no matter how small helps us make this possible so If you are unable to contribute financially, we would still love for you to be involved. Help us spread the word by sharing about our campaign on social media and with your community!

Let us write this tale together....

story:
(All Donations Are Tax-Deductible)           

Eracism Clothing llc. 

Eracism   The removal from existence the belief that one race or person is superior to another. 
The Creed - ERACE THE HATE

We are…

The Eracists.  A League of Extraordinary Dreamers. 

Our brand, Erace The Hate, represents the artist and artrepreneur in the community seeking to empower those around them.  

We have designed a campaign to bring Power to the Peaceful globally.  With student leadership, youth empowerment, technology, arts, and entertainment, this concept will mobilize initiatives seeking to make a positive impact on the community.

The campaign  will end with a conference and culture festival Summer 2015.  Throughout the campaign, our website (eracethehate.com) will be used as a platform strictly for showcasing how we make a difference. 

Contributions to this campaign will benefit youth development in technology and entrepreneurship.

Here's where you come in….

We would like to raise $10000 

We are taking the Power to the Peaceful of the Florida college crowd.  College students are the most open-minded and impact full age group.  We will host an event similar to our upcoming conference/festival at each campus.  Along the college tour, we will conduct video interviews posing questions about the state of our communities.  Our success will be a collection of videos documenting students in their solutions for a global community.

Your donation to our campaign will provide marketing materials and incentives aiding our impact at each school.  Also, any purchases made on our website will contribute Power To The Peacful too!

PERKS!!! 

$5 Donation - We will send you your own P2TP wristglow as our token of appreciation (Take a picture!)  or 16-P2TP Sounds,

$10 Donation - We will send you all both wristglow favors for your collection or to share with friends , 32-P2TP Sounds, or a Ticket to Peace at BaCA                  

$30 Donation - We will send you a 'Power To The Peaceful' tee with 2-wristglow

OR

- Receive 64 P2TP Sounds + 1 P2TP Wristglow

$100 Donation -  You are a POW!er donor.  Your donation has sponsored a Tool Kit.  How can we return the favor?

  • Add something from your business to our Tackle Box!
  • Have The Eracists come to your event (if you are local)
$1000 Sponsorship - We will partner with your business or organization to enhance the campaign in your community.  Also, you will be recognized on our new website (Summer 2015) as an official 'Power To The Peaceful' sponsor. 
The bigger picture.

Strategic, unified organization of this campaign will result in an empowered community of young progressives.  These individuals will establish healthy business relationships for future collaboration. 

We have successfully partnered with numerous non-profit and mission based organizations in the past. (RealTalk DC, Soular POW!er, Authentic Reflection, Bailey Contemporary Arts Collective, Everything 1000 radio, NAACP)  

Each of the above mentioned make a consistent impact on their community.  As there are Eracists in each organization, we are building to become a world-wide platform for content of the people who intend to make a difference in society with their talents.  We will create a space promoting and celebrating the successes of Eracists everywhere.  

Your contribution is a commitment to helping develop our network of like-minded dreamers with an overall love for humanity.  

Teamwork for the Dream work.

According to a 2012 News Consumption Survey, 59% of young adults age 18-29 are using the internet as their source for news.  Driven by a sense of accomplishment, our targeted demographic are most efficient when they are emotionally attached to a concept or initiative.  Upon the completion of our campaign, we expect our contributors to lead our participants in establishing themselves financially, educationally, and socially. 

Late summer 2015, we will host a conference and culture festival serving as the grand launch of our concept brand.  We invite all who have helped us bring Power To The Peaceful over the year.  Vendors will represent their brands, products, and initiatives creating trust in cooperative economics.  We will use a neighborhood hotel and LMNT studios.  We will team up to bring food, music, art, dance, and awareness from the many different cultures in this Florida area and surrounding cities.  The festival will begin as an event for all ages, and conclude with festivities for a 21+ audience.  We are targeting music artists like Chloe and Halle, Curren$y, Jhene Aiko, Dee 1, Mary Lambert, Elle Varner, Nas, Henao will be our target.  Purchased tickets will make you an official Eracist, and inside the event you will get your official tee.  Merchandise will create brand association establishing a new niche in arts and entertainment. 

Based on their current acts of leadership within their communities, Campus Captains have been selected at the schools we are visiting.   These students have all showed consistent support of the Erace The Hate message.  This campaign will allow us to create scholarships and provide additional tools needed to spread a positive, constructive message at their educational institutions.  

If we don't meet our goal, all the proceeds donated will be used to complete the campaign.

The Gameplan: Teach the young and innovative to do what they can with what they have.  Right now.


Some things money can't buy…

The beauty of this program is that we will use whatever resources we can obtain to contribute Power To The Peaceful.  Do you have a story, book, music, video, poem, or event that you would like to share with our Campus Captains?

Let's add it to the campaign. 

The more support.  The more Power To The Peaceful.

story:
If  you are drooling then you have had one before...if you are not then you are in for a great experience..Ask others who have been to a Staggering Ox.

Short Summary

Staggering Ox in Butte!  We need your help, the cost for a building & equipment is much more than people would think. 

Great food and cool art are what Staggering Ox is known for around the state of Montana.  Butte is known for unique food, excellent artists and inordinate experiences.  Bringing Staggering Ox together with our community & local artists is a natural fit. 

What We Need & What you Get

Needed equipment  (just a few of the things we will need)

2 commercial micro waves $100 ea = $200

3 sink stainless w/sprayer $300

4 6 ft stainless steel tables $125 ea = $500

2 Wood prep ables $800 ea (used)

36 X 72 bread proofer $800 (used)

Bread dough roller machine $2000 (used)

Commercial oven $1500-$2500 (used)

Commercial dishwasher $1500-$2000 (used)

Cold sandwich prep table $2000 (used)

Commercial Freezer $2000 (used)

Sandwich prep table (hot) $2000 (used)

Convection oven (2) $2300 each (used)

Bench top dough sheeter $2500 (used)

Comercial griddle $3000 (used)

30 Qt mixer $3000 (used)

Tables & Chairs $3500 (used)

Salamander $3500 (used)

4-6 Burner commercial range $3500 (used)

Walk in Cooler $4000 (used)

Fire suppression hood & air venting system $5000 (used)

POS System & computers $10,000

Signage $10,000 to $20,000

What You Get by helping us

Helping to support Butte. We will be giving back to the community of Butte a minimum %2 of our gross earnings to teams, schools, charity events and non profit organizations etc. 

Jobs, helping youth to gain experience.  If you contribute we will do our best to get you or your younster a job with us.  In fact we will interview any campaign contributor or family member first.  We plan to employ at least 10 to 20 employees.

Our goal down the road (after the first year to see where we are at finacially) is to offer profit sharing to our employees.

Check out the "Perks" by supporting our campaign you get back almost as much as you put in!

The Impact 

Featuring our exceptional local artists at the Staggering Ox will only bring more recognition to what most of us already know; we have some serious talent here in our small town.

Butte deserves to have high qulity food that is not the "same old" & in a fun environment you would be excited to bring your out of town frineds to.  Living here all of our lives we hear people saying they would "love" this or that to come to Butte (we have done the same), but nothing ever happens, no one ever acts on their "wishes".    Let's all change that and do something about it!

Risks & Challenges

We have a location picked out and need your help so we can open July 2015.  This is a big gamble for us and we are not gamblers.  We need all the support we can get.


Equipment for a commercial kitchen is not inexpensive Staggering Ox bakes bread daily and roasts meat we are talking $100,000 + just for the kitchen! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Become an investor email us if you would like to become an investor.

We will need anyone who is willing to pitch in, help with construction, ideas how to decorate, artists, laborers, people who know where to get restaurant equipment.

Spread the word about what we are attempting to do.    A small contribution by you or someone you know goes a long ways.

story:
Short Summary

You are in or plan to be in Vietnam or some other country like us as India, Malaysia or Philippine...? Let think about the risks could be happen when you enter to the traffic system, the social and how do you think that the peoples in this country suffer from this mess?

Yes, I think that the government do so much to ensure that it could be safer but it take time seen limit of resource and capabilities.

But what happen if you or any other be in troubles everyday?

  • Call for help from friends, police, family, or any other services you know?
  • Ask for the nearest service supplier to get support?
  • Fix or manage yourself?
.


Tons of problems you have to solve and decide what to do with uncertainty. It's may come worst, it's may take a lot of time. Yes, it's break all of your plan.

Do you really want a solution for this?

Yes, we have the solution to solve this problem quickly.

In Vietnam right now and I think like any other country in the world, a smartphone with 3G and the next 4G connection in every pocket become normally with no doubt. 2015 statistic show that Vietnam have 123.8 million mobile internet connection :) larger than population (that mean people have from 1-2 smartphone each, not include children and elder). Source: http://chabrol.net/2015/06/09/internet-statistics-in-vietnam-2015/

The solution simply is: Take out your phone run a mobile app and send the SOS message, the app will show you the nearest services point or any other service provider among 100.000 point around the country to receive this notification to come to help you based on your location that has been shown to them.

It's like Uber or GrabTaxi solution, it will bring the needed to come together instantly. The service not only circle in car and motorbike trouble but also extend to other instant matching like: Police; Parking lots; Household repair; Travel rental; HomeStay and Hotel... in the future. 

Some people said to us, you are follow other model but what happen when they extend to this services? Our answered is, this is a local services with it owned culture, manage, running and support by local people, local relationship, local communities:

 

(The first 100 SOS Me services point commit to join)

(The start development team...)
We are now forming team to start work but it may take a long time seen we didn't have enough resource to recruit a big team or also invest into a big system.

The solution is for free to user and other social service like police, health care. So if you find that our jobs can help peoples in developing country a better serve, more certain and more safer, please help us to speedup the process and soon go to market.  

What We Need & What You Get

Yes, we need fund to recruit more team, running advertisement, build and maintaining the system (hardware and software), provide training to the services provider to be more professional and provide better services to consumers details as follow:

- Recruit more team: Currently we have 5 member commit to join the project but it's not enough seen it's can be extend when the app release. We also need money for team to keep project running to the turn point and gain profit.
- Build the system: Ton of work ahead from build management software; Build the app for iOS and app for Android; Purchase for server; Work flow, process, evaluate the  service provider...
- Running the system: Mans to keep it be monitor and run; Work with communities and service provider; Internet & Datacenter; Process the complaints; Evaluate the quality of services that the supplier give out; Training...
- Advertisement: Prepare and keep campaign to communities on various type as Facebook, Google, online newspaper, TV...

We will spend money for those thing:

  1. Salary for team to build and running the system.
  2. Advertisement and Social activities.
  3. Training and check for the quality of services that provide to end users.

Through our survey and estimation that we've done, there is a great demand for this model and it's bring back to end users a helpful for their life as same as the phone that they have.  

We decide to hand on to start project and step by step to implement by our best effort and by the contribution from you from this and other campaign (if it could not reach the target).

We hope will soon to make it come reality and you will be the first to join the system and proud to show your friends that you are the first contributor.

In case of troubles occurred to you in the future or with a friend that you recommend on system, our great honor members (you or your friend) will be offer a first class services and pricing from our services provider network. Yes, we commit will do this.

We believe that from great potential market like us, the new models target into social to bring back a safer life, a more productivity service will have it's own position and own values. Yes, we want to bring a true value to help people by technology.

Effort to the community and social

You know that, many many services provider opening their own business and waiting for customers to come but they didn't know that when and where the customers need their services. It's take a lot of effort for the two side to find each other and a long time to be experienced and measure the services that they received.

The model like that with the help from technology will help to minimized the burden, increase the productivities, make more qualify services save more money and finally bring more qualify life for each other in our community.

Risks & Challenges

Risks alway go with challengers, if we decide not to do, there're no more risks and no more change occurred. It's a good job need to do and expect to do from the community our live in, the risk will be control by the good thing that we bring back.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can contribute us for any if you like or want to become an Angel investor for our project please chose following way:

  • Create an account in Indiegogo and make your donation here.
  • Contact us: thaitq@gmail.com
Thanks!

story:
Hello Dear Friends, Family & Community!

We are so happy that you have chosen to spend some time reviewing our request for help with funding of Cosmos Community Light Center. It is our greatest pleasure to share this idea with you and we are excited about bringing this to Kansas City! Please accept this fundraising campaign as our formal invitation to be an integral part of building our Community Center from the ground-up with us, as One, with compassion and integrity.

-SHORT SUMMARY-

In short, Cosmos Community Light Center is a place to Belong. It’s not a healing center, a church, an education center, a bookstore, a yoga studio or a coffee shop; instead, we took the things we liked most about all of those establishments, put them in a blender and BOOM – out popped CCLC.

To give you an idea of the types of things the Center will offer, we wanted to share a little snippet from our presentation that's linked to below. This is a *sample* schedule that you might see on a typical week at the Center: 

For more details and information about what the Center stands for, how we plan to put your gracious donations into action, and what we plan to bring to YOU and to our community through the Center, we invite you to review our presentation, which is housed here (we recommend viewing in Fullscreen mode for best experience). 

-WHY SUPPORT?-

The reason that we believe this type of community center is so important today is that there are many of us who enjoy many different aspects of culture, organic living, nature and spirituality, and yet there are not many places where we can all truly come together as one group of like-minded individuals to have fun, play, grow and expand our minds, while spending amazing and joyful time with friends and neighbors in one central location. We believe that we are at a time in our culture and history that there is a need for a Center such as this, which allows so many beautiful and different people to come together as One to celebrate the joys of life! And this is why we are so excited to share this project with you today, and ask that you please assist us in bringing this endeavor to life.

-WHAT WE NEED-

In order to open the Center safely and minimize risk within the first 3-6 months of opening, we are seeking $20,000. This covers everything from business licenses & permits, to securing a location to rent from, to furnishing the Center, to our Welcome Gathering, and everything in-between. Check out this graphic to see the path that your donations will travel. Additionally, we are 100% committed to transparency and sharing, so know that we won’t even bat an eyelash if you reach out requesting to see our financial plan; this is your money and your Center, and we believe you deserve to know exactly how it’s going to be put to use and put together.

Please know that you won’t be charged even a penny unless we are able to fully fund our campaign. To sweeten the deal though, we’re offering some awesome rewards as “thank-you”s for your contributions, so be sure to check them out and see what your donation helps you be eligible for (besides our eternal love and gratitude, that is)!

-WHAT YOU GET (SHOW ME DA PERKS!)-

Please check out our reward levels over here! ----------------------------->


-THE IMPACT-

To us, this Center means having a chance to bring a community of like-minded individuals togetherunder one roof; it means having a safe place to express ourselves holistically, creatively and artistically; to learn and grow; to unite with friends and neighbors so that we can make new friends and further our relationships with old acquaintances; but most importantly, it means having a PLACE TO BELONG.

For us, we have spent so many years not feeling as if there was one central place where we could go to safely express ourselves in all areas of life; a judgment-free zone so to speak, and a place to engage with community who shares the same values and interests as we do. Yes, there was the Church and some holistic wellness centers and education centers popping up around town, and events that encourage the masses to come together to share in artistic experiences, but where could you go to read a book in solitude, meditate and pray, join with friends to watch a film or documentary, drink coffee, write poetry and present it at an open mic night– all in one place? We could not find this anywhere, but we so CRAVED this feeling of Oneness and Community! Thus, the idea for the Center was born.


-THE BOTTOM LINE-

Friends, we hope that you see how this is so much more than “just another business”– this community center is meant to be a beacon of light, shining brightly to all those who seek a safe harbor for themselves and their friends and family; it is an meant to provide an EXPERIENCE for all of us; and it is meant to be ingrained within the community and provide LOVE and CREATIVITY and a HOME to those who so seek it, and for those who wander, and for those who don't.

Whether we know you personally or not, whether you choose to donate or not – we love each and every one of you – and we hope that we so soon get the chance to meet and greet each of you as we Welcome you into our family, our lives, and our Center that is just as much for YOU as it is for us. 


-CAN'T DONATE NOW?-

Even if you, personally, can't donate...we are sure you know someone who can. Won't you please share this with your social media world? Link to us on Facebook or Twitter. Or, be sure to stop on by once we open the Center! We'd love to see your shining faces and get to know you, and the Center would love your lovin'. 

THANK YOU for allowing us to interrupt your regularly scheduled programming for this message, and for your assistance in bringing Cosmos Community Light Center to Kansas City so that everyone can truly have a place to BELONG.

Love and Light,

Mitch & Britt
story_txt:
Hello Dear Friends, Family & Community!
We are so happy that you have chosen to spend some time
reviewing our request for help with funding of Cosmos Community Light Center. It is
our greatest pleasure to share this idea with you and we
are excited about bringing this to Kansas City! Please accept this fundraising
campaign as our formal invitation to be an integral part of building our
Community Center from the ground-up with us, as One, with compassion and
integrity.
-SHORT SUMMARY-
In short, Cosmos Community
Light Center is a place to Belong. It’s not a healing center, a church, an
education center, a bookstore, a yoga studio or a coffee shop; instead, we took
the things we liked most about all of those establishments, put them in a
blender and BOOM – out popped CCLC. To give you an idea of the types of things the Center will offer, we wanted to share a little snippet from our presentation that's linked to below. This is a *sample* schedule that you might see on a typical week at the Center: For more details and
information about what the Center stands for, how we plan to put your
gracious donations into action, and what we plan to bring to YOU and
to our community through the Center, we invite you to review our
presentation, which is housed here (we recommend viewing in Fullscreen
mode for best experience). 
-WHY SUPPORT?-
The reason that we believe this type of community center is so
important today is that there are many of us who enjoy many different aspects
of culture, organic living, nature and spirituality, and yet there are not many
places where we can all truly come together as one group of like-minded
individuals to have fun, play, grow and expand our minds, while spending
amazing and joyful time with friends and neighbors in one central location. We
believe that we are at a time in our culture and history that there
is a need for a Center such as this, which allows so many beautiful and
different people to come together as One to celebrate the joys of life! And
this is why we are so excited to share this project with you today, and ask
that you please assist us in bringing this endeavor to life.
-WHAT WE NEED-
In order to open the Center
safely and minimize risk within the first 3-6 months of opening, we are seeking
$20,000. This covers everything from business licenses & permits, to
securing a location to rent from, to furnishing the Center, to our Welcome
Gathering, and everything in-between. Check out this graphic to see the path
that your donations will travel. Additionally, we are 100% committed to transparency
and sharing, so know that we won’t even bat an eyelash if you reach out
requesting to see our financial plan; this is your money and your Center, and
we believe you deserve to know exactly how it’s going to be put to use and put
together. Please know that you won’t be
charged even a penny unless we are able to fully fund our campaign. To sweeten
the deal though, we’re offering some awesome rewards as “thank-you”s for your
contributions, so be sure to check them out and see what your donation helps
you be eligible for (besides our eternal love and gratitude, that is)! -WHAT YOU GET (SHOW ME DA PERKS!)-Please check out our reward levels over here! ----------------------------->-THE IMPACT-
To us, this Center means having a chance
to bring a community of like-minded individuals togetherunder
one roof; it means having a safe place to express ourselves
holistically, creatively and artistically; to learn and grow; to
unite with friends and neighbors so that we can make new friends and further
our relationships with old acquaintances; but most importantly, it means having
a PLACE TO BELONG.
For us, we have spent so many years not feeling as if there was
one central place where we could go to safely express ourselves in all areas of
life; a judgment-free zone so to speak, and a place to engage with community
who shares the same values and interests as we do. Yes, there was the Church
and some holistic wellness centers and education centers popping up around
town, and events that encourage the masses to come together to share in
artistic experiences, but where could you go to read a book in solitude,
meditate and pray, join with friends to watch a film or documentary, drink
coffee, write poetry and present it at an open mic night– all in one place? We
could not find this anywhere, but we so CRAVED this feeling of Oneness and Community! Thus, the
idea for the Center was born.-THE BOTTOM LINE-
Friends, we hope that you see
how this is so much more than “just
another business”– this community center is meant to be a beacon of light,
shining brightly to all those who seek a safe harbor for themselves and their
friends and family; it is an meant to provide an EXPERIENCE for all of us; and it is meant to be ingrained within the community and provide LOVE and CREATIVITY and a HOME to those who so seek it, and for those
who wander, and for those who don't. 
Whether we know you personally
or not, whether you choose to donate or not – we love each and every one of you – and we hope that we so soon get the chance to meet and greet each of you as
we Welcome you into our family, our lives, and our Center that is just as much
for YOU as it is for us. -CAN'T DONATE NOW?-Even if you, personally, can't donate...we are sure you know someone who can. Won't you please share this with your social media world? Link to us on Facebook or Twitter. Or, be sure to stop on by once we open the Center! We'd love to see your shining faces and get to know you, and the Center would love your lovin'. 
THANK YOU for allowing us to interrupt your regularly scheduled programming for this message, and for your assistance in
bringing Cosmos Community Light Center to Kansas City so that everyone can
truly have a place to BELONG.Love and Light,
Mitch & Britt

story:
We're Growing!

When The Flatrock Flatbread Company came to be, the focus was pizza. In creating the best pizza around, we managed to also create some very fine breads. We started with English Muffins and Breakfast Sandwiches at the 2013 Columbus Farmers Market. We added sourdough classes in 2014 that were built on bread techniques learned through making pizza. In 2015, we're growing the pizza and catering business and we're adding a strong, classic bread bakery to stand with it all. 

With this campaign, we will be able to equip our own commercial bakery and kitchen. This will allow us to expand into baking for commercial accounts and also for your home enjoyment. We will bring a variety of traditional breads you are used to seeing in "big cities" and "on TV". We'll be able to make baguettes, boulles, batards, croissants, bagels, rolls, and sandwich loaves in large quantity. 

But we can't make this leap without you.

Our Goal and Your Rewards

Our goal is to raise $20,000 which is enough to equip a kitchen with the tools we need to expand our pizza business and bring our delicious bread to Columbus. As soon as we raise our goal amount, we will be able to settle on a location to set up this kitchen. We plan to be moved in and running at full tilt by the beginning of May.

For helping to support this project, you have a few varieties of rewards to choose from. 

The Bread Club

Our new bakery will kick off a completely new offering for Columbus. Around the country, bakers have been starting "Community Supported Bakeries" or offering "Bread Shares". We're starting the Bread Club. The Bread Club is a way for you to enjoy fresh bread every week without having to remember to order it or go to the farmers market. We will have several convenient times and locations for getting your bread for the week. You could stop by the bakery, the market, or a number of other locations we're talking with. Each week of your subscription, you'll get something we make just for the club. 

As we get it started, we will have a 5 week cycle that would include a week with Sourdough, Baquettes, Sandwich Bread, Rolls, and a Pastry like Croissants or Bagels. All of these will be handcrafted creations made right here in Columbus. We will have the remnants of our batch for sale at the bakery and other venues as supplies last in case you need more.

In this campaign, we are offering the club subscriptions as rewards for supporting us in the lengths of 6 months and 3 months. We expect to be able to begin in May which gives us 25 weeks to get through October and 12 weeks to get through July. As a supporter of this campaign you will be given an option to renew your subscription when it ends in 3 or 6 months.

The Bread Punch Card

If you just aren't sure that you want bread every week, you can get a punch card which you can redeem to pick out 10 bread club selections in any proportion anytime we have bread available. 

Pizza Peel

We have been working with the folks at Perfect Peel and we have what we believe to be the best pizza peel available to home cooks. It has a tight grain that allows bread and pizzas to release from the surface easily without sticking. It looks great and even has our logo etched on it. If you have a wooden pizza peel at home that causes you problems, it's not likely all your fault. This is sure to up your pizza game at home.

Baking Classes

We had two wildly popular classes teaching how to make good and easy sourdough bread in 2014. Part of the reason we are building our own bakery is so that we have room to host more bread classes in a relaxed environment. Our schedule will include classes on Sourdough, Pizza, Waffles, and Croissants. This reward will be given out as a certificate you can redeem for any class once we have a schedule established. This will depend on our timeframe for getting into the space and the certifications we will need.

Early Bird Rewards

Some of our rewards are designated as Early Bird offers. These have a very limited number available at a discounted price as a special Thank You for supporting our campaign so early. If you manage to snag one of these rewards, make sure to get your friends to support our campaign with you so that we reach our goal. If we don't, you'll get your money back, but you will be without our great bread.

Why Support Us?

One of Ben's advisors asked him how this moves the company toward his goal for "what he wants to be when he grows up." This was his reply:

I want the Flatrock Flatbread Company to be a great place to work, where people are treated with respect, and where they can make a reasonable living. I want our employees to continue producing world class food for our world class neighbors. When someone works with me making pizza, they get to see amazed faces as the food is made right there and is eaten immediately. I want even more of our staff to experience the sincere thanks of our community for a job well done. Through this expansion, our staff will have a greater chance to grow and take a meaningful role in our great community as we grow.

This is our next step toward that. Our investment in a bakery helps us grow as a community asset. It provides a way for us to serve you all year with another incredible product. By the way, you won't only be seeing our bread at home. We have several restaurants who will start carrying some specialty breads as soon as we can begin making it for them.

This isn't a hand out. You get to choose an incentive or Perk for your contribution which we believe to be an excellent value. We believe in it so much that we know that you will continue on as a subscriber and sign up for more classes for years to come.

But what if...?

We already know that, with your support, we will make this happen. There are some challenges that we will not be able to address until we have a final location chosen for the bakery. We expect to be able to take over a location that has previously been licensed for food preparation. We have at least three options that look very good. If we have to do more building, we will have more inspections and we could run into some delays. This makes it all the more important to hit our goal quickly so we can begin getting our space set up and licensed. 

If we don't happen to reach our goal, everything continues on as it always has. We will enter our fourth year of making the best pizza Columbus Indiana has ever seen. Our need for our own space for food preparation will just be a hindrance. We rent space and time in other restaurants for our prep now. 

What if you can't contribute now?

The biggest part of any campaign like this is to share it. Even if you can't sign up for this campaign, as long as we reach our goal, you will have an opportunity to participate in the rewards later on. Share this on social media. Tell your friends, family, neighbors, and coworkers about what we're doing and share your excitement. We are thrilled to be part of this community and we hear all the time how thrilled the community is to have us here.

story:
Hi I am  sreyas 

 Am  here to raise fund for marketing my website www.shopandproduct.com  ,I have developed a website to find out shop,product and offers in a desired place.

My professional experience

 MBA from University of Sunderland UK 2014.

 Around 1 year freelance web development and support for www.angloat.co.uk in London.

Senior Software Engineer Amplitude software India

 Team Leader for a team of five within two years of employment.

more at:-http://sreyas.branded.me

      How our website works and what problems it solves

      

"Our website provides retail shops to advertise their shop, product and their store offers. "


Is that the only thing we are providing in the website? 

No, we have lots of other features a retailer cannot simply ignore. Please continue reading 

We cannot simply ignore the change in the society where the online shopping industry provides every items are on our fingertips. A recent study shows 65% of people still happy in retail shopping this is not because the online shopping is not satisfying the customer needs but because they simply wants to check the quality of the products and don't wants to wait for the courier boy.

                                 

But sometimes these people have to visit 4 or 5 shops to get the desired product and spend lots of time in each shop though their favorite shops in town have their own E commerce website still they have to search in each shop websites. For the small and medium scale retailers maintain their website, SEO are always not affordable.

As our economy is customer driven the sale goes to eCommerce. So how retailers can increase the sale.

Here we are:- 

1) We provide a personal URL for the each shops . 

2) We redirect the customer to their website if the customer wants to see more of your products. 

3) We provide customers to select their favorite shops and browse their products only. 


 Where are we now

We have started marketing the product and reached 20 shops to register in our websites from different states in India.Now looking to start it as an organisation and improve the marketing and hire people.

Regarding the competition

The Online shops may have implement this as an another option but they won't do this because these options may have chances of reducing their sales commission.

Challenges facing

The challenges facing are now to make the retail shops to register but that can be solved by good marketing and directly contacting with them.

Investors benefits 
  www.shopandproduct.com will start generating income from December 2015 and you will get an equity share according to your investment.
As this is my sole property i am able to negotiate if you want to invest more.

story:
BARNA BITES COINis like BITCOIN with value backed in real assets.

It is a token of participation which has real value backup in real world in assets like

company shares, projects, intellectual property, raw materials with service of deposit and more.

Tokens of participation which has possible 3 forms of representation : cryptocurrency, electronic registered and assigned to user wallets, and physical form.


I call them

Tokens of participation, of which the value is protected in the form

of shares in different projects, companies and the intellectual property,

if necessary other goods.

Very significant is that the tokens holders with registered wallets choose the object of investment or the specialist which have to make investment in their name.

3 forms have tokens - registered to personal details digital wallet, physical but cheap and quite durable or electronic decentralized as cryptocurrency.

Value proposition for customer:

Easy transferable even abroad but without many flaws of fiat money or strongly protected against them. Flaws which are: inflation caused by money creation or political games, stock market games, wars, local natural or economic disasters.

Build in automated investment from savings. 

Who I am?

Software developer with economic, crypto technology and political education and experience.

Why am I doing this project?

My life was very affected by the market gambling which generated 2009 crisis and I don`t want any repeat of that in our future and future of our children. We don`t need to wait for it as no legal changes are needed just our actions.

History and background of project:

I) Is money - banknotes of which almost all people in the world are using, have a real - minimal protected value?

Do not. In a dramatic majority of countries currently valid fiat money? What kind of money?
This worthless money but under duress State.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fiat_money

at a glance -> money that has no value in many places around the world but in his country has a value of contractual because you need it to pay taxes, and others also have to pay the taxes, so it is more or less probable  that you will want someone in the future do or sell something for the banknote or coin -> eg. sell bread in the store

However, it has several disadvantages especially when present in the open currency market:
- Fluctuations in the value resulting from market game play of the great capitals
- Fluctuations resulting from economic crises
- Fluctuations resulting from economic attacks using a variety of instruments such as political pressure. Lowering the rating of country to BBB
- Loss resulting from the mistakes of bankers, who will lead to the bankruptcy of a bank or a stroke or lead to the edge of collapse of the bank - applies in many countries even in Europe involuntary commitment of private money above EUR 100 000 if the bank is in need it may take private money.
- Loss as a result of assault
- Loss as a result of hacker intrusion to the bank
- A significant loss as a result of the destruction of the database containing data about the status of your account
- Zero value in the case of a conventional war and the loss of territory
- Zero value in the case of a natural disaster
- Zero value in the event of bankruptcy of a State which is the issuer
- Almost zero value in the event of hyperinflation
- Decreasing value due to inflation
- Decreasing value as a result of the creation of money by private banks
- The contract price is closely linked to the issuer and its current situation in the arena of geopolitics games which are complicated and uncertain
- There are significant fees for the abroad transfer of such money

As you can see money that now apply to the general public, have to will face many challenges and it's value is very vulnerable to attacks from different sides.

II) Does the solution is Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies:

Hence the desire to spread the mechanism that protects significantly or even preventing many of these activities.
The first such attempt - imperfect and solving only part of the problem was Bitcoin.
It is a model to follow, but also had a few flaws.
The first and crucial: It was still fiat money and worthless in real.

The differences and improvements in relation to Bitcoin will find a separate section.

III) The effective solution:
1) Going one step further wanting to enter the market mechanism that protects citizens from the greed and stupidity of many politicians, brokers and bankers.

No fiat money

but token of participation, which is all worth the same, have any electronic representation or paper with cover, in fact, in all kinds of goods that is completely something other than banknotes, which are in the wallets of most Europeans, Asians, Americans and Australians.

Token of participation ? why token ? and in what participating ?

2 . Token because:

2.1. The management of the token does not exclusively consist only of  cryptocurrency.
2.2. The portfolio contains the token representation can take three forms: physical, electronic cryptocurrency and electronic registered wallets.
2.3. It is easy to transfer
2.4. Authorizes access to the system
2.5. They will be generated one-time password
2.6. This is not money. Why token of participation is not money:
- There is no money creation or spontaneous creation of  tokens, with no cover in the goods
- The creation of token of participation is associated with the payment in the accounting sense an adequate sum of money

3. Participation?
3.1 Yes, because these tokens of participation are proportional representation values.
3.2 The values? Yes - but which one? Well, this is money that is paid before the formation of the editing tokens are invested in accordance with the will of the participants currently in production editing.

3.3 Invested in what?

Mainly in:
- Companies and projects around the world,
- Intellectual property like patents, databases, logos and brands, software,
- Also in raw materials with service of deposit.

While, however, the token is in the form of a token, do I have a direct interest in any of these companies? Only after the life of edition you get directly some of the resources associated with tokens and proportional to the number of tokens.

3.4 Benefits. Why is this better than just having regular money wallet.

3.4.1 Earn.

You receive dividends almost directly if you are a user of registered wallet, or if a mining of the currency, and always when the investments are increasing and thus the value of its assets increases.


More about that in the life cycle and in the statement of differences and similarities due to Bitcoin.

3.4.2 Value

Money have very variable value, are exposed to all of the negative market factors as inflation, the stock market crash, the game of big capitals, stock market gaming, political pressure and blackmail in relation to a particular country.

3.4.3 All around the world:

It is a global currency. Investments are indeed are done locally and sometimes globally, but you can pass it anywhere to anyone. Transfer of tokens abroad have no fees, in general any transfer is almost no cost compared to conventional transfers or operations using a credit card. In addition, the physical representation may allow the transfer instantly when you are face to face.

3.4.4 Control:

Tokens of participation BARNABITES COIN are under the control of the users are not banks, state or an office.

3.4.5 Resistance and stability:

Large capitals are playing the value of one currency or currencies Bitcoin against or another, tossing a lot of money from one currency to another in order to obtain income. The effects of this game is bankrupt small businesses that could not or may not be well protected against fluctuations in the prices of their goods and services as a result of conversion, which takes place at long term agreements.

Stability, although the market value of BARNABITES COIN change it and so it is backed with minimum value  in shares of companies and investments in the basket associated with tokens of participation.

3.4.6 The protection of ordinary people against perturbations caused artificially in the area
finance - currency war and other tricks to get more money from stock market dirty games.

Is that a revolution ? No, it is more like reinventing the wheel from medieval times.

When money were money not just a thin air.


Other Ways You Can Help

I am searching for investors but also brokers and ambassadors of the project and all support at searching for them.

more details email me: barnabapa@barnabapa.pl

necessary other goods.

have tokens - registered to personal details digital wallet, physical but cheap

proposition for customer:
