transferable even abroad but without many flaws of fiat money or strongly

political games, stock market games, wars, local natural or economic disasters.

Build in
automated investment from savings.  
Who I am?
Software developer with economic, crypto technology and political education
and experience.
Why am I doing this project?
My life was very affected by the market gambling which generated 2009 crisis and I don`t want
any repeat of that in our future and future of our children. We don`t need to
wait for it as no legal changes are needed just our actions.
History and
background of project:

using, have a real - minimal protected value?

not. In a
dramatic majority of countries currently valid fiat money? What kind of money?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fiat_money
at a glance ->
money that has no value in many places around the world but in his country has
a value of contractual because you need it to pay taxes, and others also have
to pay the taxes, so it is more or less probable  that you will want someone in the future do
or sell something for the banknote or coin -> eg. sell bread in the store

several disadvantages especially when present in the open currency market:

capitals

- Fluctuations resulting from economic attacks using a variety of instruments
such as political pressure. Lowering the rating of country to BBB

of a bank or a stroke or lead to the edge of collapse of the bank - applies in
many countries even in Europe involuntary commitment of private money above EUR
100 000 if the bank is in need it may take private money.
- Loss as a result of assault

- A significant loss as a result of the destruction of the database containing
data about the status of your account
- Zero value in the case of a conventional war and the loss of territory
- Zero value in the case of a natural disaster

story:
Short Summary

My name is Matthew Palmer and I am reaching out to you today on behalf of the soon to be live sound production service Open Palisade Productions.

As a 21 year old, I am proud to say that I have a lot of experience running live events, especially from the sound production and reinforcement perspective. 

This is something that I have been working on for many years now and nothing makes me happier than a satisfied crowd and satisfied performers.  I am very passionate about what I do and for me to be able to do this within a community and for the community would be the pinnacle for me.

What We Need & What You Get

Here is the hard part.  The $15k I wish to raise will cover the cost of purchasing the top-of-the-line equipment that will be the center of every event.  Any extra money raised will be put towards further upgrades and expansions.  With no direct return, or material object to offer, I get that this is a crazy thing to ask.  I am asking you to join me in the campaign and trust that this will make a difference in your community

Now for the good news.  If this idea gets funded in full, any event that I do for a contributor will be free of charge within at least the first year after contribution.  Any event for a non contributor will have a significantly reduced rate.

The Impact

Contributing to this campaign allows you to be directly and permanently involved in a movement bringing back community live events and the intimacy of smaller to medium live events.  I would hope that this could eventually reshape what a community event is.  We need more recognition of arts, especially music.

Risks & Challenges

I understand how this can be a frustrating decision to make.  For what it is, this is money down with no material return.  However, consider the impact on the coffee shop, small club, or performer.  For those contributors who own a coffee shop or restaurant, for example, think about the benefit of having live entertainment (at no cost to you) and the talk that will create within the community.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that money is quite tight these days.  If you are unable to contribute at this time, please spread the word.  Friends, bands, restaurants, coffee shops, musicians, or family members.  Whoever it may be, just spread the word.

 NEW CAMPAIGN REWARDS :




The Impact:


VOLT lighter does not use Gas or any burning fuel thus is safe for the environment !



MAKING THE WORLD A BIT BETTER and CLEANER!


EVERY YEAR about 740 millions of reusable lighters are thrown away polluting environment ending up in Ocean. Ocean pollution causes extinction hundreds of species.

We will Send a THANK YOU ! VOLT Card to Everyone who shares the project spreading the word using #VOLTLIGHTER ! :)

Please help the world become cleaner for future generations and oceans safer for millions of species by sharing the project and spreading the word !

story:
Short Summary

We ask for your support in creating a cozy warm place where everyone will be able to find something new and valuable despite his/her sexual orientation and gender identity.

Our mission

   "Chrome” is an open space for LGBT society and its friends. Unlike numerous other LGBT organizations our goal is not about rights protection or agitation but creating a safe area where tolerance of the team, friendly atmosphere and creative leisure allow to realize the universality of human values.  Thanks to aсtive involvement of LGBT-friendly heterosexuals step by step we adjust differences between LGBT-community and society as well as influence mutual problems solving.

                      

   

“Chrome” LGBT place is a small step towards our big dream which is to see the LGBT community as anessential part of new progressive and tolerant Ukrainian society.
Despite the fact that Chrome exists only since 2012 we have managed to conquer thousands of hearts of people who are not indifferent to the LGBT community.
Our path has begun from an online LGBT radio which allowed many activists and volunteers all over the country to illuminate the real state of LGBT rights in Ukraine. This project helped us to realize that people are eager to know not only about
troubles and difficulties but also to hear the voices of sincere people and see
the happy future of the people equal to them.

                         


                                                          Remarkable events

On January 18, 2014, the “Chrome space” for LGBT and LGBT-friendly people was opened and “Chrome Vision” Youtube channel was created.

                         


In February 2014 we have developed our own training session for those who are willing to understand themselves and their partners. The “5 languages of love” training has become very popular not only inside our community but also outside our city.

                         

 

On May 10, 2014, the first official event of “Chrome Action” project was held. It was an active adventure quest in the streets of our city.

                         


On February 1, 2016, the “Chrome space” organization moves to a new place in the downtown and a major reformation begins.

                         

   

Within 2 years “Chrome Space” was visited by almost 2000 of people, including citizens of Russia, Belorussia, Germany and Holland. Moreover, “Chrome Space” has been home for 7 visitors in-need for more than a month.

                       


                                                 

                                               Departments

"Chrome Space" is an open space for creative ideas realization, work and leisure. Constant events: live music concerts, trainings, workshops, games and contests.


"Chrome Action" is a project for active pastime and recreation. Constant events: city-quests, summer camps, sport contests etc.


"Chrome Vision" is a YouTube channel where motivation videos, events and projects announcements as well as entertaining videos are uploaded.


"Chrome Shop" is a shop which sells handmade goods like cosmetics, adornments, interior decorations, clothes etc.


                                                     Our financing

Almost the 100% of the organization budget is based on visitors’ and project participants’ investments. That shows the high level of community support. However, despite our independence, we realize that the investments of the non-indifferent people is not enough for “Chrome Space” development and reaching the global purposes we have.

Within the 2 years we have realized that “Chrome” is necessary for not only LGBT community and not only in Dnipropetrovsk. The whole Ukrainian society needs such places where LGBT community can feel safe spending time together with LGBT-friendly heterosexuals. What is more, it is important for LGBT-friendly straight people to find out more about LGBT community life and see it with their own eyes. That’s why we are eager to open such places as “Chrome” in other cities, first of all in Kharkiv and Kirovograd.

In addition, “Chrome Space” has a well-developed business scheme which will let us to follow market rules and evolve the chain of LGBT open spaces. That is why we do need your help to fulfill these plans.

Thanks to the “Indigogo” financial project we will refresh our open space, in particular:

  • Equip our café-zone with the necessary facilities.
  • Purchase the necessary furniture for our guests.
  • Purchase a projector and technical devices for movie-theatre and co-working center.
  • Create a small stage for live music concerts.
  • All the money collected will be invested into new “Chrome Space” foundation in Kirovograd.

                                     Together we can reach the goal!

                                                          Join us!

story:
#OutbidChang - A David vs Goliath mission. 

Today, there is only one remaining team in the biggest league in the biggest sport in the world – Everton FC, a football team in the English Premier League, who still has an alcohol brand on their jersey. Their sponsor is Chang beer, a brand from a Thailand-based multinational corporation. They have a long-term sponsorship deal with Everton FC, but this is being renegotiated after next season. We want to replace Chang Beer with our local barbershop The Barber Club, located close to Everton’s home stadium Goodison Park. And that’s where we need your help – every penny counts and every cent takes us closer to our goal!

About us

We are a father and son owning a local barbershop in Bootle. Our shop, the Barber Club, is located near Everton’s home stadium Goodison Park.

Sean ‘the older’ is the owner of the Barber Club, and Sean ‘the younger’ is a barber by profession. Both of us are big Everton supporters and our family has been for generations. It would of course be a dream come true to see our logo on the shirts of our favourite team, especially when it could benefit a great cause and protect children from Big Alcohol.

That’s why we are really happy to take part in this project from BigAlcohol.Exposed.   

About BigAlcohol.Exposed

BigAlcohol.Exposed is a worldwide network of NGOs dedicated to exposing the truth about the unethical business methods of the alcohol industry. Read about the network and their work here:

bigalcohol.exposed

Twitter

Facebook

Why are we doing this?

When the people at BigAlcohol.Exposed approached us, we immediately felt that we wanted to be a part of this campaign. Alcohol brands sponsoring sport teams and athletes have an unpleasant side effect – It doesn’t just make adults interested in a certain alcohol brand, but children even more so. Children in the UK today are actually more familiar with alcohol brands than they are with sweet and cake brands. 

Our expectations

Of course our dream is to have our barbershop’s logo on the jersey of our favourite team. We love football, we love Everton, we love children and we think they deserve better than being the target of Big Alcohol’s brand advertising. Let children be children. But the most important thing for us is to create awareness of the problem. So even if we don’t reach our goal to #OutbidChang, we will consider it a victory if every person who starts talking about the issue, spreads it on social media or wears our merchandise. So please help us, together we can make a change!

At the same time, we know that a lot of people around the world care about their children – that’s why we believe that this is dream can come true. 

Our children’s heroes shouldn't be billboards and ambassadors for alcohol brands. 

Together we can #OutbidChang!



Q/A

Q: I love what you are doing, how can I contribute?

A: Well, $23 million is a ridiculous amount of money, pls fund us with anything you can afford or just spread our cause anywhere you can. Download our graphic material and print your own merchandise to show your support!

Download here

Q: Why are you doing this?

A: Our goal is to raise a sum where we can mach the Chang Beer sponsorship with Everton FC, and get rid of the last alcohol shirt sponsor in Premier League.

Q: How can we get in touch with you?

A: Our opening hours are 10.00am - 06.30pm (Mon-Fri) 08.30am - 04.00pm (Sat) and 10.30am-03.00pm (Sun*) at The Barber Club, 49 Stanley Rd, Bootle, Liverpool, UK. Or visit our Facebook page:

https://www.facebook.com/The-Barber-Club-Bootle-437137989768700/ or Tweet us @BarberClubL20 See you! (*If there is no Everton home game)

Q: When will you negotiate with Everton FC? 

A: As soon as we reach our goal, we will approach Everton FC to get involved in the process of being their new shirt sponsor. But we don't have a lot of time, the deal is renegotiated during fall 2016. 

Q: I'm having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?

A: Email: support@indiegogo.com

Q: How do I upgrade my perk?

A:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756

Q: I would like a refund. How do I do this?

A:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

Twitter
Facebook
Why are we doing this?
When
the people at BigAlcohol.Exposed approached us, we immediately felt that we
wanted to be a part of this campaign. Alcohol brands sponsoring sport teams and athletes have an unpleasant
side effect – It doesn’t just make adults interested in a certain alcohol
brand, but children even more so. Children in
the UK today are actually more familiar with alcohol brands than they are with sweet
and cake brands. 



Our expectations
Of course our
dream is to have our barbershop’s logo on the jersey of our favourite team. We
love football, we love Everton, we love children and we think they deserve
better than being the target of Big Alcohol’s brand advertising. Let children
be children. But the most important thing for us is to create awareness of the problem.
So even if we don’t reach our goal to #OutbidChang, we will consider it a
victory if every person who starts talking about the issue, spreads it on
social media or wears our merchandise. So please help us, together we can make a change!
At the same
time, we know that a lot of people around the world care about their children –
that’s why we believe that this is dream can come true. 
Our children’s heroes
shouldn't be billboards and ambassadors for alcohol brands. 
Together we can
#OutbidChang!




Q/A

Q: I love what you are doing, how can I contribute?
A: Well, $23 million is a ridiculous amount of money, pls fund us with anything you can afford or just spread our cause anywhere you can. Download our graphic material and print your own merchandise to show your support!
Download here
Q: Why are you doing this?
A: Our goal is to raise a sum where we can mach the Chang Beer sponsorship with Everton FC, and get rid of the last alcohol shirt sponsor in Premier League.
Q: How can we get in touch with you?
A: Our opening hours are 10.00am - 06.30pm (Mon-Fri) 08.30am - 04.00pm (Sat) and 10.30am-03.00pm (Sun*) at The Barber Club, 49 Stanley Rd, Bootle, Liverpool, UK. Or visit our Facebook page: 

https://www.facebook.com/The-Barber-Club-Bootle-437137989768700/ or Tweet us @BarberClubL20 See you! (*If there is no Everton home game)
Q: When will you negotiate with Everton FC? 
A: As soon as we reach our goal, we will approach Everton FC to get involved in the process of being their new shirt sponsor. But we don't have a lot of time, the deal is renegotiated during fall 2016. 
Q: I'm having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?
A: Email: support@indiegogo.com
Q: How do I upgrade my perk?
A:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756
Q: I would like a refund. How do I do this?
A:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

Free Water For You is America’s first brand of free bottled water.

We believe that:

There is no life without water. Our brand is free you don’t pay a dime for it. We believe that giving is one of the best communication

we were inspired by the water crisis around the world and right here at home

We aim to make one of the most in demand commodities in the world free again.

story:
(Chalkboard Menu at Our Old Location)

Local Food in an Historic Setting

Hi,

We are Andrew and Michael. We've made great food for people before and we want to do it again.

Many of you remember With A TwisT in Cottleville. It's time to bring it back and better to St. Charles.

Some time ago we came across this beautiful building in need of a little love and wondered what it needed to be whole again. In time, it became clear that this was well within our capability and felt that not only could we do it, but that we should do it for the good of the community and to preserve a little bit of history.

(Our Turkey, brine'd by us next to our house-made chips)

What We Need & What You Get

For this project to be successful we need to fund the purchase of the building. We already have what we need to rehabilitate the building and get the restaurant going.

If you choose to help us out you will get a fantastic restaurant and small grocery in the heart of St. Charles and the preservation of part of the cities history with the stewardship of people who care about it.

With our own renovation funds, we plan to put everything in place for:

  • business on the first floor
  •  a large dining garden
  • residences on the second floor
  • ample parking

Some of the perks we're offering are:

  • A lifetime 20% discount at the restaurant
  • Free drinks with your meals for the first year the restaurant is running.
  • Branded T-Shirts
  • A whole meal at no charge.
  • Your own private restaurant buyout experience.
  • A piece of marble left by the mason.

Some Details

The building was built in 1889 and was the home and business front of a local engraving mason who made many of the monuments you see around St. Charles.

We've had the building inspected by structural engineers who have found no fault in it's condition, just that it needs a little maintenance.

After getting plumbers, electricians and carpenters to get us estimates and bids on the cost of rehabilitation, we determined all we need to get this done is to raise funds to acquire the building.

The building has been appraised at an "As-Is" value of $149,000 (more than what we need to buy it) and if renovated $248,000.

Thank You!

If you like what we're doing here, please share this campaign with as many people as you can.

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone my name is Melissa Simmons, I am the founder of Sassy Ash Cigars llc, (The newest Cigar Lounge in Pittsburgh, PA). 

I have been a part of the Cigar industry since 2007, and after designing and at one time managing a Cigar Lounge, it has become a passion of mine to open my own Upscale Cigar Lounge.

Sassy Ash Cigars llc is seeking contributions in order to acquire a retail location. The location Sassy Ash Cigars llc is seeking to acquire is located in the Northside of Pittsburgh, PA.

 There are Cigar Lounges located throughout the City, but there are none located in the cities Northside. This proposed location would cater to the residents of the Northside, Northshore, North Hills, West End, some parts of the East End, and Downtown.

With your help Sassy Ash Cigars llc will be positioned to acquire an 8,000 sq ft retail location that will offer an upscale Cigar Lounge (with or without locker memberships), a 24hr access VIP Membership Lounge, a bar/lounge with live entertainment, and  a roof top lounge area. 
(CLICK on SEE MORE DETAILS to learn a bit more about me.)

What We need & What You Get

The $50,000 that Sassy Ash Cigars llc is seeking will be used for the acquisition of the retail location and startup funding costs.

In exchange for your contribution amount Sassy Ash Cigars llc will offer you several different perks.

Contributions can range from $100-$2500.

Perks will include: Locker memberships, cigar credits, cigar discounts and yearly cigar rewards.

(Please CLICK on the GALLERY tab to see a sneak peek of the space.)

What to expect and When

Sassy Ash Cigars llc plans to open in the Summer of 2015.

The proposed location has 3 floors of retail space:

  • The first floor will have 4 smoking rooms and a full size kitchen.
  • The second floor will house the Members 24hr access Lounge and a bar/lounge area that will accommodate live entertainment (coming in 2017).
  • The Third floor will be the floor that gives access to the roof top deck /lounge

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign and I will compensate you with a complimentary cigar when the contributing person mentions your name.

story:
Feel Italy, an amazing journey

Hi, my name is Veronica, I'm 27 and I'm the founder of Feel IT.

I graduated in marketing, I worked for big companies such as BMW Italia, Foxtel Australia and for small amazing Australian start-up while I was living in Sydney.


You can follow me on LinkedIn if you like, you will be more than welcomed  to be part of my network:

https://it.linkedin.com/in/veronicamotto

I told my story to the Italian magazine Donna Moderna.

Feel IT  is my new company, my baby.

It's an amazing journey through small Italian food producers and I will personally drive for kilometres to find the most authentic families that have been produced typical Italian recipes for generations, using LOCAL RAW MATERIALS only.

Are you a "Curious Foddie" or a " Serial Foodie" ? According to seasons and availability, every three months we will create a new "box" so  you will discover, a new Italian area tasting new organic or all-natural products that are not available in supermarkets.

For each area you will decide the size of your box, depending on which kind of Foodie you are!

HD videos, photos and interviews will let you feel my country before even taste products.

I believe in the power of "taste test", so our boxes will enable you to taste, smell and experience ingredients before ordering them through our online marketplace.

We're based near the famous Lake Como.




- Final picture is only an example of how the box will look like - 


I need your help

We're officially part of Tavoli Tematici Expo 2015, the food exposition that is taking place in Milan.


My company has already been set up in June 2014.

I've started focusing my attention on high quality extra virgin olive oil, but the last season has been very bad for this amazing product, because of bad weather conditions.

A dear friend of mine once told me "fail fast, evolve faster". So I'm here to boost my new project that involves different kind of regional organic and all-natural products. 

  • I need your support to improve the online store, to create photos and videos that will tell you the stories of people and territories, to invest in communication and to hire new people.
  • Extraordinary food take you extraordinary places, if you help me we can discover them together because Italy is not only about pasta and pizza.
  • If I reach the goal with your help, you will give a real boost to my project, to improve the platform, to create amazing contents and to hire new talented young people.

Be part of the journey

My project has just won the first part of a competition in Milan, Italy. You can know more about it here www.polihub.it. 

I'm a young female entrepreneur that have started running this business solo because I truly love my country and I want to promote small family businesses that really represent Italy worldwide.

Private investors have already decided to invest on me, but I still need your help to improve and create something that makes you experience Italy in a new way.

Follow us on Facebook

https://www.facebook.com/Feel.It.amazingjourney

Instagram

https://instagram.com/_feel_italy_/

and Pinterest

https://www.pinterest.com/feelitaly/



Challenges

There are many online stores about Italian food products, but I can rarely feel something about my country. Italy is made by people, not only companies. It's made by great families, our heroes. 

When I travel I love to feel local instead of being a simply tourist. My aim is to let you discover this country from a new point of view.

I believe in the power of "taste test", so our boxes will enable you to taste, smell and experience ingredients before ordering them through our online marketplace.

Feel IT is a new platform for storytelling that will let you discover and experience Italy. If you're curious, if you like to travel and explore, I will be more than welcome to let you be part of this amazing journey.


The power of network

Here you can find the picture of one of the perks you will get if you choose to support me: high quality extra virgin olive oil from Sicily, Italy.

If you like my project but you can't support me, please share this campaign with family, friends, colleagues, start-up or through social networks.

There's a new species of women, together we can make the difference.

Grazie.

story:
Happy teams work together better

We're a UX designer and a copywriter who met by chance at a conference. We started talking about why it is that people like us often seem to be in conflict at work despite wanting the same outcome: a really great product for the end user. 

We did some research and spoke to psychiatrists about their most effective techniques for conflict resolution. Out of this came the idea to reverse engineer cognitive behavioural marriage therapy on to the designer-writer pair in interdisciplinary teams. By identifying common areas of conflict (design or content-first?) we created a set of cards that both could relate to. 

We ran a session at SXSW Interactive 2015 where pairs:

  • talked through conflicts they'd had at work

  • wrote their thoughts, feelings and behaviours 

  • used this as a tool to find common ground

Armed with fresh perspective, pairs were able to easily identify ways to work better together as they felt they understood the basis of the problem. Crucially, they weren't just applying a quick fix to a symptom of the problem, but getting deeper and addressing the root of that problem. The benefit to this kind of training session is that it can avoid similar problems cropping up in future and people appreciate the other's point of view and reference. 

What we need and what you get

We started with 7 cards as a pilot. Now we want to expand to a full set of 50 cards for the full team. We've spent hours and hours on research to find the best way to help resolve conflicts in digital teams and we need more support to help us do that. By picking a perk you'll be contributing to the happy teams of tomorrow. 
  • The money raised will go into commissioning research with teams and professionals.
  • You can donate money - all funds received will go into user research.
  • Help us by volunteering your team to be involved in our workshops!
  • Submit conflicts and tried-and-tested methods for resolving them.

About us

Christine is a former BBC journalist from the UK. She now runs a company producing content and strategy for startups, SMEs, big brands and the UK government. 

Jon is a user experience designer with 10 years at the Fed Reserve Bank under his belt. He works with  startups, small businesses, non-profits and government to make people's lives easier. 

The impact

The difference your contribution will make will help teams work better together and help individuals gain a deeper understanding of how and why projects are (or aren't) successful. We want people to be happy at work so they can produce awesome stuff. This is our way of helping make that happen.

We've tested the idea with a group of 200 writers and designers at SXSW. One attendee said of the session: "I learned perspective is everything and communication is key. Great session on the importance of collaboration with speakers who really got it!" 

We want to share these insights and simple techniques with people in (and managing) teams everywhere. 

You've undoubtedly experienced conflict at work, so here's a way for us to try to minimise the energy wasted on negative emotions and build trust with our colleagues. 

Risks and challenges

The main challenge we're facing is whether the cards are enough on their own to help people in teams. Perhaps we will need extra material alongside them, perhaps not. We really need teams that need our help to come forward so we can test the cards - and our ideas - so that they're useful and valuable. We need you!

Other ways you can help

  • We'd love to hear about your conflicts at work and how you resolved them.
  • Please share this campaign with colleagues and bosses (past and present)!

story:
Summary

Do you like drinking warm water? Do you like drinking warm beer? Do you like melting ice watering down your beverage? If you answered "No", check this out:

Hello! My name is Andrew Weckman, and I am the Founder/CEO of Creatotech, maker of Drī Ice. I am very driven and motivated to commercially launch Drī Ice, making it available to solve the problem many bicyclists, outdoor enthusiasts, sports fans and others experience with their beverage containers’ contents continually absorbing heat! No one wants to drink warm water or beer when he/she is already sweating!

I am a technology entrepreneur with experience in banking, science, and math. I know, it's a bizarre combination. For more about me, my LinkedIn profile goes into more depth with organization: https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrewweckman

Here's why this campaign is very important to me:

Approximately 2 years ago, my wife and I were riding our bicycles along a trail near the Allegheny River in Pittsburgh, PA. As many people do, we packed our water bottles with ice to try to retain a cool temperature. Our plan failed! It was a hot summer day and by the time we were at a resting point, the water in our water bottles was warm and distasteful. So I started thinking, "How can I keep our water cool during lengthy bike trips in the heat?" Therefore, after many months of trial and error in experimentation, I found the solution for the problem facing many bicyclists and even outdoor enthusiasts today!

We are promoting Drī Ice in an effort to begin large volume production to meet the demands of our supporters. Drī Ice is an apparatus that screws on to the bottom (or top) of a water bottle holding 24 fluid ounces. Your contribution will help us achieve: manufacturing of our components, produce mass quantities, package the product, and sell to consumers and retailers. Your support will allow us to bridge the gap from where we are to where we are heading. Your contribution is greatly appreciated, no matter what size.

organization: https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrewweckman 
Here's why this campaign is very
important to me:
Approximately 2 years ago, my wife
and I were riding our bicycles along a trail near the Allegheny River in
Pittsburgh, PA. As many people do, we packed our water bottles with ice to try
to retain a cool temperature. Our plan failed! It was a hot summer day and by the time we were at a resting point, the
water in our water bottles was warm and distasteful. So I started thinking,
"How can I keep our water cool during lengthy bike trips in the
heat?" Therefore, after many months of trial and error in experimentation,
I found the solution for the problem facing many bicyclists and even outdoor
enthusiasts today! 
We are promoting Drī Ice in an
effort to begin large volume production to meet the demands of our supporters.
Drī Ice is an apparatus that screws on to the bottom (or top) of a water bottle
holding 24 fluid ounces. Your contribution will help us achieve:
manufacturing of our components, produce mass quantities, package the product,
and sell to consumers and retailers. Your support will allow us to bridge
the gap from where we are to where we are heading. Your contribution is greatly
appreciated, no matter what size.

story:
Short Summary

Our story thus far……

Avarice is an information technology solutions provider and our aim has always been to design and create solutions that would make people’s lives easier whether it’s business or personal.

Avarice Nigeria Ltd was born from the vision that entrepreneurship could succeed in Nigeria even with the current economic and infrastructural challenges that abound in the business environment. We also believe that entrepreneurship is the bedrock of economic development in any country and here in Nigeria social vices such as robbery, violence, e-fraud and most recently terrorism can be associated with unemployment especially in respect to the youths in the country.


What We Need & What You Get

To achieve our goal, we are looking at raising an estimate of $21,000. The breakdown is shown below;

Expenditure                            NGN                                    USD

Marketing                                     1,124,000.00                         5,564.36  

Logistics                                       1,674,000.00                         8,287.13

Operational cost                        1,000,000.00                        4,950.50

Web Development                     317,140.00                              1,570.00

Cost Miscellaneous                   100,000.00                           495.05

Total                                              4,215,140.00                        20,867.03

(exchange rate calculated at USD 1.00 to NGN 202.00)

We want to make our perks as valuable as possible to our contributors, we want to say thank you in a special way. Our rewards will range from recharged lines at discounted prices for a period of time to free advert spots on our website for up to a year! great right?


The Impact

In line with our aim of putting people into paid employment, we have embarked on the business of selling online recharge e-pins for mobile phones. We want to provide these services online where people can recharge their phones from the comfort of their homes, offices and even on the go as they transact their daily business and or activities anywhere and anytime using our online platform. Our estimates show that recharge e-pins is one of the fastest selling GSM products in the country’s telecoms market; recording daily sales of over $5 million worth of recharge cards.

Furthermore and more importantly, due to the paucity and inconsistency of online recharge companies in providing these services to the large potential customer base in Nigeria, Avarice LLC is focused on providing this online service on a consistent basis to customers for long and the foreseeable future.

The bigger business picture is attracting enough traffic to our website before we launch advertising services where individuals and companies can advertise their products and services on our website. This is another source of income we can capitalize on. 

The potentiality of these businesses is what we believe can help in putting individuals into paid employment. What we need is the assistance to bring this business projects to reality. Your contributions will make a huge impact to us achieving this.


Risks & Challenges

Some risks we could face would probably be where government could change policies in the mobile telecommunications industry for example, revoking licenses of all retail suppliers of e-pins to user buyers. Others challenges could be getting people to know the importance of how easy it is being able to recharge online.

These issues are addressable for the fact that Nigeria has one of the fastest growing IT industries in Africa and indeed the world today so we don’t envisage any licenses being revoked in the distant future. We will also be carrying out a lot of marketing and knowledge sharing activities across different social platforms to let people know the benefits of using our services.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute financially to our goals, you could help in spreading the word to others that you believe could help us financially in achieving our goals. We would really appreciate this!

story:
Our story...

Michael and I (Shawn) are ex-Royal Marine Commandos who have served around the globe including operations in Afghanistan and Iraq. We have recently returned to South Africa, our home soil with the dream of running an adventure tourism company where we can share our knowledge and experience with the general public through adventure. We have been planning, saving and building this company for about a year now and we are due to open our door in Oct 15.  This is an expensive industry to break into and due to the difficulty in raising funds our dream has been and is a real challenge.

What is Cape Commando...

It is an adventure tourism company that provides outdoor activities designed to get you in and amongst nature, and at the same time having fun and getting the adrenalin pumping!  We are big believers in a healthy and vibrant lifestyle and this is our way of providing activities which can bring much needed joy and laughter into people lives.  We have a website (www.capecommando.com) which went live a few weeks ago and please do look at it to get a better idea of what you will be supporting and making a reality.  We will be going live in Oct this year with all the relevant requirements in place and we are on schedule.  

What we need funds for?

We need your funding to secure our companies future and allow us to remain in our home country after dedicating such a huge proportion of our lives to service.  We have spent a significant amount of time away from family and friends trying to gain enough funding to implement all the activities we would like to provide.  We have already saved up a large sum of money which has been invested in the company to put it where it is now and allow it to go live in Oct this year. 

We still require additional funds for some of the activities later next year, which we are falling short at present.  We have a failsafe if this does not work, which requires Shawn or Michael to return to their current jobs within the Security Sector to gain further finance.  This would mean that one of us is away and the other is running the company, which is not ideal but if needs must we will do this as we want our dream to succeed.

All our adventures are currently staggered but we would like to reduce that timeline and offer our adventure sooner with your help, and this is possible if we reach our goal.

What about a loan or finance...

So you probably thinking why don't we just get finance.  This is due to the difficulty in finding funding as a new company in South Africa, and especially since we have lived in the UK for the last 15 years we do not have a credit rating and thus cannot get finance.  We are struggling to find additional finance to ensure our company is all it can be and does not fail.  We are ambitious in nature and want to provide nothing but the best service we can, and in order to do this we need your help and that is why we are here.

So what are the funds for?

The funds will be used for the purchase of a trailer for the company to operate from and additional funds will go towards the purchase of our high speed power boat and safety equipment.

We value any funding you can provide as this will be a great help towards our dream and making Cape Commando all is can be!

Some images of what we will be doing...

These images below are stock images but give a representation of what to expect.

Jetski, used for Jetovator (above)

Jetovator in action (above)

Guided Tours (above), around Cape Town

Abseiling (above), in and around Cape Town

Survival (above), in Paarl near Cape Town

Boat Rides (above), along Cape Town's coastline

Fitness (above), near Seapoint in Cape Town

story:
Das Unternehmen GreenYou kurz erklärt

GreenYou ermöglicht es jedem Menschen,  in den eigenen vier Wänden Gemüse oder Kräuter zu ziehen und dabei komplett unabhängig von Licht und manueller Bewässerung zu sein.

Alles wächst wie von allein' - egal, ob Du gerade zuhause oder im Urlaub bist.

Unsere Produkte

Das Zimmergewächshaus greenUnit verfügt über eine neuartige LED-UV Technologie, die eine Beleuchtung erzeugt ähnlich dem Sonnenlicht – und dabei beeindruckende Werte aufweist. Die Betriebsdauer beträgt ca. 50.000 Stunden, der Verbrauchswert liegt bei 35 Watt über einen herkömmlichen 220V Anschluss – also eine extrem stromsparende Energieversorgung. Unabhängig davon lässt sich die Lichtintensität über einen Drehschalter regulieren und so immer genügend Licht ins Dunkle bringen.

Die kleinere Lösung, der greenPot funktioniert nach dem gleichen Prinzip, nur fehlen hier die Lampen. Mit anderen Worten genügt ein halbwegs sonniges Plätzchen, und der Rest ergibt sich von selbst.

greenPot - die kleine Lösung für das eigene Zuhause

Ein besonderes Augenmerk bei unseren Produkten liegt dabei auf dem Design: Die schnörkellose, moderne Formensprache sowie die Farbgestaltung in weiß, grau und grün machen unsere Produkte zu einem echten Blickfang.

greenPot Plus+

Für alle die mehr wollen, steckt der greenPot Plus+ in den Startlöchern. Mit Hilfe einer Art "Lampe", werden hier die Pflanzen mit LED-UV Licht bestrahlt und wachsen somit auch im tiefsten Keller ohne Probleme vor sich hin. Die Entwürfe sind soweit fertig und einen Produzenten haben wir auch schon gefunden, der die technischen Möglichkeiten hat, diesen zu produzieren.

Alle Produkte werden mit genügend Saatgut für die Erstausstattung geliefert. Natürlich ist auch Bio-Erde in der Lieferung vorhanden.

Saatgut und Bio-Erde beziehen wir aus der Region, um Transportkosten zu sparen und somit den CO² Ausstoß zu verringern. Alles im Sinne des ökologischen Fußabdruckes unseres Unternehmens.

Das Material unserer Produkte besteht aus qualitativ hochwertigem, exzellent verarbeitetem sowie recycelten PVC, ein umweltfreundlicher Werkstoff, robust und langlebig. Form, Farben und Material sind so perfekt aufeinander abgestimmt.

Unsere Geschichte bisher

Im Februar 2014 haben wir die Firma gegründet. Mit einigen Monaten Vorlauf hatten wir das greenUnit entwickelt und waren bereit, das Produkt auf den Markt zu bringen. Als wir im Mai 2014 mit unserem Shop online gingen waren die ersten Verkäufer eher an Verwandte und Bekannte. Schnell jedoch wurden Medien auf uns aufmerksam, wir kamen in diverse Zeitungen, Onlinemagazine und es folgten einige Fernseh- und Radioauftritte. Das Geschäft lief besser, als wir es erwartet hatten.

Im Januar passierte etwas, mit dem wir niemals gerechnet hatten. Bei unserem Hersteller, der die Zimmergewächshäuser für uns produzierte, gab es massive Produktionsschwierigkeiten und wir bekamen die Mitteilung, dass diese aus internen Gründen die Produktion einstellen müssten. 

Wir handelten sofort und suchten einige neue potenzielle Hersteller für uns raus. 

Unser Status momentan: Wir haben den passenden Hersteller für unser Unternehmen gefunden. Und um nun noch das letzte Problem aus der Welt zu schaffen, haben wir uns entschlossen hier bei Indiegogo eine Crowdfunding Kampagne zu starten.

Wir hoffen sehr, dass mit dieser Crowdfunding Kampagne genug Geld eingesammelt werden kann, um die Produktion wieder zum Laufen zu bringen und somit die begehrten Produkte schnell wieder ihre stolzen Besitzer finden können!

Zur Zukunft von GreenYou und unsere Vision

Unser Ziel ist es mit diesem Crowdfunding eine Basis für das Unternehmen zu schaffen. Zur Fertigung von neuen Formen und einer ersten kleinen Produktionslinie ist das Budget von 100.000€ schon sehr knapp bemessen. Da wir kaum Kosten für Marketing und Vertrieb haben, lässt sich der Fokus komplett auf eine hochwertige Verarbeitung der Produkte legen.

Damit das Crowdfunding erfolgreich wird, brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung! 

Bitte unterstützt uns bei diesem Vorhaben. Das greenUnit ist eine Erfindung die bis ins Detail funktioniert. Die Kundenrezensionen, die wir bekommen haben, sind sehr gut und übertrafen sogar unsere Erwartungen. 

Unsere Vision ist es, in Zukunft nicht nur die Zimmer im kleinen Stil zu begrünen, sondern auch individuelle Gärten im eigenen Haus, in Restaurants, in öffentlichen Einrichtungen, in Shopping Zentren und vielen anderen Orten anlegen zu können, wo wir unsere geniale Technik einbauen werden. Gärten, automatisch bewässert und automatisch beleuchtet durch LED-UV-Technik.

Um die Vision weiter umzusetzen, brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung. 

Unsere Bitte an Euch: 

Unterstützt uns bei diesem Projekt und sorgt mit uns zusammen für eine grünere Umgebung! :-)

Wer sind wir

Wir sind zwei Studenten aus Hamburg. Tolga Taskin, 24 Jahre, studiert in Hamburg soziale Arbeit und Soeren Schahn, 23 Jahre, studiert zurzeit in Lübeck BWL.

Wir haben früher schon gemeinsam gegärtnert und mit der Zeit haben wir die Wünsche von Kunden und unsere Leidenschaft kombiniert und überlegt uns mit diesem Projekt selbstständig zu machen. Mit der Zeit ist die Vision entstanden, es Menschen zu ermöglichen immer selbstständiger auf ihre Ernährung zu achten und einen großen Teil dieser in häuslicher Umgebung auch decken zu können. Wir finden, dass wir mit diesem Projekt ein gutes Verhältnis zwischen Nutzen und Design geschaffen haben und wünschen uns für die Zukunft, dass wir das Unternehmen mit Eurer Hilfe neu auferstehen lassen können!

GreenYou - das sind wir
story_txt: Das Unternehmen GreenYou kurz erklärtGreenYou ermöglicht es jedem Menschen,  in den eigenen vier Wänden Gemüse oder Kräuter zu ziehen und dabei komplett unabhängig von Licht und manueller Bewässerung zu sein.Alles wächst wie von allein' - egal, ob Du gerade zuhause oder im Urlaub bist.Unsere ProdukteDas Zimmergewächshaus greenUnit verfügt über eine neuartige LED-UV Technologie, die eine Beleuchtung erzeugt ähnlich dem Sonnenlicht – und dabei beeindruckende Werte aufweist. Die Betriebsdauer beträgt ca. 50.000 Stunden, der Verbrauchswert liegt bei 35 Watt über einen herkömmlichen 220V Anschluss – also eine extrem stromsparende Energieversorgung. Unabhängig davon lässt sich die Lichtintensität über einen Drehschalter regulieren und so immer genügend Licht ins Dunkle bringen.Die kleinere Lösung, der greenPot funktioniert nach dem gleichen Prinzip, nur fehlen hier die Lampen. Mit anderen Worten genügt ein halbwegs sonniges Plätzchen, und der Rest ergibt sich von selbst.greenPot - die kleine Lösung für das eigene ZuhauseEin besonderes Augenmerk bei unseren Produkten liegt dabei auf dem Design: Die schnörkellose, moderne Formensprache sowie die Farbgestaltung in weiß, grau und grün machen unsere Produkte zu einem echten Blickfang.greenPot Plus+Für alle die mehr wollen, steckt der greenPot Plus+ in den Startlöchern. Mit Hilfe einer Art "Lampe", werden hier die Pflanzen mit LED-UV Licht bestrahlt und wachsen somit auch im tiefsten Keller ohne Probleme vor sich hin. Die Entwürfe sind soweit fertig und einen Produzenten haben wir auch schon gefunden, der die technischen Möglichkeiten hat, diesen zu produzieren.Alle Produkte werden mit genügend Saatgut für die Erstausstattung geliefert. Natürlich ist auch Bio-Erde in der Lieferung vorhanden.Saatgut und Bio-Erde beziehen wir aus der Region, um Transportkosten zu sparen und somit den CO² Ausstoß zu verringern. Alles im Sinne des ökologischen Fußabdruckes unseres Unternehmens.Das Material unserer Produkte besteht aus qualitativ hochwertigem, exzellent verarbeitetem sowie recycelten PVC, ein umweltfreundlicher Werkstoff, robust und langlebig. Form, Farben und Material sind so perfekt aufeinander abgestimmt.Unsere Geschichte bisherIm Februar 2014 haben wir die Firma gegründet. Mit einigen Monaten Vorlauf hatten wir das greenUnit entwickelt und waren bereit, das Produkt auf den Markt zu bringen. Als wir im Mai 2014 mit unserem Shop online gingen waren die ersten Verkäufer eher an Verwandte und Bekannte. Schnell jedoch wurden Medien auf uns aufmerksam, wir kamen in diverse Zeitungen, Onlinemagazine und es folgten einige Fernseh- und Radioauftritte. Das Geschäft lief besser, als wir es erwartet hatten.Im Januar passierte etwas, mit dem wir niemals gerechnet hatten. Bei unserem Hersteller, der die Zimmergewächshäuser für uns produzierte, gab es massive Produktionsschwierigkeiten und wir bekamen die Mitteilung, dass diese aus internen Gründen die Produktion einstellen müssten. Wir handelten sofort und suchten einige neue potenzielle Hersteller für uns raus. Unser Status momentan: Wir haben den passenden Hersteller für unser Unternehmen gefunden. Und um nun noch das letzte Problem aus der Welt zu schaffen, haben wir uns entschlossen hier bei Indiegogo eine Crowdfunding Kampagne zu starten.Wir hoffen sehr, dass mit dieser Crowdfunding Kampagne genug Geld eingesammelt werden kann, um die Produktion wieder zum Laufen zu bringen und somit die begehrten Produkte schnell wieder ihre stolzen Besitzer finden können!Zur Zukunft von GreenYou und unsere VisionUnser Ziel ist es mit diesem Crowdfunding eine Basis für das Unternehmen zu schaffen. Zur Fertigung von neuen Formen und einer ersten kleinen Produktionslinie ist das Budget von 100.000€ schon sehr knapp bemessen. Da wir kaum Kosten für Marketing und Vertrieb haben, lässt sich der Fokus komplett auf eine hochwertige Verarbeitung der Produkte legen.Damit das Crowdfunding erfolgreich wird, brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung! Bitte unterstützt uns bei diesem Vorhaben. Das greenUnit ist eine Erfindung die bis ins Detail funktioniert. Die Kundenrezensionen, die wir bekommen haben, sind sehr gut und übertrafen sogar unsere Erwartungen. Unsere Vision ist es, in Zukunft nicht nur die Zimmer im kleinen Stil zu begrünen, sondern auch individuelle Gärten im eigenen Haus, in Restaurants, in öffentlichen Einrichtungen, in Shopping Zentren und vielen anderen Orten anlegen zu können, wo wir unsere geniale Technik einbauen werden. Gärten, automatisch bewässert und automatisch beleuchtet durch LED-UV-Technik.Um die Vision weiter umzusetzen, brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung. Unsere Bitte an Euch: Unterstützt uns bei diesem Projekt und sorgt mit uns zusammen für eine grünere Umgebung! :-)Wer sind wirWir sind zwei Studenten aus Hamburg. Tolga Taskin, 24 Jahre, studiert in Hamburg soziale Arbeit und Soeren Schahn, 23 Jahre, studiert zurzeit in Lübeck BWL.Wir haben früher schon gemeinsam gegärtnert und mit der Zeit haben wir die Wünsche von Kunden und unsere Leidenschaft kombiniert und überlegt uns mit diesem Projekt selbstständig zu machen. Mit der Zeit ist die Vision entstanden, es Menschen zu ermöglichen immer selbstständiger auf ihre Ernährung zu achten und einen großen Teil dieser in häuslicher Umgebung auch decken zu können. Wir finden, dass wir mit diesem Projekt ein gutes Verhältnis zwischen Nutzen und Design geschaffen haben und wünschen uns für die Zukunft, dass wir das Unternehmen mit Eurer Hilfe neu auferstehen lassen können!GreenYou - das sind wir
